libtrac.h File Reference

MPTRAC library declarations. More...

#include <gsl/gsl_fft_complex.h>

#define AVO   6.02214076e23
 Avogadro constant [1/mol]. More...
 
#define CPD   1003.5
 Specific heat of dry air at constant pressure [J/(kg K)]. More...
 
#define EPS   (MH2O / MA)
 Ratio of the specific gas constant of dry air and water vapor [1]. More...
 
#define G0   9.80665
 Standard gravity [m/s^2]. More...
 
#define H0   7.0
 Scale height [km]. More...
 
#define LV   2501000.
 Latent heat of vaporization of water [J/kg]. More...
 
#define KB   1.3806504e-23
 Boltzmann constant [kg m^2/(K s^2)]. More...
 
#define MA   28.9644
 Molar mass of dry air [g/mol]. More...
 
#define MH2O   18.01528
 Molar mass of water vapor [g/mol]. More...
 
#define MO3   48.00
 Molar mass of ozone [g/mol]. More...
 
#define P0   1013.25
 Standard pressure [hPa]. More...
 
#define RA   (1e3 * RI / MA)
 Specific gas constant of dry air [J/(kg K)]. More...
 
#define RE   6367.421
 Mean radius of Earth [km]. More...
 
#define RI   8.3144598
 Ideal gas constant [J/(mol K)]. More...
 
#define T0   273.15
 Standard temperature [K]. More...

#define ARRAY_2D(ix, iy, ny)    ((ix) * (ny) + (iy))
 Get 2-D array index. More...
 
#define ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ny, iz, nz)    (((ix)*(ny) + (iy)) * (nz) + (iz))
 Get 3-D array index. More...
 
#define ARRHENIUS(a, b, t)    ((a) * exp( -(b) / (t)))
 Arrhenius equation for temperature dependence of reaction rates. More...
 
#define DEG2DX(dlon, lat)    ((dlon) * M_PI * RE / 180. * cos((lat) / 180. * M_PI))
 Convert degrees to zonal distance. More...
 
#define DEG2DY(dlat)    ((dlat) * M_PI * RE / 180.)
 Convert degrees to meridional distance. More...
 
#define DP2DZ(dp, p)    (- (dp) * H0 / (p))
 Convert pressure change to vertical distance. More...
 
#define DX2DEG(dx, lat)
 Convert zonal distance to degrees. More...
 
#define DY2DEG(dy)    ((dy) * 180. / (M_PI * RE))
 Convert meridional distance to degrees. More...
 
#define DZ2DP(dz, p)    (-(dz) * (p) / H0)
 Convert vertical distance to pressure change. More...
 
#define DIST(a, b)    sqrt(DIST2(a, b))
 Compute Cartesian distance between two vectors. More...
 
#define DIST2(a, b)    ((a[0]-b[0])*(a[0]-b[0])+(a[1]-b[1])*(a[1]-b[1])+(a[2]-b[2])*(a[2]-b[2]))
 Compute squared distance between two vectors. More...
 
#define DOTP(a, b)    (a[0]*b[0]+a[1]*b[1]+a[2]*b[2])
 Compute dot product of two vectors. More...
 
#define FMOD(x, y)    ((x) - (int) ((x) / (y)) * (y))
 Compute floating point modulo. More...

#define NN(x0, y0, x1, y1, x)    (fabs((x) - (x0)) <= fabs((x) - (x1)) ? (y0) : (y1))
 Compute nearest neighbor interpolation. More...
 
#define NORM(a)    sqrt(DOTP(a, a))
 Compute norm of a vector. More...
 
#define P(z)    (P0 * exp(-(z) / H0))
 Convert altitude to pressure. More...
 
#define PSAT(t)    (6.112 * exp(17.62 * ((t) - T0) / (243.12 + (t) - T0)))
 Compute saturation pressure over water (WMO, 2018). More...
 
#define PSICE(t)    (6.112 * exp(22.46 * ((t) - T0) / (272.62 + (t) - T0)))
 Compute saturation pressure over ice (WMO, 2018). More...
 
#define PW(p, h2o)
 Calculate partial water vapor pressure. More...
 
#define RH(p, t, h2o)    (PW(p, h2o) / PSAT(t) * 100.)
 Compute relative humidity over water. More...
 
#define RHICE(p, t, h2o)    (PW(p, h2o) / PSICE(t) * 100.)
 Compute relative humidity over ice. More...
 
#define RHO(p, t)    (100. * (p) / (RA * (t)))
 Compute density of air. More...
 
#define ROETH_PHOTOL(a, b, c, sza)    ((c)*(sza) < M_PI/2. ? (a) * exp((b) * (1 - 1/cos((c) * (sza)))) : 0)
 Roeth approximation formula for photolysis reactions. More...

 Set atmospheric quantity index. More...
 
#define SH(h2o)    (EPS * GSL_MAX((h2o), 0.1e-6))
 Compute specific humidity from water vapor volume mixing ratio. More...
 
#define SQR(x)    ((x)*(x))
 Compute square of x. More...
 
#define SWAP(x, y, type)    do {type tmp = x; x = y; y = tmp;} while(0);
 Swap macro. More...
 
#define TDEW(p, h2o)
 Calculate dew point temperature (WMO, 2018). More...
 
#define TICE(p, h2o)
 Calculate frost point temperature (WMO, 2018). More...
 
#define THETA(p, t)    ((t) * pow(1000. / (p), 0.286))
 Compute potential temperature. More...
 
#define THETAVIRT(p, t, h2o)    (TVIRT(THETA((p), (t)), GSL_MAX((h2o), 0.1e-6)))
 Compute virtual potential temperature. More...
 
#define TOK(line, tok, format, var)
 Get string tokens. More...
 
#define TVIRT(t, h2o)    ((t) * (1. + (1. - EPS) * GSL_MAX((h2o), 0.1e-6)))
 Compute virtual temperature. More...
 
#define Z(p)    (H0 * log(P0 / (p)))

◆ NC_GET_DOUBLE

#define NC_GET_DOUBLE (   varname,
  ptr,
  force 
)
Value:
{ \
if(force) { \
NC(nc_inq_varid(ncid, varname, &varid)); \
NC(nc_get_var_double(ncid, varid, ptr)); \
} else { \
if(nc_inq_varid(ncid, varname, &varid) == NC_NOERR) { \
NC(nc_get_var_double(ncid, varid, ptr)); \
} else \
WARN("netCDF variable %s is missing!", varname); \
} \
}

◆ NC_INQ_DIM

#define NC_INQ_DIM (   dimname,
  ptr,
  min,
  max 
)
Value:
{ \
int dimid; size_t naux; \
NC(nc_inq_dimid(ncid, dimname, &dimid)); \
NC(nc_inq_dimlen(ncid, dimid, &naux)); \
*ptr = (int)naux; \
if ((*ptr) < (min) || (*ptr) > (max)) \
ERRMSG("Dimension %s is out of range!", dimname); \
}

◆ PSAT

#define PSAT (   t)     (6.112 * exp(17.62 * ((t) - T0) / (243.12 + (t) - T0)))

#define LOG (   level,
  ... 
)

} \

◆ buoyancy_frequency()

double buoyancy_frequency ( const double  p0,
const double  t0,
const double  p1,
const double  t1 
)

Calculate buoyancy frequency.

Definition at line 29 of file libtrac.c.

33 {
34
35 double theta0 = THETA(p0, t0);
36 double theta1 = THETA(p1, t1);
37 double dz = RI / MA / G0 * 0.5 * (t0 + t1) * (log(p0) - log(p1));
38
39 return sqrt(2. * G0 / (theta0 + theta1) * (theta1 - theta0) / dz);
40}

48 {
49
50 double radius = NORM(x);

52 *lon = atan2(x[1], x[0]) * 180. / M_PI;
53 *z = radius - RE;

◆ clim_oh()

double clim_oh ( const ctl_t *  ctl,
const clim_t *  clim,
const double  t,
const double  lon,
const double  lat,
const double  p 
)

Climatology of OH number concentrations.

Definition at line 58 of file libtrac.c.

64 {
65
66 /* Get OH data from climatology... */
67 double oh = clim_zm(&clim->oh, t, lat, p);
68
69 /* Apply diurnal correction... */
70 if (ctl->oh_chem_beta > 0) {
71 double sza = sza_calc(t, lon, lat);
72 if (sza <= M_PI / 2. * 85. / 90.)
73 return oh * exp(-ctl->oh_chem_beta / cos(sza));
74 else
75 return oh * exp(-ctl->oh_chem_beta / cos(M_PI / 2. * 85. / 90.));
76 } else
77 return oh;
78}

◆ clim_oh_diurnal_correction()

void clim_oh_diurnal_correction ( ctl_t *  ctl,
clim_t *  clim 
)

Initialization function for OH climatology.

Definition at line 82 of file libtrac.c.

84 {
85
86 /* Loop over climatology data points... */
87 for (int it = 0; it < clim->oh.ntime; it++)
88 for (int iz = 0; iz < clim->oh.np; iz++)
89 for (int iy = 0; iy < clim->oh.nlat; iy++) {
90
91 /* Init... */
92 int n = 0;
93 double sum = 0;
94
95 /* Integrate day/night correction factor over longitude... */
96 for (double lon = -180; lon < 180; lon += 1.0) {
97 double sza = sza_calc(clim->oh.time[it], lon, clim->oh.lat[iy]);
98 if (sza <= M_PI / 2. * 85. / 90.)
99 sum += exp(-ctl->oh_chem_beta / cos(sza));
100 else
101 sum += exp(-ctl->oh_chem_beta / cos(M_PI / 2. * 85. / 90.));
102 n++;
103 }
104
105 /* Apply scaling factor to OH data... */
106 clim->oh.vmr[it][iz][iy] /= (sum / (double) n);
107 }
108}

◆ clim_photo()

double clim_photo ( double  rate[CP][CSZA][CO3],
clim_photo_t *  photo,
double  p,
double  sza,
double  o3c 
)

Interpolate photolysis rate data.

Definition at line 112 of file libtrac.c.

117 {
118
119 /* Check pressure range... */
120 double p_help = p;
121 if (p < photo->p[photo->np - 1])
122 p_help = photo->p[photo->np - 1];
123 else if (p > photo->p[0])
124 p_help = photo->p[0];
125
126 /* Check sza range... */
127 double sza_help = sza;
128 if (sza < photo->sza[0])
129 sza_help = photo->sza[0];
130 else if (sza > photo->sza[photo->nsza - 1])
131 sza_help = photo->sza[photo->nsza - 1];
132
133 /* Check ozone column range... */
134 double o3c_help = o3c;
135 if (o3c < photo->o3c[0])
136 o3c_help = photo->o3c[0];
137 else if (o3c > photo->o3c[photo->no3c - 1])
138 o3c_help = photo->o3c[photo->no3c - 1];
139
140 /* Get indices... */
141 int ip = locate_irr(photo->p, photo->np, p_help);
142 int isza = locate_reg(photo->sza, photo->nsza, sza_help);
143 int io3c = locate_reg(photo->o3c, photo->no3c, o3c_help);
144
145 /* Interpolate photolysis rate... */
146 double aux00 = LIN(photo->p[ip], rate[ip][isza][io3c],
147 photo->p[ip + 1], rate[ip + 1][isza][io3c], p_help);
148 double aux01 = LIN(photo->p[ip], rate[ip][isza][io3c + 1],
149 photo->p[ip + 1], rate[ip + 1][isza][io3c + 1], p_help);
150 double aux10 = LIN(photo->p[ip], rate[ip][isza + 1][io3c],
151 photo->p[ip + 1], rate[ip + 1][isza + 1][io3c], p_help);
152 double aux11 = LIN(photo->p[ip], rate[ip][isza + 1][io3c + 1],
153 photo->p[ip + 1], rate[ip + 1][isza + 1][io3c + 1],
154 p_help);
155 aux00 = LIN(photo->o3c[io3c], aux00, photo->o3c[io3c + 1], aux01, o3c_help);
156 aux11 = LIN(photo->o3c[io3c], aux10, photo->o3c[io3c + 1], aux11, o3c_help);
157 aux00 = LIN(photo->sza[isza], aux00, photo->sza[isza + 1], aux11, sza_help);
158 return GSL_MAX(aux00, 0.0);
159}

◆ clim_tropo()

double clim_tropo ( const clim_t *  clim,
const double  t,
const double  lat 
)

Climatology of tropopause pressure.

Definition at line 163 of file libtrac.c.

166 {
167
168 /* Get seconds since begin of year... */
169 double sec = FMOD(t, 365.25 * 86400.);
170 while (sec < 0)
171 sec += 365.25 * 86400.;
172
173 /* Get indices... */
174 int isec = locate_irr(clim->tropo_time, clim->tropo_ntime, sec);
175 int ilat = locate_reg(clim->tropo_lat, clim->tropo_nlat, lat);
176
177 /* Interpolate tropopause pressure... */
178 double p0 = LIN(clim->tropo_lat[ilat],
179 clim->tropo[isec][ilat],
180 clim->tropo_lat[ilat + 1],
181 clim->tropo[isec][ilat + 1], lat);
182 double p1 = LIN(clim->tropo_lat[ilat],
183 clim->tropo[isec + 1][ilat],
184 clim->tropo_lat[ilat + 1],
185 clim->tropo[isec + 1][ilat + 1], lat);
186 return LIN(clim->tropo_time[isec], p0, clim->tropo_time[isec + 1], p1, sec);
187}

322 /* Get range... */
323 double tropomin = 1e99, tropomax = -1e99;
324 for (int it = 0; it < clim->tropo_ntime; it++)
325 for (int iy = 0; iy < clim->tropo_nlat; iy++) {
326 tropomin = GSL_MIN(tropomin, clim->tropo[it][iy]);
327 tropomax = GSL_MAX(tropomax, clim->tropo[it][iy]);
328 }
329
330 /* Write info... */
331 LOG(2, "Number of time steps: %d", clim->tropo_ntime);
332 LOG(2, "Time steps: %.2f, %.2f ... %.2f s",
333 clim->tropo_time[0], clim->tropo_time[1],
334 clim->tropo_time[clim->tropo_ntime - 1]);
335 LOG(2, "Number of latitudes: %d", clim->tropo_nlat);
336 LOG(2, "Latitudes: %g, %g ... %g deg",
337 clim->tropo_lat[0], clim->tropo_lat[1],
338 clim->tropo_lat[clim->tropo_nlat - 1]);
339 LOG(2, "Tropopause altitude range: %g ... %g hPa", Z(tropomax),
340 Z(tropomin));
341 LOG(2, "Tropopause pressure range: %g ... %g hPa", tropomin, tropomax);
342}

◆ clim_zm()

double clim_zm ( const clim_zm_t *  zm,
const double  t,
const double  lat,
const double  p 
)

Interpolate zonal mean climatology.

Definition at line 364 of file libtrac.c.

368 {
369
370 /* Get seconds since begin of year... */
371 double sec = FMOD(t, 365.25 * 86400.);
372 while (sec < 0)
373 sec += 365.25 * 86400.;
374
375 /* Check pressure range... */
376 double p_help = p;
377 if (p < zm->p[zm->np - 1])
378 p_help = zm->p[zm->np - 1];
379 else if (p > zm->p[0])
380 p_help = zm->p[0];
381
382 /* Check latitude range... */
383 double lat_help = lat;
384 if (lat < zm->lat[0])
385 lat_help = zm->lat[0];
386 else if (lat > zm->lat[zm->nlat - 1])
387 lat_help = zm->lat[zm->nlat - 1];
388
389 /* Get indices... */
390 int isec = locate_irr(zm->time, zm->ntime, sec);
391 int ilat = locate_reg(zm->lat, zm->nlat, lat_help);
392 int ip = locate_irr(zm->p, zm->np, p_help);
393
394 /* Interpolate climatology data... */
395 double aux00 = LIN(zm->p[ip], zm->vmr[isec][ip][ilat],
396 zm->p[ip + 1], zm->vmr[isec][ip + 1][ilat], p_help);
397 double aux01 = LIN(zm->p[ip], zm->vmr[isec][ip][ilat + 1],
398 zm->p[ip + 1], zm->vmr[isec][ip + 1][ilat + 1], p_help);
399 double aux10 = LIN(zm->p[ip], zm->vmr[isec + 1][ip][ilat],
400 zm->p[ip + 1], zm->vmr[isec + 1][ip + 1][ilat], p_help);
401 double aux11 = LIN(zm->p[ip], zm->vmr[isec + 1][ip][ilat + 1],
402 zm->p[ip + 1], zm->vmr[isec + 1][ip + 1][ilat + 1],
403 p_help);
404 aux00 = LIN(zm->lat[ilat], aux00, zm->lat[ilat + 1], aux01, lat_help);
405 aux11 = LIN(zm->lat[ilat], aux10, zm->lat[ilat + 1], aux11, lat_help);
406 aux00 = LIN(zm->time[isec], aux00, zm->time[isec + 1], aux11, sec);
407
408 return GSL_MAX(aux00, 0.0);
409}

◆ compress_pack()

void compress_pack ( char *  varname,
float *  array,
size_t  nxy,
size_t  nz,
int  decompress,
FILE *  inout 
)

Pack or unpack array.

Definition at line 413 of file libtrac.c.

419 {
420
421 double min[EP], max[EP], off[EP], scl[EP];
422
423 unsigned short *sarray;
424
425 /* Allocate... */
426 ALLOC(sarray, unsigned short,
427 nxy * nz);
428
429 /* Read compressed stream and decompress array... */
430 if (decompress) {
431
432 /* Write info... */
433 LOG(2, "Read 3-D variable: %s (pack, RATIO= %g %%)",
434 varname, 100. * sizeof(unsigned short) / sizeof(float));
435
436 /* Read data... */
437 FREAD(&scl, double,
438 nz,
439 inout);
440 FREAD(&off, double,
441 nz,
442 inout);
443 FREAD(sarray, unsigned short,
444 nxy * nz,
445 inout);
446
447 /* Convert to float... */
448#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
449 for (size_t ixy = 0; ixy < nxy; ixy++)
450 for (size_t iz = 0; iz < nz; iz++)
451 array[ixy * nz + iz]
452 = (float) (sarray[ixy * nz + iz] * scl[iz] + off[iz]);
453 }
454
455 /* Compress array and output compressed stream... */
456 else {
457
458 /* Write info... */
459 LOG(2, "Write 3-D variable: %s (pack, RATIO= %g %%)",
460 varname, 100. * sizeof(unsigned short) / sizeof(float));
461
462 /* Get range... */
463 for (size_t iz = 0; iz < nz; iz++) {
464 min[iz] = array[iz];
465 max[iz] = array[iz];
466 }
467 for (size_t ixy = 1; ixy < nxy; ixy++)
468 for (size_t iz = 0; iz < nz; iz++) {
469 if (array[ixy * nz + iz] < min[iz])
470 min[iz] = array[ixy * nz + iz];
471 if (array[ixy * nz + iz] > max[iz])
472 max[iz] = array[ixy * nz + iz];
473 }
474
475 /* Get offset and scaling factor... */
476 for (size_t iz = 0; iz < nz; iz++) {
477 scl[iz] = (max[iz] - min[iz]) / 65533.;
478 off[iz] = min[iz];
479 }
480
481 /* Convert to short... */
482#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
483 for (size_t ixy = 0; ixy < nxy; ixy++)
484 for (size_t iz = 0; iz < nz; iz++)
485 if (scl[iz] != 0)
486 sarray[ixy * nz + iz] = (unsigned short)
487 ((array[ixy * nz + iz] - off[iz]) / scl[iz] + .5);
488 else
489 sarray[ixy * nz + iz] = 0;
490
491 /* Write data... */
492 FWRITE(&scl, double,
493 nz,
494 inout);
495 FWRITE(&off, double,
496 nz,
497 inout);
498 FWRITE(sarray, unsigned short,
499 nxy * nz,
500 inout);
501 }
502
503 /* Free... */
504 free(sarray);
505}
FWRITE
#define FWRITE(ptr, type, size, out)

void day2doy ( const int  year,
const int  mon,
const int  day,

Compress or decompress array with zstd.

Get day of year from date.

Definition at line 654 of file libtrac.c.

658 {
659
660 const int
661 d0[12] = { 1, 32, 60, 91, 121, 152, 182, 213, 244, 274, 305, 335 },
662 d0l[12] = { 1, 32, 61, 92, 122, 153, 183, 214, 245, 275, 306, 336 };
663
664 /* Get day of year... */
665 if (year % 400 == 0 || (year % 100 != 0 && year % 4 == 0))
666 *doy = d0l[mon - 1] + day - 1;
667 else
668 *doy = d0[mon - 1] + day - 1;
669}

◆ doy2day()

void doy2day ( const int  year,
const int  doy,
int *  mon,
int *  day 
)

Get date from day of year.

Definition at line 673 of file libtrac.c.

677 {
678
679 const int
680 d0[12] = { 1, 32, 60, 91, 121, 152, 182, 213, 244, 274, 305, 335 },
681 d0l[12] = { 1, 32, 61, 92, 122, 153, 183, 214, 245, 275, 306, 336 };
682
683 int i;
684
685 /* Get month and day... */
686 if (year % 400 == 0 || (year % 100 != 0 && year % 4 == 0)) {
687 for (i = 11; i > 0; i--)
688 if (d0l[i] <= doy)
689 break;
690 *mon = i + 1;
691 *day = doy - d0l[i] + 1;
692 } else {
693 for (i = 11; i > 0; i--)
694 if (d0[i] <= doy)
695 break;
696 *mon = i + 1;
697 *day = doy - d0[i] + 1;
698 }
699}

707 {
708
709 double radius = z + RE;
710 x[0] = radius * cos(lat / 180. * M_PI) * cos(lon / 180. * M_PI);
711 x[1] = radius * cos(lat / 180. * M_PI) * sin(lon / 180. * M_PI);
712 x[2] = radius * sin(lat / 180. * M_PI);
713}

◆ get_met()

void get_met ( ctl_t *  ctl,
clim_t *  clim,
double  t,
met_t **  met0,
met_t **  met1 
)

Get meteo data for given time step.

Definition at line 717 of file libtrac.c.

722 {
723
724 static int init;
725
726 met_t *mets;
727
728 char cachefile[LEN], cmd[2 * LEN], filename[LEN];
729
730 /* Set timer... */
731 SELECT_TIMER("GET_MET", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
732
733 /* Init... */
734 if (t == ctl->t_start || !init) {
735 init = 1;
736
737 /* Read meteo data... */
738 get_met_help(ctl, t + (ctl->direction == -1 ? -1 : 0), -1,
739 ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met, filename);
740 if (!read_met(filename, ctl, clim, *met0))
741 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
742
743 get_met_help(ctl, t + (ctl->direction == 1 ? 1 : 0), 1,
744 ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met, filename);
745 if (!read_met(filename, ctl, clim, *met1))
746 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
747
748 /* Update GPU... */
749#ifdef _OPENACC
750 met_t *met0up = *met0;
751 met_t *met1up = *met1;
752#ifdef ASYNCIO
753#pragma acc update device(met0up[:1],met1up[:1]) async(5)
754#else
755#pragma acc update device(met0up[:1],met1up[:1])
756#endif
757#endif
758
759 /* Caching... */
760 if (ctl->met_cache && t != ctl->t_stop) {
761 get_met_help(ctl, t + 1.1 * ctl->dt_met * ctl->direction,
762 ctl->direction, ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met, cachefile);
763 sprintf(cmd, "cat %s > /dev/null &", cachefile);
764 LOG(1, "Caching: %s", cachefile);
765 if (system(cmd) != 0)
766 WARN("Caching command failed!");
767 }
768 }
769
770 /* Read new data for forward trajectories... */
771 if (t > (*met1)->time) {
772
773 /* Pointer swap... */
774 mets = *met1;
775 *met1 = *met0;
776 *met0 = mets;
777
778 /* Read new meteo data... */
779 get_met_help(ctl, t, 1, ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met, filename);
780 if (!read_met(filename, ctl, clim, *met1))
781 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
782
783 /* Update GPU... */
784#ifdef _OPENACC
785 met_t *met1up = *met1;
786#ifdef ASYNCIO
787#pragma acc update device(met1up[:1]) async(5)
788#else
789#pragma acc update device(met1up[:1])
790#endif
791#endif
792
793 /* Caching... */
794 if (ctl->met_cache && t != ctl->t_stop) {
795 get_met_help(ctl, t + ctl->dt_met, 1, ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met,
796 cachefile);
797 sprintf(cmd, "cat %s > /dev/null &", cachefile);
798 LOG(1, "Caching: %s", cachefile);
799 if (system(cmd) != 0)
800 WARN("Caching command failed!");
801 }
802 }
803 /* Read new data for backward trajectories... */
804 if (t < (*met0)->time) {
805
806 /* Pointer swap... */
807 mets = *met1;
808 *met1 = *met0;
809 *met0 = mets;
810
811 /* Read new meteo data... */
812 get_met_help(ctl, t, -1, ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met, filename);
813 if (!read_met(filename, ctl, clim, *met0))
814 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
815
816 /* Update GPU... */
817#ifdef _OPENACC
818 met_t *met0up = *met0;
819#ifdef ASYNCIO
820#pragma acc update device(met0up[:1]) async(5)
821#else
822#pragma acc update device(met0up[:1])
823#endif
824#endif
825
826 /* Caching... */
827 if (ctl->met_cache && t != ctl->t_stop) {
828 get_met_help(ctl, t - ctl->dt_met, -1, ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met,
829 cachefile);
830 sprintf(cmd, "cat %s > /dev/null &", cachefile);
831 LOG(1, "Caching: %s", cachefile);
832 if (system(cmd) != 0)
833 WARN("Caching command failed!");
834 }
835 }
836 /* Check that grids are consistent... */
837 if ((*met0)->nx != 0 && (*met1)->nx != 0) {
838 if ((*met0)->nx != (*met1)->nx
839 || (*met0)->ny != (*met1)->ny || (*met0)->np != (*met1)->np)
840 ERRMSG("Meteo grid dimensions do not match!");
841 for (int ix = 0; ix < (*met0)->nx; ix++)
842 if (fabs((*met0)->lon[ix] - (*met1)->lon[ix]) > 0.001)
843 ERRMSG("Meteo grid longitudes do not match!");
844 for (int iy = 0; iy < (*met0)->ny; iy++)
845 if (fabs((*met0)->lat[iy] - (*met1)->lat[iy]) > 0.001)
846 ERRMSG("Meteo grid latitudes do not match!");
847 for (int ip = 0; ip < (*met0)->np; ip++)
848 if (fabs((*met0)->p[ip] - (*met1)->p[ip]) > 0.001)
849 ERRMSG("Meteo grid pressure levels do not match!");
850 }
851}

void get_met_help ( ctl_t *  ctl,

861 {
862
863 char repl[LEN];
864
865 double t6, r;
866
867 int year, mon, day, hour, min, sec;
868
869 /* Round time to fixed intervals... */
870 if (direct == -1)
871 t6 = floor(t / dt_met) * dt_met;
872 else
873 t6 = ceil(t / dt_met) * dt_met;
874
875 /* Decode time... */
876 jsec2time(t6, &year, &mon, &day, &hour, &min, &sec, &r);
877
878 /* Set filename of MPTRAC meteo files... */
879 if (ctl->clams_met_data == 0) {
880 if (ctl->met_type == 0)
881 sprintf(filename, "%s_YYYY_MM_DD_HH.nc", metbase);
882 else if (ctl->met_type == 1)
883 sprintf(filename, "%s_YYYY_MM_DD_HH.bin", metbase);
884 else if (ctl->met_type == 2)
885 sprintf(filename, "%s_YYYY_MM_DD_HH.pck", metbase);
886 else if (ctl->met_type == 3)
887 sprintf(filename, "%s_YYYY_MM_DD_HH.zfp", metbase);
888 else if (ctl->met_type == 4)
889 sprintf(filename, "%s_YYYY_MM_DD_HH.zstd", metbase);
890 sprintf(repl, "%d", year);
891 get_met_replace(filename, "YYYY", repl);
892 sprintf(repl, "%02d", mon);
893 get_met_replace(filename, "MM", repl);
894 sprintf(repl, "%02d", day);
895 get_met_replace(filename, "DD", repl);
896 sprintf(repl, "%02d", hour);
897 get_met_replace(filename, "HH", repl);
898 }
899
900 /* Set filename of CLaMS meteo files... */
901 else {
902 sprintf(filename, "%s_YYMMDDHH.nc", metbase);
903 sprintf(repl, "%d", year);
904 get_met_replace(filename, "YYYY", repl);
905 sprintf(repl, "%02d", year % 100);
906 get_met_replace(filename, "YY", repl);
907 sprintf(repl, "%02d", mon);
908 get_met_replace(filename, "MM", repl);
909 sprintf(repl, "%02d", day);
910 get_met_replace(filename, "DD", repl);
911 sprintf(repl, "%02d", hour);
912 get_met_replace(filename, "HH", repl);
913 }

◆ get_met_replace()

void get_met_replace ( char *  orig,
char *  search,
char *  repl 
)

Replace template strings in filename.

Definition at line 918 of file libtrac.c.

921 {
922
923 char buffer[LEN];
924
925 /* Iterate... */
926 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
927
928 /* Replace sub-string... */
929 char *ch;
930 if (!(ch = strstr(orig, search)))
931 return;
932 strncpy(buffer, orig, (size_t) (ch - orig));
933 buffer[ch - orig] = 0;
934 sprintf(buffer + (ch - orig), "%s%s", repl, ch + strlen(search));
935 orig[0] = 0;
936 strcpy(orig, buffer);
937 }

◆ intpol_met_4d_coord()

void intpol_met_4d_coord ( met_t *  met0,
float  height0[EX][EY][EP],
float  array0[EX][EY][EP],
met_t *  met1,
float  height1[EX][EY][EP],
float  array1[EX][EY][EP],
double  ts,
double  height,
double  lon,
double  lat,
double *  var,
int *  ci,
double *  cw,
int  init 
)

Spatiotemporal interpolation of meteo data.

!

Definition at line 942 of file libtrac.c.

956 {
957
958 if (init) {
959
960 /* Restrict positions to coordinate range... */
961 lon = FMOD(lon, 360.);
962 if (met0->lon[met0->nx - 1] > 180 && lon < 0)
963 lon += 360;
964
965 /* Get horizontal indizes... */
966 ci[0] = locate_irr(met0->lon, met0->nx, lon);
967 ci[1] = locate_irr(met0->lat, met0->ny, lat);
968
969 /* Locate the vertical indizes for each edge of the column... */
970 int ind[2][4];
971 locate_vert(heights0, met0->npl, ci[0], ci[1], height, ind[0]);
972 locate_vert(heights1, met1->npl, ci[0], ci[1], height, ind[1]);
973
974 /* Find minimum and maximum indizes... */
975 ci[2] = ind[0][0];
976 int k_max = ind[0][0];
977 for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
978 for (int j = 0; j < 4; j++) {
979 if (ci[2] > ind[i][j])
980 ci[2] = ind[i][j];
981 if (k_max < ind[i][j])
982 k_max = ind[i][j];
983 }
984
985 /* Get weighting factors for time, longitude and latitude... */
986 cw[3] = (ts - met0->time) / (met1->time - met0->time);
987 cw[0] = (lon - met0->lon[ci[0]]) /
988 (met0->lon[ci[0] + 1] - met0->lon[ci[0]]);
989 cw[1] = (lat - met0->lat[ci[1]]) /
990 (met0->lat[ci[1] + 1] - met0->lat[ci[1]]);
991
992 /* Start determiniation of the altitude weighting factor... */
993 double height_top, height_bot;
994 double height00, height01, height10, height11, height0, height1;
995
996 /* Interpolate in time at the lowest level... */
997 height00 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2]]
998 - heights0[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2]])
999 + heights0[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2]];
1000 height01 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]]
1001 - heights0[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]])
1002 + heights0[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]];
1003 height10 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2]]
1004 - heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2]])
1005 + heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2]];
1006 height11 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]]
1007 - heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]])
1008 + heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]];
1009
1010 /* Interpolate in latitude direction... */
1011 height0 = cw[1] * (height01 - height00) + height00;
1012 height1 = cw[1] * (height11 - height10) + height10;
1013
1014 /* Interpolate in longitude direction... */
1015 height_bot = cw[0] * (height1 - height0) + height0;
1016
1017 /* Interpolate in time at the upper level... */
1018 height00 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1]
1019 - heights0[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1])
1020 + heights0[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1];
1021 height01 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1]
1022 - heights0[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1])
1023 + heights0[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1];
1024 height10 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1]
1025 - heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1])
1026 + heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1];
1027 height11 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1]
1028 - heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1])
1029 + heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1];
1030
1031 /* Interpolate in latitude direction... */
1032 height0 = cw[1] * (height01 - height00) + height00;
1033 height1 = cw[1] * (height11 - height10) + height10;
1034
1035 /* Interpolate in longitude direction... */
1036 height_top = cw[0] * (height1 - height0) + height0;
1037
1038 /* Search at higher levels if height is not in box... */
1039 while (((heights0[0][0][0] > heights0[0][0][1]) &&
1040 ((height_bot <= height) || (height_top > height))
1041 && (height_bot >= height) && (ci[2] < k_max))
1042 ||
1043 ((heights0[0][0][0] < heights0[0][0][1]) &&
1044 ((height_bot >= height) || (height_top < height))
1045 && (height_bot <= height) && (ci[2] < k_max))
1046 ) {
1047
1048 ci[2]++;
1049 height_bot = height_top;
1050
1051 /* Interpolate in time at the next level... */
1052 height00 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1]
1053 - heights0[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1])
1054 + heights0[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1];
1055 height01 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1]
1056 - heights0[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1])
1057 + heights0[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1];
1058 height10 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1]
1059 - heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1])
1060 + heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1];
1061 height11 = cw[3] * (heights1[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1]
1062 - heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1])
1063 + heights0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1];
1064
1065 /* Interpolate in latitude direction... */
1066 height0 = cw[1] * (height01 - height00) + height00;
1067 height1 = cw[1] * (height11 - height10) + height10;
1068
1069 /* Interpolate in longitude direction... */
1070 height_top = cw[0] * (height1 - height0) + height0;
1071 }
1072
1073 /* Get vertical weighting factors... */
1074 cw[2] = (height - height_bot)
1075 / (height_top - height_bot);
1076
1077 }
1078
1079 /* Calculate the needed array values... */
1080 double array000 = cw[3] * (array1[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2]]
1081 - array0[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2]])
1082 + array0[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2]];
1083 double array100 = cw[3] * (array1[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2]]
1084 - array0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2]])
1085 + array0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2]];
1086 double array010 = cw[3] * (array1[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]]
1087 - array0[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]])
1088 + array0[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]];
1089 double array110 = cw[3] * (array1[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]]
1090 - array0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]])
1091 + array0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2]];
1092 double array001 = cw[3] * (array1[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1]
1093 - array0[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1])
1094 + array0[ci[0]][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1];
1095 double array101 = cw[3] * (array1[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1]
1096 - array0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1])
1097 + array0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1]][ci[2] + 1];
1098 double array011 = cw[3] * (array1[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1]
1099 - array0[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1])
1100 + array0[ci[0]][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1];
1101 double array111 = cw[3] * (array1[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1]
1102 - array0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1])
1103 + array0[ci[0] + 1][ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1];
1104
1105 double array00 = cw[0] * (array100 - array000) + array000;
1106 double array10 = cw[0] * (array110 - array010) + array010;
1107 double array01 = cw[0] * (array101 - array001) + array001;
1108 double array11 = cw[0] * (array111 - array011) + array011;
1109
1110 double aux0 = cw[1] * (array10 - array00) + array00;
1111 double aux1 = cw[1] * (array11 - array01) + array01;
1112
1113 /* Interpolate vertically... */
1114 *var = cw[2] * (aux1 - aux0) + aux0;
1115
1116}

1129 {
1130
1131 /* Initialize interpolation... */
1132 if (init) {
1133
1134 /* Check longitude... */
1135 if (met->lon[met->nx - 1] > 180 && lon < 0)
1136 lon += 360;
1137
1138 /* Get interpolation indices... */
1139 ci[0] = locate_irr(met->p, met->np, p);
1140 ci[1] = locate_reg(met->lon, met->nx, lon);
1141 ci[2] = locate_reg(met->lat, met->ny, lat);
1142
1143 /* Get interpolation weights... */
1144 cw[0] = (met->p[ci[0] + 1] - p)
1145 / (met->p[ci[0] + 1] - met->p[ci[0]]);
1146 cw[1] = (met->lon[ci[1] + 1] - lon)
1147 / (met->lon[ci[1] + 1] - met->lon[ci[1]]);
1148 cw[2] = (met->lat[ci[2] + 1] - lat)
1149 / (met->lat[ci[2] + 1] - met->lat[ci[2]]);
1150 }
1151
1152 /* Interpolate vertically... */
1153 double aux00 =
1154 cw[0] * (array[ci[1]][ci[2]][ci[0]] - array[ci[1]][ci[2]][ci[0] + 1])
1155 + array[ci[1]][ci[2]][ci[0] + 1];
1156 double aux01 =
1157 cw[0] * (array[ci[1]][ci[2] + 1][ci[0]] -
1158 array[ci[1]][ci[2] + 1][ci[0] + 1])
1159 + array[ci[1]][ci[2] + 1][ci[0] + 1];
1160 double aux10 =
1161 cw[0] * (array[ci[1] + 1][ci[2]][ci[0]] -
1162 array[ci[1] + 1][ci[2]][ci[0] + 1])
1163 + array[ci[1] + 1][ci[2]][ci[0] + 1];
1164 double aux11 =
1165 cw[0] * (array[ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1][ci[0]] -
1166 array[ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1][ci[0] + 1])
1167 + array[ci[1] + 1][ci[2] + 1][ci[0] + 1];
1168
1169 /* Interpolate horizontally... */
1170 aux00 = cw[2] * (aux00 - aux01) + aux01;
1171 aux11 = cw[2] * (aux10 - aux11) + aux11;
1172 *var = cw[1] * (aux00 - aux11) + aux11;
1173}

1213 && isfinite(aux10) && isfinite(aux11)) {
1214 aux00 = cw[2] * (aux00 - aux01) + aux01;
1215 aux11 = cw[2] * (aux10 - aux11) + aux11;
1216 *var = cw[1] * (aux00 - aux11) + aux11;
1217 } else {
1218 if (cw[2] < 0.5) {
1219 if (cw[1] < 0.5)
1220 *var = aux11;
1221 else
1222 *var = aux01;
1223 } else {
1224 if (cw[1] < 0.5)
1225 *var = aux10;
1226 else
1227 *var = aux00;
1228 }

double kernel_weight ( const double  kz[EP],

Get weighting factor from kernel function.

1519 {
1520
1521 /* Check number of data points... */
1522 if (nk < 2)
1523 return 1.0;
1524
1525 /* Get altitude... */
1526 double z = Z(p);
1527
1528 /* Get weighting factor... */
1529 if (z < kz[0])
1530 return kw[0];
1531 else if (z > kz[nk - 1])
1532 return kw[nk - 1];

◆ lapse_rate()

double lapse_rate ( const double  t,
const double  h2o 
)

Calculate moist adiabatic lapse rate.

Definition at line 1541 of file libtrac.c.

1543 {
1544
1545 /*
1546 Calculate moist adiabatic lapse rate [K/km] from temperature [K]
1547 and water vapor volume mixing ratio [1].
1548
1549 Reference: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lapse_rate
1550 */
1551
1552 const double a = RA * SQR(t), r = SH(h2o) / (1. - SH(h2o));
1553
1554 return 1e3 * G0 * (a + LV * r * t) / (CPD * a + SQR(LV) * r * EPS);
1555}
SH
#define SH(h2o)
Compute specific humidity from water vapor volume mixing ratio.
Definition: libtrac.h:614
LV
#define LV
Latent heat of vaporization of water [J/kg].
Definition: libtrac.h:108
SQR
#define SQR(x)
Compute square of x.
Definition: libtrac.h:618
CPD
#define CPD
Specific heat of dry air at constant pressure [J/(kg K)].
Definition: libtrac.h:88

1626 760.6, 795.64, 827.776, 856.838, 882.791, 905.712, 925.757, 943.14,
1627 958.104, 972.495, 986.886, 1001.28, 1015.67, 1030.06, 1044.45
1628 };
1629
1630 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
1631 ctl->met_p[ctl->met_np - ip - 1] = press[ip];
1632
1633 } else {
1634 ERRMSG
1635 ("Definition does not exist, use 0 for l137, 1 for l91 or 2 for l60")
1636 }
1637
1638}

◆ locate_irr()

int locate_irr ( const double *  xx,
const int  n,
const double  x 
)

Find array index for irregular grid.

Definition at line 1642 of file libtrac.c.

1645 {
1646
1647 int ilo = 0;
1648 int ihi = n - 1;
1649 int i = (ihi + ilo) >> 1;
1650
1651 if (xx[i] < xx[i + 1])
1652 while (ihi > ilo + 1) {
1653 i = (ihi + ilo) >> 1;
1654 if (xx[i] > x)
1655 ihi = i;
1656 else
1657 ilo = i;
1658 } else
1659 while (ihi > ilo + 1) {
1660 i = (ihi + ilo) >> 1;
1661 if (xx[i] <= x)
1662 ihi = i;
1663 else
1664 ilo = i;
1665 }
1666
1667 return ilo;
1668}

const int  n,
const double  x 
)

Definition at line 1672 of file libtrac.c.

1675 {
1676
1677 /* Calculate index... */
1678 int i = (int) ((x - xx[0]) / (xx[1] - xx[0]));
1679
1680 /* Check range... */
1681 if (i < 0)
1682 return 0;
1683 else if (i > n - 2)
1684 return n - 2;
1685 else
1686 return i;
1687}

int locate_irr_3d ( float  profiles[EX][EY][EP],

locate the index in a column of a three dimensional array.

1473
1474 if (profiles[ind_lon][ind_lat][i] < profiles[ind_lon][ind_lat][i + 1])
1475 while (ihi > ilo + 1) {
1476 i = (ihi + ilo) >> 1;
1477 if (profiles[ind_lon][ind_lat][i] > x) {
1478 ihi = i;

1480 ilo = i;
1481 }

◆ nat_temperature()

double nat_temperature ( const double  p,
const double  h2o,
const double  hno3 
)

Calculate NAT existence temperature.

Definition at line 1691 of file libtrac.c.

1694 {
1695
1696 /* Check water vapor vmr... */
1697 double h2o_help = GSL_MAX(h2o, 0.1e-6);
1698
1699 /* Calculate T_NAT... */
1700 double p_hno3 = hno3 * p / 1.333224;
1701 double p_h2o = h2o_help * p / 1.333224;
1702 double a = 0.009179 - 0.00088 * log10(p_h2o);
1703 double b = (38.9855 - log10(p_hno3) - 2.7836 * log10(p_h2o)) / a;
1704 double c = -11397.0 / a;
1705 double tnat = (-b + sqrt(b * b - 4. * c)) / 2.;
1706 double x2 = (-b - sqrt(b * b - 4. * c)) / 2.;
1707 if (x2 > 0)
1708 tnat = x2;
1709
1710 return tnat;
1711}

◆ read_atm()

int read_atm ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
atm_t *  atm 
)

Read atmospheric data.

Definition at line 1715 of file libtrac.c.

1718 {
1719
1720 int result;
1721
1722 /* Set timer... */
1723 SELECT_TIMER("READ_ATM", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
1724
1725 /* Init... */
1726 atm->np = 0;
1727
1728 /* Write info... */
1729 LOG(1, "Read atmospheric data: %s", filename);
1730
1731 /* Read ASCII data... */
1732 if (ctl->atm_type == 0)
1733 result = read_atm_asc(filename, ctl, atm);
1734
1735 /* Read binary data... */
1736 else if (ctl->atm_type == 1)
1737 result = read_atm_bin(filename, ctl, atm);
1738
1739 /* Read netCDF data... */
1740 else if (ctl->atm_type == 2)
1741 result = read_atm_nc(filename, ctl, atm);
1742
1743 /* Read CLaMS data... */
1744 else if (ctl->atm_type == 3 || ctl->atm_type == 4)
1745 result = read_atm_clams(filename, ctl, atm);
1746
1747 /* Error... */
1748 else
1749 ERRMSG("Atmospheric data type not supported!");
1750
1751 /* Check result... */
1752 if (result != 1)
1753 return 0;
1754
1755 /* Check number of air parcels... */
1756 if (atm->np < 1)
1757 ERRMSG("Can not read any data!");
1758
1759 /* Write info... */
1760 double mini, maxi;
1761 LOG(2, "Number of particles: %d", atm->np);
1762 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->time, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
1763 LOG(2, "Time range: %.2f ... %.2f s", mini, maxi);
1764 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->p, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
1765 LOG(2, "Altitude range: %g ... %g km", Z(maxi), Z(mini));
1766 LOG(2, "Pressure range: %g ... %g hPa", maxi, mini);
1767 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->lon, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
1768 LOG(2, "Longitude range: %g ... %g deg", mini, maxi);
1769 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->lat, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
1770 LOG(2, "Latitude range: %g ... %g deg", mini, maxi);
1771 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
1772 char msg[LEN];
1773 sprintf(msg, "Quantity %s range: %s ... %s %s",
1774 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_format[iq],
1775 ctl->qnt_format[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
1776 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->q[iq], 1, (size_t) atm->np);
1777 LOG(2, msg, mini, maxi);
1778 }
1779
1780 /* Return success... */
1781 return 1;
1782}

◆ read_atm_asc()

int read_atm_asc ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
atm_t *  atm 
)

Read atmospheric data in ASCII format.

Definition at line 1786 of file libtrac.c.

1789 {
1790
1791 /* Open file... */
1792 FILE *in;
1793 if (!(in = fopen(filename, "r"))) {
1794 WARN("Cannot open file!");
1795 return 0;
1796 }
1797
1798 /* Read line... */
1799 char line[LEN];
1800 while (fgets(line, LEN, in)) {
1801
1802 /* Read data... */
1803 char *tok;
1804 TOK(line, tok, "%lg", atm->time[atm->np]);
1805 TOK(NULL, tok, "%lg", atm->p[atm->np]);
1806 TOK(NULL, tok, "%lg", atm->lon[atm->np]);
1807 TOK(NULL, tok, "%lg", atm->lat[atm->np]);
1808 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
1809 TOK(NULL, tok, "%lg", atm->q[iq][atm->np]);
1810
1811 /* Convert altitude to pressure... */
1812 atm->p[atm->np] = P(atm->p[atm->np]);
1813
1814 /* Increment data point counter... */
1815 if ((++atm->np) > NP)
1816 ERRMSG("Too many data points!");
1817 }
1818
1819 /* Close file... */
1820 fclose(in);
1821
1822 /* Return success... */
1823 return 1;
1824}

#define P(z)

◆ read_atm_bin()

int read_atm_bin ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
atm_t *  atm 
)

Read atmospheric data in binary format.

Definition at line 1828 of file libtrac.c.

1831 {
1832
1833 /* Open file... */
1834 FILE *in;
1835 if (!(in = fopen(filename, "r")))
1836 return 0;
1837
1838 /* Check version of binary data... */
1839 int version;
1840 FREAD(&version, int,
1841 1,
1842 in);
1843 if (version != 100)
1844 ERRMSG("Wrong version of binary data!");
1845
1846 /* Read data... */
1847 FREAD(&atm->np, int,
1848 1,
1849 in);
1850 FREAD(atm->time, double,
1851 (size_t) atm->np,
1852 in);
1853 FREAD(atm->p, double,
1854 (size_t) atm->np,
1855 in);
1856 FREAD(atm->lon, double,
1857 (size_t) atm->np,
1858 in);
1859 FREAD(atm->lat, double,
1860 (size_t) atm->np,
1861 in);
1862 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
1863 FREAD(atm->q[iq], double,
1864 (size_t) atm->np,
1865 in);
1866
1867 /* Read final flag... */
1868 int final;
1869 FREAD(&final, int,
1870 1,
1871 in);
1872 if (final != 999)
1873 ERRMSG("Error while reading binary data!");
1874
1875 /* Close file... */
1876 fclose(in);
1877
1878 /* Return success... */
1879 return 1;
1880}

◆ read_atm_clams()

int read_atm_clams ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
atm_t *  atm 
)

Read atmospheric data in CLaMS format.

Definition at line 1884 of file libtrac.c.

1887 {
1888
1889 int ncid, varid;
1890
1891 /* Open file... */
1892 if (nc_open(filename, NC_NOWRITE, &ncid) != NC_NOERR)
1893 return 0;
1894
1895 /* Get dimensions... */
1896 NC_INQ_DIM("NPARTS", &atm->np, 1, NP);
1897
1898 /* Get time... */
1899 if (nc_inq_varid(ncid, "TIME_INIT", &varid) == NC_NOERR) {
1900 NC(nc_get_var_double(ncid, varid, atm->time));
1901 } else {
1902 WARN("TIME_INIT not found use time instead!");
1903 double time_init;
1904 NC_GET_DOUBLE("time", &time_init, 1);
1905 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
1906 atm->time[ip] = time_init;
1907 }
1908 }
1909
1910 /* Read zeta coordinate, pressure is optional... */
1911 if (ctl->vert_coord_ap == 1) {
1912 NC_GET_DOUBLE("ZETA", atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta], 1);
1913 NC_GET_DOUBLE("PRESS", atm->p, 0);
1914 }
1915
1916 /* Read pressure, zeta coordinate is optional... */
1917 else {
1918 if (nc_inq_varid(ncid, "PRESS_INIT", &varid) == NC_NOERR) {
1919 NC(nc_get_var_double(ncid, varid, atm->p));
1920 } else {
1921 WARN("PRESS_INIT not found use PRESS instead!");
1922 nc_inq_varid(ncid, "PRESS", &varid);
1923 NC(nc_get_var_double(ncid, varid, atm->p));
1924 }
1925 }
1926
1927 /* Read longitude and latitude... */
1928 NC_GET_DOUBLE("LON", atm->lon, 1);
1929 NC_GET_DOUBLE("LAT", atm->lat, 1);
1930
1931 /* Close file... */
1932 NC(nc_close(ncid));
1933
1934 /* Return success... */
1935 return 1;
1936}

◆ read_clim()

void read_clim ( ctl_t *  ctl,
clim_t *  clim 
)

Read climatological data.

Definition at line 1973 of file libtrac.c.

1975 {
1976
1977 /* Set timer... */
1978 SELECT_TIMER("READ_CLIM", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
1979
1980 /* Init tropopause climatology... */
1981 clim_tropo_init(clim);
1982
1983 /* Read photolysis rates... */
1984 if (ctl->clim_photo[0] != '-')
1985 read_clim_photo(ctl->clim_photo, &clim->photo);
1986
1987 /* Read HNO3 climatology... */
1988 if (ctl->clim_hno3_filename[0] != '-')
1989 read_clim_zm(ctl->clim_hno3_filename, "HNO3", &clim->hno3);
1990
1991 /* Read OH climatology... */
1992 if (ctl->clim_oh_filename[0] != '-') {
1993 read_clim_zm(ctl->clim_oh_filename, "OH", &clim->oh);
1994 if (ctl->oh_chem_beta > 0)
1995 clim_oh_diurnal_correction(ctl, clim);
1996 }
1997
1998 /* Read H2O2 climatology... */
1999 if (ctl->clim_h2o2_filename[0] != '-')
2000 read_clim_zm(ctl->clim_h2o2_filename, "H2O2", &clim->h2o2);
2001
2002 /* Read HO2 climatology... */
2003 if (ctl->clim_ho2_filename[0] != '-')
2004 read_clim_zm(ctl->clim_ho2_filename, "HO2", &clim->ho2);
2005
2006 /* Read O(1D) climatology... */
2007 if (ctl->clim_o1d_filename[0] != '-')
2008 read_clim_zm(ctl->clim_o1d_filename, "O1D", &clim->o1d);
2009
2010 /* Read CFC-10 time series... */
2011 if (ctl->clim_ccl4_timeseries[0] != '-')
2012 read_clim_ts(ctl->clim_ccl4_timeseries, &clim->ccl4);
2013
2014 /* Read CFC-11 time series... */
2015 if (ctl->clim_ccl3f_timeseries[0] != '-')
2016 read_clim_ts(ctl->clim_ccl3f_timeseries, &clim->ccl3f);
2017
2018 /* Read CFC-12 time series... */
2019 if (ctl->clim_ccl2f2_timeseries[0] != '-')
2020 read_clim_ts(ctl->clim_ccl2f2_timeseries, &clim->ccl2f2);
2021
2022 /* Read N2O time series... */
2023 if (ctl->clim_n2o_timeseries[0] != '-')
2024 read_clim_ts(ctl->clim_n2o_timeseries, &clim->n2o);
2025
2026 /* Read SF6 time series... */
2027 if (ctl->clim_sf6_timeseries[0] != '-')
2028 read_clim_ts(ctl->clim_sf6_timeseries, &clim->sf6);
2029}

◆ read_clim_ts()

int read_clim_ts ( char *  filename,
clim_ts_t *  ts 
)

Read climatological time series.

Definition at line 2104 of file libtrac.c.

2106 {
2107
2108 /* Write info... */
2109 LOG(1, "Read climatological time series: %s", filename);
2110
2111 /* Open file... */
2112 FILE *in;
2113 if (!(in = fopen(filename, "r"))) {
2114 WARN("Cannot open file!");
2115 return 0;
2116 }
2117
2118 /* Read data... */
2119 char line[LEN];
2120 int nh = 0;
2121 while (fgets(line, LEN, in))
2122 if (sscanf(line, "%lg %lg", &ts->time[nh], &ts->vmr[nh]) == 2) {
2123
2124 /* Convert years to seconds... */
2125 ts->time[nh] = (ts->time[nh] - 2000.0) * 365.25 * 86400.;
2126
2127 /* Check data... */
2128 if (nh > 0 && ts->time[nh] <= ts->time[nh - 1])
2129 ERRMSG("Time series must be ascending!");
2130
2131 /* Count time steps... */
2132 if ((++nh) >= 1000)
2133 ERRMSG("Too many data points!");
2134 }
2135
2136 /* Close file... */
2137 fclose(in);
2138
2139 /* Check number of data points... */
2140 ts->ntime = nh;
2141 if (nh < 2)
2142 ERRMSG("Not enough data points!");
2143
2144 /* Write info... */
2145 LOG(2, "Number of time steps: %d", ts->ntime);
2146 LOG(2, "Time steps: %.2f, %.2f ... %.2f s", ts->time[0], ts->time[1],
2147 ts->time[nh - 1]);
2148 LOG(2, "Volume mixing ratio range: %g ... %g ppv",
2149 gsl_stats_min(ts->vmr, 1, (size_t) nh), gsl_stats_max(ts->vmr, 1,
2150 (size_t) nh));
2151
2152 /* Exit success... */
2153 return 1;
2154}

◆ read_clim_zm()

void read_clim_zm ( char *  filename,
char *  varname,
clim_zm_t *  zm 
)

Read climatological zonal means.

Definition at line 2158 of file libtrac.c.

2161 {
2162
2163 int ncid, varid, it, iy, iz, iz2, nt;
2164
2165 double *help, varmin = 1e99, varmax = -1e99;
2166
2167 /* Write info... */
2168 LOG(1, "Read %s data: %s", varname, filename);
2169
2170 /* Open netCDF file... */
2171 if (nc_open(filename, NC_NOWRITE, &ncid) != NC_NOERR) {
2172 WARN("%s climatology data are missing!", varname);
2173 return;
2174 }
2175
2176 /* Read pressure data... */
2177 NC_INQ_DIM("press", &zm->np, 2, CP);
2178 NC_GET_DOUBLE("press", zm->p, 1);
2179 if (zm->p[0] < zm->p[1])
2180 ERRMSG("Pressure data are not descending!");
2181
2182 /* Read latitudes... */
2183 NC_INQ_DIM("lat", &zm->nlat, 2, CY);
2184 NC_GET_DOUBLE("lat", zm->lat, 1);
2185 if (zm->lat[0] > zm->lat[1])
2186 ERRMSG("Latitude data are not ascending!");
2187
2188 /* Set time data (for monthly means)... */
2189 zm->ntime = 12;
2190 zm->time[0] = 1209600.00;
2191 zm->time[1] = 3888000.00;
2192 zm->time[2] = 6393600.00;
2193 zm->time[3] = 9072000.00;
2194 zm->time[4] = 11664000.00;
2195 zm->time[5] = 14342400.00;
2196 zm->time[6] = 16934400.00;
2197 zm->time[7] = 19612800.00;
2198 zm->time[8] = 22291200.00;
2199 zm->time[9] = 24883200.00;
2200 zm->time[10] = 27561600.00;
2201 zm->time[11] = 30153600.00;
2202
2203 /* Check number of timesteps... */
2204 NC_INQ_DIM("time", &nt, 12, 12);
2205
2206 /* Read data... */
2207 ALLOC(help, double,
2208 zm->nlat * zm->np * zm->ntime);
2209 NC_GET_DOUBLE(varname, help, 1);
2210 for (it = 0; it < zm->ntime; it++)
2211 for (iz = 0; iz < zm->np; iz++)
2212 for (iy = 0; iy < zm->nlat; iy++)
2213 zm->vmr[it][iz][iy] = help[ARRAY_3D(it, iz, zm->np, iy, zm->nlat)];
2214 free(help);
2215
2216 /* Fix data gaps... */
2217 for (it = 0; it < zm->ntime; it++)
2218 for (iy = 0; iy < zm->nlat; iy++)
2219 for (iz = 0; iz < zm->np; iz++) {
2220 if (zm->vmr[it][iz][iy] < 0) {
2221 for (iz2 = 0; iz2 < zm->np; iz2++)
2222 if (zm->vmr[it][iz2][iy] >= 0) {
2223 zm->vmr[it][iz][iy] = zm->vmr[it][iz2][iy];
2224 break;
2225 }
2226 for (iz2 = zm->np - 1; iz2 >= 0; iz2--)
2227 if (zm->vmr[it][iz2][iy] >= 0) {
2228 zm->vmr[it][iz][iy] = zm->vmr[it][iz2][iy];
2229 break;
2230 }
2231 }
2232 varmin = GSL_MIN(varmin, zm->vmr[it][iz][iy]);
2233 varmax = GSL_MAX(varmax, zm->vmr[it][iz][iy]);
2234 }
2235
2236 /* Close netCDF file... */
2237 NC(nc_close(ncid));
2238
2239 /* Write info... */
2240 LOG(2, "Number of time steps: %d", zm->ntime);
2241 LOG(2, "Time steps: %.2f, %.2f ... %.2f s",
2242 zm->time[0], zm->time[1], zm->time[zm->ntime - 1]);
2243 LOG(2, "Number of pressure levels: %d", zm->np);
2244 LOG(2, "Altitude levels: %g, %g ... %g km",
2245 Z(zm->p[0]), Z(zm->p[1]), Z(zm->p[zm->np - 1]));
2246 LOG(2, "Pressure levels: %g, %g ... %g hPa", zm->p[0],
2247 zm->p[1], zm->p[zm->np - 1]);
2248 LOG(2, "Number of latitudes: %d", zm->nlat);
2249 LOG(2, "Latitudes: %g, %g ... %g deg",
2250 zm->lat[0], zm->lat[1], zm->lat[zm->nlat - 1]);
2251 LOG(2, "%s concentration range: %g ... %g ppv", varname, varmin, varmax);
2252}

void read_clim_photo ( char *  filename,

Definition at line 2033 of file libtrac.c.

2035 {
2036
2037 int ncid, varid, ip, is, io;

2046 WARN("Photolysis rate data are missing!");
2047 return;

2050 /* Read pressure data... */
2051 NC_INQ_DIM("press", &photo->np, 2, CP);
2052 NC_GET_DOUBLE("press", photo->p, 1);
2053 if (photo->p[0] < photo->p[1])
2054 ERRMSG("Pressure data are not descending!");
2055
2056 /* Read total column ozone data... */
2057 NC_INQ_DIM("total_o3col", &photo->no3c, 2, CO3);
2058 NC_GET_DOUBLE("total_o3col", photo->o3c, 1);

2060 ERRMSG("Total column ozone data are not ascending!");

2070 photo->np * photo->nsza * photo->no3c);
2071 ALLOC(help2, double,
2072 photo->np * photo->nsza * photo->no3c);

2074 photo->np * photo->nsza * photo->no3c);
2075 ALLOC(help4, double,
2076 photo->np * photo->nsza * photo->no3c);

2078 NC_GET_DOUBLE("ccl4", help2, 1);
2079 NC_GET_DOUBLE("cfc11", help3, 1);
2080 NC_GET_DOUBLE("cfc12", help4, 1);

2082 for (is = 0; is < photo->nsza; is++)
2083 for (io = 0; io < photo->no3c; io++) {
2084 photo->n2o[ip][is][io] =
2085 help1[ARRAY_3D(ip, is, photo->nsza, io, photo->no3c)];
2086 photo->ccl4[ip][is][io] =
2087 help2[ARRAY_3D(ip, is, photo->nsza, io, photo->no3c)];
2088 photo->ccl3f[ip][is][io] =
2089 help3[ARRAY_3D(ip, is, photo->nsza, io, photo->no3c)];
2090 photo->ccl2f2[ip][is][io] =
2091 help4[ARRAY_3D(ip, is, photo->nsza, io, photo->no3c)];
2092 }
2093 free(help1);
2094 free(help2);
2095 free(help3);
2096 free(help4);
2097
2098 /* Close netCDF file... */
2099 NC(nc_close(ncid));
2100}

2461 SET_QNT(qnt_Csf6, "Csf6", "SF6 volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
2462 SET_QNT(qnt_aoa, "aoa", "age of air", "s")
2463 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "QNT_UNIT", iq, "", ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
2464 }
2465
2466 /* netCDF I/O parameters... */
2467 ctl->chunkszhint =
2468 (size_t) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHUNKSZHINT", -1, "163840000",
2469 NULL);
2470 ctl->read_mode =
2471 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "READMODE", -1, "0", NULL);
2472
2473 /* Vertical coordinates and velocities... */
2474 ctl->vert_coord_ap =
2475 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VERT_COORD_AP", -1, "0", NULL);
2476 ctl->vert_coord_met =
2477 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VERT_COORD_MET", -1, "0", NULL);
2478 if (ctl->vert_coord_ap == 1) {
2479 int error = 1;
2480 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
2481 if (strcmp(ctl->qnt_name[iq], "zeta") == 0) {
2482 error = 0;
2483 break;
2484 }
2485 }
2486 if (error == 1)
2487 ERRMSG("Please add zeta to your quantities for diabatic calculations.");
2488 }
2489 ctl->clams_met_data =
2490 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLAMS_MET_DATA", -1, "0", NULL);
2491 ctl->cpl_zeta_and_press_modules =
2492 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CPL_ZETA_PRESS_MODULES", -1, "1",
2493 NULL);
2494
2495 /* Time steps of simulation... */
2496 ctl->direction =
2497 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DIRECTION", -1, "1", NULL);
2498 if (ctl->direction != -1 && ctl->direction != 1)
2499 ERRMSG("Set DIRECTION to -1 or 1!");
2500 ctl->t_stop = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "T_STOP", -1, "1e100", NULL);
2501 ctl->dt_mod = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DT_MOD", -1, "180", NULL);
2502
2503 /* Meteo data... */
2504 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "METBASE", -1, "-", ctl->metbase);
2505 ctl->dt_met = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DT_MET", -1, "3600", NULL);
2506 ctl->met_convention =
2507 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CONVENTION", -1, "0", NULL);
2508 ctl->met_type =
2509 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TYPE", -1, "0", NULL);
2510 if (ctl->vert_coord_ap == 1 && ctl->met_type != 0)
2511 ERRMSG
2512 ("Please use meteorological files in netcdf format for diabatic calculations.");
2513 ctl->met_nc_scale =
2514 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_NC_SCALE", -1, "1", NULL);
2515 ctl->met_zfp_prec =
2516 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_ZFP_PREC", -1, "8", NULL);
2517 ctl->met_zfp_tol_t =
2518 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_ZFP_TOL_T", -1, "5.0", NULL);
2519 ctl->met_zfp_tol_z =
2520 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_ZFP_TOL_Z", -1, "0.5", NULL);
2521 ctl->met_dx = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_DX", -1, "1", NULL);
2522 ctl->met_dy = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_DY", -1, "1", NULL);
2523 ctl->met_dp = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_DP", -1, "1", NULL);
2524 if (ctl->met_dx < 1 || ctl->met_dy < 1 || ctl->met_dp < 1)
2525 ERRMSG("MET_DX, MET_DY, and MET_DP need to be greater than zero!");
2526 ctl->met_sx = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_SX", -1, "1", NULL);
2527 ctl->met_sy = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_SY", -1, "1", NULL);
2528 ctl->met_sp = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_SP", -1, "1", NULL);
2529 if (ctl->met_sx < 1 || ctl->met_sy < 1 || ctl->met_sp < 1)
2530 ERRMSG("MET_SX, MET_SY, and MET_SP need to be greater than zero!");
2531 ctl->met_detrend =
2532 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_DETREND", -1, "-999", NULL);
2533 ctl->met_np = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_NP", -1, "0", NULL);
2534 if (ctl->met_np > EP)
2535 ERRMSG("Too many levels!");
2536 ctl->press_level_def =
2537 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PRESS_LEVEL_DEF", -1, "-1", NULL);
2538 if (ctl->press_level_def >= 0) {
2539 level_definitions(ctl);
2540 } else {
2541 if (ctl->met_np > 0) {
2542 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
2543 ctl->met_p[ip] =
2544 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_P", ip, "", NULL);
2545 }
2546 }
2547 ctl->met_geopot_sx
2548 = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_GEOPOT_SX", -1, "-1", NULL);
2549 ctl->met_geopot_sy
2550 = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_GEOPOT_SY", -1, "-1", NULL);
2551 ctl->met_relhum
2552 = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_RELHUM", -1, "0", NULL);
2553 ctl->met_tropo =
2554 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO", -1, "3", NULL);
2555 if (ctl->met_tropo < 0 || ctl->met_tropo > 5)
2556 ERRMSG("Set MET_TROPO = 0 ... 5!");
2557 ctl->met_tropo_lapse =
2558 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO_LAPSE", -1, "2.0", NULL);
2559 ctl->met_tropo_nlev =
2560 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO_NLEV", -1, "20", NULL);
2561 ctl->met_tropo_lapse_sep =
2562 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO_LAPSE_SEP", -1, "3.0", NULL);
2563 ctl->met_tropo_nlev_sep =
2564 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO_NLEV_SEP", -1, "10",
2565 NULL);
2566 ctl->met_tropo_pv =
2567 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO_PV", -1, "3.5", NULL);
2568 ctl->met_tropo_theta =
2569 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO_THETA", -1, "380", NULL);
2570 ctl->met_tropo_spline =
2571 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO_SPLINE", -1, "1", NULL);
2572 ctl->met_cloud =
2573 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CLOUD", -1, "1", NULL);
2574 if (ctl->met_cloud < 0 || ctl->met_cloud > 3)
2575 ERRMSG("Set MET_CLOUD = 0 ... 3!");
2576 ctl->met_cloud_min =
2577 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CLOUD_MIN", -1, "0", NULL);
2578 ctl->met_dt_out =
2579 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_DT_OUT", -1, "0.1", NULL);
2580 ctl->met_cache =
2581 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CACHE", -1, "0", NULL);
2582
2583 /* Sorting... */
2584 ctl->sort_dt = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SORT_DT", -1, "-999", NULL);
2585
2586 /* Isosurface parameters... */
2587 ctl->isosurf =
2588 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ISOSURF", -1, "0", NULL);
2589 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BALLOON", -1, "-", ctl->balloon);
2590
2591 /* Advection parameters... */
2592 ctl->advect = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ADVECT", -1, "2", NULL);
2593 if (!(ctl->advect == 0 || ctl->advect == 1
2594 || ctl->advect == 2 || ctl->advect == 4))
2595 ERRMSG("Set ADVECT to 0, 1, 2, or 4!");
2596 ctl->reflect =
2597 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "REFLECT", -1, "0", NULL);
2598
2599 /* Diffusion parameters... */
2600 ctl->turb_dx_trop =
2601 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_DX_TROP", -1, "50", NULL);
2602 ctl->turb_dx_strat =
2603 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_DX_STRAT", -1, "0", NULL);
2604 ctl->turb_dz_trop =
2605 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_DZ_TROP", -1, "0", NULL);
2606 ctl->turb_dz_strat =
2607 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_DZ_STRAT", -1, "0.1", NULL);
2608 ctl->turb_mesox =
2609 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_MESOX", -1, "0.16", NULL);
2610 ctl->turb_mesoz =
2611 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_MESOZ", -1, "0.16", NULL);
2612

2614 ctl->conv_cape
2615 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CONV_CAPE", -1, "-999", NULL);
2616 ctl->conv_cin
2617 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CONV_CIN", -1, "-999", NULL);
2618 ctl->conv_dt = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CONV_DT", -1, "-999", NULL);
2619 ctl->conv_mix_bot
2620 = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CONV_MIX_BOT", -1, "1", NULL);
2621 ctl->conv_mix_top
2622 = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CONV_MIX_TOP", -1, "1", NULL);
2623
2624 /* Boundary conditions... */
2625 ctl->bound_mass =
2626 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_MASS", -1, "-999", NULL);
2627 ctl->bound_mass_trend =
2628 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_MASS_TREND", -1, "0", NULL);
2629 ctl->bound_vmr =
2630 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_VMR", -1, "-999", NULL);
2631 ctl->bound_vmr_trend =
2632 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_VMR_TREND", -1, "0", NULL);
2633 ctl->bound_lat0 =
2634 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_LAT0", -1, "-999", NULL);
2635 ctl->bound_lat1 =
2636 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_LAT1", -1, "-999", NULL);
2637 ctl->bound_p0 =
2638 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_P0", -1, "-999", NULL);
2639 ctl->bound_p1 =
2640 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_P1", -1, "-999", NULL);
2641 ctl->bound_dps =
2642 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_DPS", -1, "-999", NULL);
2643 ctl->bound_dzs =
2644 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_DZS", -1, "-999", NULL);
2645 ctl->bound_zetas =
2646 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_ZETAS", -1, "-999", NULL);
2647 ctl->bound_pbl =
2648 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_PBL", -1, "0", NULL);
2649
2650 /* Species parameters... */
2651 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SPECIES", -1, "-", ctl->species);
2652 if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "CF2Cl2") == 0) {
2653 ctl->molmass = 120.907;
2654 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 3e-5;
2655 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 3500.0;
2656 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "CFCl3") == 0) {
2657 ctl->molmass = 137.359;
2658 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1.1e-4;
2659 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 3300.0;
2660 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "CH4") == 0) {
2661 ctl->molmass = 16.043;
2662 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 2;
2663 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 2.45e-12;
2664 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 1775;
2665 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1.4e-5;
2666 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 1600.0;
2667 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "CO") == 0) {
2668 ctl->molmass = 28.01;
2669 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 3;
2670 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 6.9e-33;
2671 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 2.1;
2672 ctl->oh_chem[2] = 1.1e-12;
2673 ctl->oh_chem[3] = -1.3;
2674 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 9.7e-6;
2675 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 1300.0;
2676 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "CO2") == 0) {
2677 ctl->molmass = 44.009;
2678 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 3.3e-4;
2679 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 2400.0;
2680 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "H2O") == 0) {
2681 ctl->molmass = 18.01528;
2682 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "N2O") == 0) {
2683 ctl->molmass = 44.013;
2684 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 2.4e-4;
2685 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 2600.;
2686 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "NH3") == 0) {
2687 ctl->molmass = 17.031;
2688 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 2;
2689 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 1.7e-12;
2690 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 710;
2691 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 5.9e-1;
2692 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 4200.0;
2693 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "HNO3") == 0) {
2694 ctl->molmass = 63.012;
2695 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 2.1e3;
2696 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 8700.0;
2697 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "NO") == 0) {
2698 ctl->molmass = 30.006;
2699 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 3;
2700 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 7.1e-31;
2701 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 2.6;
2702 ctl->oh_chem[2] = 3.6e-11;
2703 ctl->oh_chem[3] = 0.1;
2704 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1.9e-5;
2705 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 1600.0;
2706 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "NO2") == 0) {
2707 ctl->molmass = 46.005;
2708 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 3;
2709 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 1.8e-30;
2710 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 3.0;
2711 ctl->oh_chem[2] = 2.8e-11;
2712 ctl->oh_chem[3] = 0.0;
2713 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1.2e-4;
2714 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 2400.0;
2715 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "O3") == 0) {
2716 ctl->molmass = 47.997;
2717 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 2;
2718 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 1.7e-12;
2719 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 940;
2720 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1e-4;
2721 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 2800.0;
2722 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "SF6") == 0) {
2723 ctl->molmass = 146.048;
2724 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 2.4e-6;
2725 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 3100.0;
2726 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "SO2") == 0) {
2727 ctl->molmass = 64.066;
2728 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 3;
2729 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 2.9e-31;
2730 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 4.1;
2731 ctl->oh_chem[2] = 1.7e-12;
2732 ctl->oh_chem[3] = -0.2;
2733 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1.3e-2;
2734 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 2900.0;
2735 }
2736
2737 /* Molar mass... */
2738 char defstr[LEN];
2739 sprintf(defstr, "%g", ctl->molmass);
2740 ctl->molmass = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MOLMASS", -1, defstr, NULL);
2741
2742 /* OH chemistry... */
2743 sprintf(defstr, "%d", ctl->oh_chem_reaction);
2744 ctl->oh_chem_reaction =
2745 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "OH_CHEM_REACTION", -1, defstr,
2746 NULL);
2747 for (int ip = 0; ip < 4; ip++) {
2748 sprintf(defstr, "%g", ctl->oh_chem[ip]);
2749 ctl->oh_chem[ip] =
2750 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "OH_CHEM", ip, defstr, NULL);
2751 }
2752 ctl->oh_chem_beta =
2753 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "OH_CHEM_BETA", -1, "0", NULL);
2754
2755 /* H2O2 chemistry... */
2756 ctl->h2o2_chem_reaction =
2757 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "H2O2_CHEM_REACTION", -1, "0", NULL);
2758
2759 /* KPP chemistry... */
2760 ctl->kpp_chem =
2761 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "KPP_CHEM", -1, "0", NULL);
2762
2763 /* First order tracer chemistry... */
2764 ctl->tracer_chem =
2765 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TRACER_CHEM", -1, "0", NULL);
2766
2767 /* Wet deposition... */
2768 for (int ip = 0; ip < 3; ip++) {
2769 sprintf(defstr, "%g", ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[ip]);
2770 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[ip] =
2771 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_IC_H", ip, defstr, NULL);
2772 }
2773 for (int ip = 0; ip < 1; ip++) {
2774 sprintf(defstr, "%g", ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[ip]);
2775 ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[ip] =
2776 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_BC_H", ip, defstr, NULL);
2777 }
2778 ctl->wet_depo_ic_a =
2779 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_IC_A", -1, "0", NULL);
2780 ctl->wet_depo_ic_b =
2781 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_IC_B", -1, "0", NULL);
2782 ctl->wet_depo_bc_a =
2783 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_BC_A", -1, "0", NULL);
2784 ctl->wet_depo_bc_b =
2785 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_BC_B", -1, "0", NULL);
2786 ctl->wet_depo_pre[0] =
2787 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_PRE", 0, "0.5", NULL);
2788 ctl->wet_depo_pre[1] =
2789 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_PRE", 1, "0.36", NULL);
2790 ctl->wet_depo_ic_ret_ratio =
2791 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_IC_RET_RATIO", -1, "1", NULL);
2792 ctl->wet_depo_bc_ret_ratio =
2793 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_BC_RET_RATIO", -1, "1", NULL);
2794
2795 /* Dry deposition... */
2796 ctl->dry_depo_vdep =
2797 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DRY_DEPO_VDEP", -1, "0", NULL);
2798 ctl->dry_depo_dp =
2799 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DRY_DEPO_DP", -1, "30", NULL);
2800
2801 /* Climatological data... */
2802 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_PHOTO", -1,
2803 "../../data/photolysis_rate.nc", ctl->clim_photo);
2804 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_HNO3_FILENAME", -1,
2805 "../../data/gozcards_HNO3.nc", ctl->clim_hno3_filename);
2806 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_OH_FILENAME", -1,
2807 "../../data/clams_radical_species_vmr.nc", ctl->clim_oh_filename);
2808 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_H2O2_FILENAME", -1,
2809 "../../data/cams_H2O2.nc", ctl->clim_h2o2_filename);
2810 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_HO2_FILENAME", -1,
2811 "../../data/clams_radical_species_vmr.nc", ctl->clim_ho2_filename);
2812 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_O1D_FILENAME", -1,
2813 "../../data/clams_radical_species_vmr.nc", ctl->clim_o1d_filename);
2814 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_CCL4_TIMESERIES", -1,
2815 "../../data/noaa_gml_ccl4.tab", ctl->clim_ccl4_timeseries);
2816 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_CCL3F_TIMESERIES", -1,
2817 "../../data/noaa_gml_cfc11.tab", ctl->clim_ccl3f_timeseries);
2818 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_CCL2F2_TIMESERIES", -1,
2819 "../../data/noaa_gml_cfc12.tab", ctl->clim_ccl2f2_timeseries);
2820 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_N2O_TIMESERIES", -1,
2821 "../../data/noaa_gml_n2o.tab", ctl->clim_n2o_timeseries);
2822 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_SF6_TIMESERIES", -1,
2823 "../../data/noaa_gml_sf6.tab", ctl->clim_sf6_timeseries);
2824
2825 /* Mixing... */
2826 ctl->mixing_dt =
2827 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_DT", -1, "3600.", NULL);
2828 ctl->mixing_trop =
2829 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_TROP", -1, "-999", NULL);
2830 ctl->mixing_strat =
2831 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_STRAT", -1, "-999", NULL);
2832 ctl->mixing_z0 =
2833 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_Z0", -1, "-5", NULL);
2834 ctl->mixing_z1 =
2835 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_Z1", -1, "85", NULL);
2836 ctl->mixing_nz =
2837 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_NZ", -1, "90", NULL);
2838 ctl->mixing_lon0 =
2839 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_LON0", -1, "-180", NULL);
2840 ctl->mixing_lon1 =
2841 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_LON1", -1, "180", NULL);
2842 ctl->mixing_nx =
2843 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_NX", -1, "360", NULL);
2844 ctl->mixing_lat0 =
2845 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_LAT0", -1, "-90", NULL);
2846 ctl->mixing_lat1 =
2847 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_LAT1", -1, "90", NULL);
2848 ctl->mixing_ny =
2849 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_NY", -1, "180", NULL);
2850
2851 /* Chemistry grid... */
2852 ctl->chemgrid_z0 =
2853 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_Z0", -1, "-5", NULL);
2854 ctl->chemgrid_z1 =
2855 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_Z1", -1, "85", NULL);
2856 ctl->chemgrid_nz =
2857 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_NZ", -1, "90", NULL);
2858 ctl->chemgrid_lon0 =
2859 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_LON0", -1, "-180", NULL);
2860 ctl->chemgrid_lon1 =
2861 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_LON1", -1, "180", NULL);
2862 ctl->chemgrid_nx =
2863 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_NX", -1, "360", NULL);
2864 ctl->chemgrid_lat0 =
2865 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_LAT0", -1, "-90", NULL);
2866 ctl->chemgrid_lat1 =
2867 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_LAT1", -1, "90", NULL);
2868 ctl->chemgrid_ny =
2869 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_NY", -1, "180", NULL);
2870
2871 /* Exponential decay... */
2872 ctl->tdec_trop = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TDEC_TROP", -1, "0", NULL);
2873 ctl->tdec_strat
2874 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TDEC_STRAT", -1, "0", NULL);
2875
2876 /* PSC analysis... */
2877 ctl->psc_h2o = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PSC_H2O", -1, "4e-6", NULL);
2878 ctl->psc_hno3 =
2879 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PSC_HNO3", -1, "9e-9", NULL);
2880
2881 /* Output of atmospheric data... */
2882 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_BASENAME", -1, "-", ctl->atm_basename);
2883 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_GPFILE", -1, "-", ctl->atm_gpfile);
2884 ctl->atm_dt_out =
2885 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_DT_OUT", -1, "86400", NULL);
2886 ctl->atm_filter =
2887 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_FILTER", -1, "0", NULL);
2888 ctl->atm_stride =
2889 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_STRIDE", -1, "1", NULL);
2890 ctl->atm_type =
2891 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_TYPE", -1, "0", NULL);
2892 ctl->atm_type_out =
2893 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_TYPE_OUT", -1, "-1", NULL);
2894 if (ctl->atm_type_out == -1)
2895 ctl->atm_type_out = ctl->atm_type;
2896
2897 /* Output of CSI data... */
2898 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_BASENAME", -1, "-", ctl->csi_basename);
2899 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_KERNEL", -1, "-", ctl->csi_kernel);
2900 ctl->csi_dt_out =
2901 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_DT_OUT", -1, "86400", NULL);
2902 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_OBSFILE", -1, "-", ctl->csi_obsfile);
2903 ctl->csi_obsmin =
2904 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_OBSMIN", -1, "0", NULL);
2905 ctl->csi_modmin =
2906 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_MODMIN", -1, "0", NULL);
2907 ctl->csi_z0 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_Z0", -1, "-5", NULL);
2908 ctl->csi_z1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_Z1", -1, "85", NULL);
2909 ctl->csi_nz = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_NZ", -1, "1", NULL);
2910 ctl->csi_lon0 =
2911 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_LON0", -1, "-180", NULL);
2912 ctl->csi_lon1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_LON1", -1, "180", NULL);
2913 ctl->csi_nx =
2914 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_NX", -1, "360", NULL);
2915 ctl->csi_lat0 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_LAT0", -1, "-90", NULL);
2916 ctl->csi_lat1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_LAT1", -1, "90", NULL);
2917 ctl->csi_ny =
2918 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_NY", -1, "180", NULL);
2919
2920 /* Output of ensemble data... */
2921 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ENS_BASENAME", -1, "-", ctl->ens_basename);
2922 ctl->ens_dt_out =
2923 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ENS_DT_OUT", -1, "86400", NULL);
2924
2925 /* Output of grid data... */
2926 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_BASENAME", -1, "-",
2927 ctl->grid_basename);
2928 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_KERNEL", -1, "-", ctl->grid_kernel);
2929 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_GPFILE", -1, "-", ctl->grid_gpfile);
2930 ctl->grid_dt_out =
2931 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_DT_OUT", -1, "86400", NULL);
2932 ctl->grid_sparse =
2933 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_SPARSE", -1, "0", NULL);
2934 ctl->grid_z0 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_Z0", -1, "-5", NULL);
2935 ctl->grid_z1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_Z1", -1, "85", NULL);
2936 ctl->grid_nz =
2937 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_NZ", -1, "1", NULL);
2938 ctl->grid_lon0 =
2939 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_LON0", -1, "-180", NULL);
2940 ctl->grid_lon1 =
2941 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_LON1", -1, "180", NULL);
2942 ctl->grid_nx =
2943 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_NX", -1, "360", NULL);
2944 ctl->grid_lat0 =
2945 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_LAT0", -1, "-90", NULL);
2946 ctl->grid_lat1 =
2947 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_LAT1", -1, "90", NULL);
2948 ctl->grid_ny =
2949 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_NY", -1, "180", NULL);
2950 ctl->grid_type =
2951 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_TYPE", -1, "0", NULL);
2952
2953 /* Output of profile data... */
2954 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_BASENAME", -1, "-",
2955 ctl->prof_basename);
2956 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_OBSFILE", -1, "-", ctl->prof_obsfile);
2957 ctl->prof_z0 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_Z0", -1, "0", NULL);
2958 ctl->prof_z1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_Z1", -1, "60", NULL);
2959 ctl->prof_nz =
2960 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_NZ", -1, "60", NULL);
2961 ctl->prof_lon0 =
2962 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_LON0", -1, "-180", NULL);
2963 ctl->prof_lon1 =
2964 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_LON1", -1, "180", NULL);
2965 ctl->prof_nx =
2966 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_NX", -1, "360", NULL);
2967 ctl->prof_lat0 =
2968 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_LAT0", -1, "-90", NULL);
2969 ctl->prof_lat1 =
2970 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_LAT1", -1, "90", NULL);
2971 ctl->prof_ny =
2972 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_NY", -1, "180", NULL);
2973
2974 /* Output of sample data... */
2975 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SAMPLE_BASENAME", -1, "-",
2976 ctl->sample_basename);
2977 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SAMPLE_KERNEL", -1, "-",
2978 ctl->sample_kernel);
2979 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SAMPLE_OBSFILE", -1, "-",
2980 ctl->sample_obsfile);
2981 ctl->sample_dx =
2982 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SAMPLE_DX", -1, "50", NULL);
2983 ctl->sample_dz =
2984 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SAMPLE_DZ", -1, "-999", NULL);
2985
2986 /* Output of station data... */
2987 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_BASENAME", -1, "-",
2988 ctl->stat_basename);
2989 ctl->stat_lon = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_LON", -1, "0", NULL);
2990 ctl->stat_lat = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_LAT", -1, "0", NULL);
2991 ctl->stat_r = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_R", -1, "50", NULL);
2992 ctl->stat_t0 =
2993 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_T0", -1, "-1e100", NULL);
2994 ctl->stat_t1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_T1", -1, "1e100", NULL);
2995
2996 /* Output of VTK data... */
2997 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_BASENAME", -1, "-", ctl->vtk_basename);
2998 ctl->vtk_dt_out =
2999 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_DT_OUT", -1, "86400", NULL);
3000 ctl->vtk_stride =
3001 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_STRIDE", -1, "1", NULL);
3002 ctl->vtk_scale =
3003 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_SCALE", -1, "1.0", NULL);
3004 ctl->vtk_offset =
3005 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_OFFSET", -1, "0.0", NULL);
3006 ctl->vtk_sphere =
3007 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_SPHERE", -1, "0", NULL);
3008}
