◆ read_kernel()

void read_kernel ( const char *  filename,
double  kz[EP],
double  kw[EP],
int *  nk 
)

Read kernel data file.

Definition at line 3012 of file libtrac.c.

3016 {
3017
3018 /* Write info... */
3019 LOG(1, "Read kernel function: %s", filename);
3020
3021 /* Open file... */
3022 FILE *in;
3023 if (!(in = fopen(filename, "r")))
3024 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
3025
3026 /* Read data... */
3027 char line[LEN];
3028 int n = 0;
3029 while (fgets(line, LEN, in))
3030 if (sscanf(line, "%lg %lg", &kz[n], &kw[n]) == 2) {
3031 if (n > 0 && kz[n] < kz[n - 1])
3032 ERRMSG("Height levels must be ascending!");
3033 if ((++n) >= EP)
3034 ERRMSG("Too many height levels!");
3035 }
3036
3037 /* Close file... */
3038 fclose(in);
3039
3040 /* Check number of data points... */
3041 *nk = n;
3042 if (n < 2)
3043 ERRMSG("Not enough height levels!");
3044
3045 /* Normalize kernel function... */
3046 double kmax = gsl_stats_max(kw, 1, (size_t) n);
3047 for (int iz = 0; iz < n; iz++)
3048 kw[iz] /= kmax;
3049}

◆ read_met()

int read_met ( char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
clim_t *  clim,
met_t *  met 
)

Read meteo data file.

Definition at line 3053 of file libtrac.c.

3057 {
3058
3059 /* Write info... */
3060 LOG(1, "Read meteo data: %s", filename);
3061
3062 /* Read netCDF data... */
3063 if (ctl->met_type == 0) {
3064
3065 int ncid;
3066
3067 /* Open netCDF file... */
3068 if (nc__open(filename, ctl->read_mode, &ctl->chunkszhint, &ncid) !=
3069 NC_NOERR) {
3070 WARN("Cannot open file!");
3071 return 0;
3072 }
3073
3074 /* Read coordinates of meteo data... */
3075 read_met_grid(filename, ncid, ctl, met);
3076
3077 /* Read meteo data on vertical levels... */
3078 read_met_levels(ncid, ctl, met);
3079
3080 /* Extrapolate data for lower boundary... */
3081 read_met_extrapolate(met);
3082
3083 /* Read surface data... */
3084 read_met_surface(ncid, met, ctl);
3085
3086 /* Create periodic boundary conditions... */
3087 read_met_periodic(met);
3088
3089 /* Downsampling... */
3090 read_met_sample(ctl, met);
3091
3092 /* Calculate geopotential heights... */
3093 read_met_geopot(ctl, met);
3094
3095 /* Calculate potential vorticity... */
3096 read_met_pv(met);
3097
3098 /* Calculate boundary layer data... */
3099 read_met_pbl(met);
3100
3101 /* Calculate tropopause data... */
3102 read_met_tropo(ctl, clim, met);
3103
3104 /* Calculate cloud properties... */
3105 read_met_cloud(ctl, met);
3106
3107 /* Calculate convective available potential energy... */
3108 read_met_cape(clim, met);
3109
3110 /* Calculate total column ozone... */
3111 read_met_ozone(met);
3112
3113 /* Detrending... */
3114 read_met_detrend(ctl, met);
3115
3116 /* Check meteo data and smooth zeta profiles ... */
3117 if (ctl->vert_coord_ap == 1)
3118 read_met_monotonize(met);
3119
3120 /* Close file... */
3121 NC(nc_close(ncid));
3122 }
3123
3124 /* Read binary data... */
3125 else if (ctl->met_type >= 1 && ctl->met_type <= 4) {
3126
3127 FILE *in;
3128
3129 double r;
3130
3131 int year, mon, day, hour, min, sec;
3132
3133 /* Set timer... */
3134 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_BIN", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
3135
3136 /* Open file... */
3137 if (!(in = fopen(filename, "r"))) {
3138 WARN("Cannot open file!");
3139 return 0;
3140 }
3141
3142 /* Check type of binary data... */
3143 int met_type;
3144 FREAD(&met_type, int,
3145 1,
3146 in);
3147 if (met_type != ctl->met_type)
3148 ERRMSG("Wrong MET_TYPE of binary data!");
3149
3150 /* Check version of binary data... */
3151 int version;
3152 FREAD(&version, int,
3153 1,
3154 in);
3155 if (version != 100 && version != 101)
3156 ERRMSG("Wrong version of binary data!");
3157
3158 /* Read time... */
3159 FREAD(&met->time, double,
3160 1,
3161 in);
3162 jsec2time(met->time, &year, &mon, &day, &hour, &min, &sec, &r);
3163 LOG(2, "Time: %.2f (%d-%02d-%02d, %02d:%02d UTC)",
3164 met->time, year, mon, day, hour, min);
3165 if (year < 1900 || year > 2100 || mon < 1 || mon > 12
3166 || day < 1 || day > 31 || hour < 0 || hour > 23)
3167 ERRMSG("Error while reading time!");
3168
3169 /* Read dimensions... */
3170 FREAD(&met->nx, int,
3171 1,
3172 in);
3173 LOG(2, "Number of longitudes: %d", met->nx);
3174 if (met->nx < 2 || met->nx > EX)
3175 ERRMSG("Number of longitudes out of range!");
3176
3177 FREAD(&met->ny, int,
3178 1,
3179 in);
3180 LOG(2, "Number of latitudes: %d", met->ny);
3181 if (met->ny < 2 || met->ny > EY)
3182 ERRMSG("Number of latitudes out of range!");
3183
3184 FREAD(&met->np, int,
3185 1,
3186 in);
3187 LOG(2, "Number of levels: %d", met->np);
3188 if (met->np < 2 || met->np > EP)
3189 ERRMSG("Number of levels out of range!");
3190
3191 /* Read grid... */
3192 FREAD(met->lon, double,
3193 (size_t) met->nx,
3194 in);
3195 LOG(2, "Longitudes: %g, %g ... %g deg",
3196 met->lon[0], met->lon[1], met->lon[met->nx - 1]);
3197
3198 FREAD(met->lat, double,
3199 (size_t) met->ny,
3200 in);
3201 LOG(2, "Latitudes: %g, %g ... %g deg",
3202 met->lat[0], met->lat[1], met->lat[met->ny - 1]);
3203
3204 FREAD(met->p, double,
3205 (size_t) met->np,
3206 in);
3207 LOG(2, "Altitude levels: %g, %g ... %g km",
3208 Z(met->p[0]), Z(met->p[1]), Z(met->p[met->np - 1]));
3209 LOG(2, "Pressure levels: %g, %g ... %g hPa",
3210 met->p[0], met->p[1], met->p[met->np - 1]);
3211
3212 /* Read surface data... */
3213 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->ps, "PS");
3214 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->ts, "TS");
3215 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->zs, "ZS");
3216 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->us, "US");
3217 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->vs, "VS");
3218 if (version == 101) {
3219 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->lsm, "LSM");
3220 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->sst, "SST");
3221 }
3222 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->pbl, "PBL");
3223 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->pt, "PT");
3224 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->tt, "TT");
3225 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->zt, "ZT");
3226 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->h2ot, "H2OT");
3227 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->pct, "PCT");
3228 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->pcb, "PCB");
3229 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->cl, "CL");
3230 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->plcl, "PLCL");
3231 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->plfc, "PLFC");
3232 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->pel, "PEL");
3233 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->cape, "CAPE");
3234 read_met_bin_2d(in, met, met->cin, "CIN");
3235
3236 /* Read level data... */
3237 read_met_bin_3d(in, ctl, met, met->z, "Z");
3238 read_met_bin_3d(in, ctl, met, met->t, "T");
3239 read_met_bin_3d(in, ctl, met, met->u, "U");
3240 read_met_bin_3d(in, ctl, met, met->v, "V");
3241 read_met_bin_3d(in, ctl, met, met->w, "W");
3242 read_met_bin_3d(in, ctl, met, met->pv, "PV");
3243 read_met_bin_3d(in, ctl, met, met->h2o, "H2O");
3244 read_met_bin_3d(in, ctl, met, met->o3, "O3");
3245 read_met_bin_3d(in, ctl, met, met->lwc, "LWC");
3246 read_met_bin_3d(in, ctl, met, met->iwc, "IWC");
3247 if (version == 101)
3248 read_met_bin_3d(in, ctl, met, met->cc, "CC");
3249
3250 /* Read final flag... */
3251 int final;
3252 FREAD(&final, int,
3253 1,
3254 in);
3255 if (final != 999)
3256 ERRMSG("Error while reading binary data!");
3257
3258 /* Close file... */
3259 fclose(in);
3260 }
3261
3262 /* Not implemented... */
3263 else
3264 ERRMSG("MET_TYPE not implemented!");
3265
3266 /* Copy wind data to cache... */
3267#ifdef UVW
3268#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
3269 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
3270 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
3271 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
3272 met->uvw[ix][iy][ip][0] = met->u[ix][iy][ip];
3273 met->uvw[ix][iy][ip][1] = met->v[ix][iy][ip];
3274 met->uvw[ix][iy][ip][2] = met->w[ix][iy][ip];
3275 }
3276#endif
3277
3278 /* Return success... */
3279 return 1;
3280}

3318 {
3319
3320 float *help;
3321
3322 /* Allocate... */
3323 ALLOC(help, float,
3324 EX * EY * EP);
3325
3326 /* Read uncompressed data... */
3327 if (ctl->met_type == 1) {
3328 LOG(2, "Read 3-D variable: %s (uncompressed)", varname);
3329 FREAD(help, float,
3330 (size_t) (met->nx * met->ny * met->np),
3331 in);
3332 }
3333
3334 /* Read packed data... */
3335 else if (ctl->met_type == 2)
3336 compress_pack(varname, help, (size_t) (met->ny * met->nx),
3337 (size_t) met->np, 1, in);
3338
3339 /* Read zfp data... */
3340 else if (ctl->met_type == 3) {
3341#ifdef ZFP
3342 int precision;
3343 FREAD(&precision, int,
3344 1,
3345 in);
3346
3347 double tolerance;
3348 FREAD(&tolerance, double,
3349 1,
3350 in);
3351
3352 compress_zfp(varname, help, met->np, met->ny, met->nx, precision,
3353 tolerance, 1, in);
3354#else
3355 ERRMSG("MPTRAC was compiled without zfp compression!");
3356#endif
3357 }
3358
3359 /* Read zstd data... */
3360 else if (ctl->met_type == 4) {
3361#ifdef ZSTD
3362 compress_zstd(varname, help, (size_t) (met->np * met->ny * met->nx), 1,
3363 in);
3364#else
3365 ERRMSG("MPTRAC was compiled without zstd compression!");
3366#endif
3367 }
3368
3369 /* Copy data... */
3370#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
3371 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
3372 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
3373 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)

3377 free(help);
3378}

◆ read_met_cape()

void read_met_cape ( clim_t *  clim,
met_t *  met 
)

Calculate convective available potential energy.

Definition at line 3382 of file libtrac.c.

3384 {
3385
3386 /* Set timer... */
3387 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_CAPE", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
3388 LOG(2, "Calculate CAPE...");
3389
3390 /* Vertical spacing (about 100 m)... */
3391 const double pfac = 1.01439, dz0 = RI / MA / G0 * log(pfac);
3392
3393 /* Loop over columns... */
3394#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
3395 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
3396 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
3397
3398 /* Get potential temperature and water vapor vmr at lowest 50 hPa... */
3399 int n = 0;
3400 double h2o = 0, t, theta = 0;
3401 double pbot = GSL_MIN(met->ps[ix][iy], met->p[0]);
3402 double ptop = pbot - 50.;
3403 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
3404 if (met->p[ip] <= pbot) {
3405 theta += THETA(met->p[ip], met->t[ix][iy][ip]);
3406 h2o += met->h2o[ix][iy][ip];
3407 n++;
3408 }
3409 if (met->p[ip] < ptop && n > 0)
3410 break;
3411 }
3412 theta /= n;
3413 h2o /= n;
3414
3415 /* Cannot compute anything if water vapor is missing... */
3416 met->plcl[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
3417 met->plfc[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
3418 met->pel[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
3419 met->cape[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
3420 met->cin[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
3421 if (h2o <= 0)
3422 continue;
3423
3424 /* Find lifted condensation level (LCL)... */
3425 ptop = P(20.);
3426 pbot = met->ps[ix][iy];
3427 do {
3428 met->plcl[ix][iy] = (float) (0.5 * (pbot + ptop));
3429 t = theta / pow(1000. / met->plcl[ix][iy], 0.286);
3430 if (RH(met->plcl[ix][iy], t, h2o) > 100.)
3431 ptop = met->plcl[ix][iy];
3432 else
3433 pbot = met->plcl[ix][iy];
3434 } while (pbot - ptop > 0.1);
3435
3436 /* Calculate CIN up to LCL... */
3437 INTPOL_INIT;
3438 double dcape, dz, h2o_env, t_env;
3439 double p = met->ps[ix][iy];
3440 met->cape[ix][iy] = met->cin[ix][iy] = 0;
3441 do {
3442 dz = dz0 * TVIRT(t, h2o);
3443 p /= pfac;
3444 t = theta / pow(1000. / p, 0.286);
3445 intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->t, p, met->lon[ix], met->lat[iy],
3446 &t_env, ci, cw, 1);
3447 intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->h2o, p, met->lon[ix], met->lat[iy],
3448 &h2o_env, ci, cw, 0);
3449 dcape = 1e3 * G0 * (TVIRT(t, h2o) - TVIRT(t_env, h2o_env)) /
3450 TVIRT(t_env, h2o_env) * dz;
3451 if (dcape < 0)
3452 met->cin[ix][iy] += fabsf((float) dcape);
3453 } while (p > met->plcl[ix][iy]);
3454
3455 /* Calculate level of free convection (LFC), equilibrium level (EL),
3456 and convective available potential energy (CAPE)... */
3457 dcape = 0;
3458 p = met->plcl[ix][iy];
3459 t = theta / pow(1000. / p, 0.286);
3460 ptop = 0.75 * clim_tropo(clim, met->time, met->lat[iy]);
3461 do {
3462 dz = dz0 * TVIRT(t, h2o);
3463 p /= pfac;
3464 t -= lapse_rate(t, h2o) * dz;
3465 double psat = PSAT(t);
3466 h2o = psat / (p - (1. - EPS) * psat);
3467 intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->t, p, met->lon[ix], met->lat[iy],
3468 &t_env, ci, cw, 1);
3469 intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->h2o, p, met->lon[ix], met->lat[iy],
3470 &h2o_env, ci, cw, 0);
3471 double dcape_old = dcape;
3472 dcape = 1e3 * G0 * (TVIRT(t, h2o) - TVIRT(t_env, h2o_env)) /
3473 TVIRT(t_env, h2o_env) * dz;
3474 if (dcape > 0) {
3475 met->cape[ix][iy] += (float) dcape;
3476 if (!isfinite(met->plfc[ix][iy]))
3477 met->plfc[ix][iy] = (float) p;
3478 } else if (dcape_old > 0)
3479 met->pel[ix][iy] = (float) p;
3480 if (dcape < 0 && !isfinite(met->plfc[ix][iy]))
3481 met->cin[ix][iy] += fabsf((float) dcape);
3482 } while (p > ptop);
3483
3484 /* Check results... */
3485 if (!isfinite(met->plfc[ix][iy]))
3486 met->cin[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
3487 }
3488}
clim_tropo
double clim_tropo(const clim_t *clim, const double t, const double lat)
Climatology of tropopause pressure.
Definition: libtrac.c:163
lapse_rate
double lapse_rate(const double t, const double h2o)
Calculate moist adiabatic lapse rate.
Definition: libtrac.c:1541
INTPOL_INIT
#define INTPOL_INIT
Initialize cache variables for interpolation.
Definition: libtrac.h:323
RH
#define RH(p, t, h2o)
Compute relative humidity over water.
Definition: libtrac.h:585
PSAT
#define PSAT(t)
Compute saturation pressure over water (WMO, 2018).
Definition: libtrac.h:572
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ read_met_cloud()

void read_met_cloud ( ctl_t *  ctl,
met_t *  met 
)

Calculate cloud properties.

Definition at line 3492 of file libtrac.c.

3494 {
3495
3496 /* Set timer... */
3497 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_CLOUD", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
3498 LOG(2, "Calculate cloud data...");
3499
3500 /* Loop over columns... */
3501#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
3502 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
3503 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
3504
3505 /* Init... */
3506 met->pct[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
3507 met->pcb[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
3508 met->cl[ix][iy] = 0;
3509
3510 /* Loop over pressure levels... */
3511 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np - 1; ip++) {
3512
3513 /* Check pressure... */
3514 if (met->p[ip] > met->ps[ix][iy] || met->p[ip] < P(20.))
3515 continue;
3516
3517 /* Check ice water and liquid water content... */
3518 if (met->iwc[ix][iy][ip] > ctl->met_cloud_min
3519 || met->lwc[ix][iy][ip] > ctl->met_cloud_min) {
3520
3521 /* Get cloud top pressure ... */
3522 met->pct[ix][iy]
3523 = (float) (0.5 * (met->p[ip] + (float) met->p[ip + 1]));
3524
3525 /* Get cloud bottom pressure ... */
3526 if (!isfinite(met->pcb[ix][iy]))
3527 met->pcb[ix][iy]
3528 = (float) (0.5 * (met->p[ip] + met->p[GSL_MAX(ip - 1, 0)]));
3529 }
3530
3531 /* Get cloud water... */
3532 met->cl[ix][iy] += (float)
3533 (0.5 * (met->iwc[ix][iy][ip] + met->iwc[ix][iy][ip + 1]
3534 + met->lwc[ix][iy][ip] + met->lwc[ix][iy][ip + 1])
3535 * 100. * (met->p[ip] - met->p[ip + 1]) / G0);
3536 }
3537 }
3538}

◆ read_met_detrend()

void read_met_detrend ( ctl_t *  ctl,
met_t *  met 
)

Apply detrending method to temperature and winds.

Definition at line 3542 of file libtrac.c.

3544 {
3545
3546 met_t *help;
3547
3548 /* Check parameters... */
3549 if (ctl->met_detrend <= 0)
3550 return;
3551
3552 /* Set timer... */
3553 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_DETREND", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
3554 LOG(2, "Detrend meteo data...");
3555
3556 /* Allocate... */
3557 ALLOC(help, met_t, 1);
3558
3559 /* Calculate standard deviation... */
3560 double sigma = ctl->met_detrend / 2.355;
3561 double tssq = 2. * SQR(sigma);
3562
3563 /* Calculate box size in latitude... */
3564 int sy = (int) (3. * DY2DEG(sigma) / fabs(met->lat[1] - met->lat[0]));
3565 sy = GSL_MIN(GSL_MAX(1, sy), met->ny / 2);
3566
3567 /* Calculate background... */
3568#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
3569 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++) {
3570 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
3571
3572 /* Calculate Cartesian coordinates... */
3573 double x0[3];
3574 geo2cart(0.0, met->lon[ix], met->lat[iy], x0);
3575
3576 /* Calculate box size in longitude... */
3577 int sx =
3578 (int) (3. * DX2DEG(sigma, met->lat[iy]) /
3579 fabs(met->lon[1] - met->lon[0]));
3580 sx = GSL_MIN(GSL_MAX(1, sx), met->nx / 2);
3581
3582 /* Init... */
3583 float wsum = 0;
3584 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
3585 help->t[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
3586 help->u[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
3587 help->v[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
3588 help->w[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
3589 }
3590
3591 /* Loop over neighboring grid points... */
3592 for (int ix2 = ix - sx; ix2 <= ix + sx; ix2++) {
3593 int ix3 = ix2;
3594 if (ix3 < 0)
3595 ix3 += met->nx;
3596 else if (ix3 >= met->nx)
3597 ix3 -= met->nx;
3598 for (int iy2 = GSL_MAX(iy - sy, 0);
3599 iy2 <= GSL_MIN(iy + sy, met->ny - 1); iy2++) {
3600
3601 /* Calculate Cartesian coordinates... */
3602 double x1[3];
3603 geo2cart(0.0, met->lon[ix3], met->lat[iy2], x1);
3604
3605 /* Calculate weighting factor... */
3606 float w = (float) exp(-DIST2(x0, x1) / tssq);
3607
3608 /* Add data... */
3609 wsum += w;
3610 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
3611 help->t[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->t[ix3][iy2][ip];
3612 help->u[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->u[ix3][iy2][ip];
3613 help->v[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->v[ix3][iy2][ip];
3614 help->w[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->w[ix3][iy2][ip];
3615 }
3616 }
3617 }
3618
3619 /* Normalize... */
3620 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
3621 help->t[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
3622 help->u[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
3623 help->v[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
3624 help->w[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
3625 }
3626 }
3627 }
3628
3629 /* Subtract background... */
3630#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(3)
3631 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
3632 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
3633 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
3634 met->t[ix][iy][ip] -= help->t[ix][iy][ip];
3635 met->u[ix][iy][ip] -= help->u[ix][iy][ip];
3636 met->v[ix][iy][ip] -= help->v[ix][iy][ip];
3637 met->w[ix][iy][ip] -= help->w[ix][iy][ip];
3638 }
3639
3640 /* Free... */
3641 free(help);
3642}

◆ read_met_extrapolate()

void read_met_extrapolate ( met_t *  met)

Extrapolate meteo data at lower boundary.

Definition at line 3646 of file libtrac.c.

3647 {
3648
3649 /* Set timer... */
3650 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_EXTRAPOLATE", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
3651 LOG(2, "Extrapolate meteo data...");
3652
3653 /* Loop over columns... */
3654#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
3655 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
3656 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
3657
3658 /* Find lowest valid data point... */
3659 int ip0;
3660 for (ip0 = met->np - 1; ip0 >= 0; ip0--)
3661 if (!isfinite(met->t[ix][iy][ip0])
3662 || !isfinite(met->u[ix][iy][ip0])
3663 || !isfinite(met->v[ix][iy][ip0])
3664 || !isfinite(met->w[ix][iy][ip0]))
3665 break;
3666
3667 /* Extrapolate... */
3668 for (int ip = ip0; ip >= 0; ip--) {
3669 met->t[ix][iy][ip] = met->t[ix][iy][ip + 1];
3670 met->u[ix][iy][ip] = met->u[ix][iy][ip + 1];
3671 met->v[ix][iy][ip] = met->v[ix][iy][ip + 1];
3672 met->w[ix][iy][ip] = met->w[ix][iy][ip + 1];
3673 met->h2o[ix][iy][ip] = met->h2o[ix][iy][ip + 1];
3674 met->o3[ix][iy][ip] = met->o3[ix][iy][ip + 1];
3675 met->lwc[ix][iy][ip] = met->lwc[ix][iy][ip + 1];
3676 met->iwc[ix][iy][ip] = met->iwc[ix][iy][ip + 1];
3677 met->cc[ix][iy][ip] = met->cc[ix][iy][ip + 1];
3678 }
3679 }

◆ read_met_geopot()

void read_met_geopot ( ctl_t *  ctl,
met_t *  met 
)

Calculate geopotential heights.

Definition at line 3684 of file libtrac.c.

3686 {
3687
3688 static float help[EP][EX][EY];
3689
3690 double logp[EP];
3691
3692 int dx = ctl->met_geopot_sx, dy = ctl->met_geopot_sy;
3693
3694 /* Set timer... */
3695 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_GEOPOT", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
3696 LOG(2, "Calculate geopotential heights...");
3697
3698 /* Calculate log pressure... */
3699#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
3700 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
3701 logp[ip] = log(met->p[ip]);
3702
3703 /* Apply hydrostatic equation to calculate geopotential heights... */
3704#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
3705 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
3706 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
3707
3708 /* Get surface height and pressure... */
3709 double zs = met->zs[ix][iy];
3710 double lnps = log(met->ps[ix][iy]);
3711
3712 /* Get temperature and water vapor vmr at the surface... */
3713 int ip0 = locate_irr(met->p, met->np, met->ps[ix][iy]);
3714 double ts = LIN(met->p[ip0], met->t[ix][iy][ip0], met->p[ip0 + 1],
3715 met->t[ix][iy][ip0 + 1], met->ps[ix][iy]);
3716 double h2os = LIN(met->p[ip0], met->h2o[ix][iy][ip0], met->p[ip0 + 1],
3717 met->h2o[ix][iy][ip0 + 1], met->ps[ix][iy]);
3718
3719 /* Upper part of profile... */
3720 met->z[ix][iy][ip0 + 1]
3721 = (float) (zs +
3722 ZDIFF(lnps, ts, h2os, logp[ip0 + 1],
3723 met->t[ix][iy][ip0 + 1], met->h2o[ix][iy][ip0 + 1]));
3724 for (int ip = ip0 + 2; ip < met->np; ip++)
3725 met->z[ix][iy][ip]
3726 = (float) (met->z[ix][iy][ip - 1] +
3727 ZDIFF(logp[ip - 1], met->t[ix][iy][ip - 1],
3728 met->h2o[ix][iy][ip - 1], logp[ip],
3729 met->t[ix][iy][ip], met->h2o[ix][iy][ip]));
3730
3731 /* Lower part of profile... */
3732 met->z[ix][iy][ip0]
3733 = (float) (zs +
3734 ZDIFF(lnps, ts, h2os, logp[ip0],
3735 met->t[ix][iy][ip0], met->h2o[ix][iy][ip0]));
3736 for (int ip = ip0 - 1; ip >= 0; ip--)
3737 met->z[ix][iy][ip]
3738 = (float) (met->z[ix][iy][ip + 1] +
3739 ZDIFF(logp[ip + 1], met->t[ix][iy][ip + 1],
3740 met->h2o[ix][iy][ip + 1], logp[ip],
3741 met->t[ix][iy][ip], met->h2o[ix][iy][ip]));
3742 }
3743
3744 /* Check control parameters... */
3745 if (dx == 0 || dy == 0)
3746 return;
3747
3748 /* Default smoothing parameters... */
3749 if (dx < 0 || dy < 0) {
3750 if (fabs(met->lon[1] - met->lon[0]) < 0.5) {
3751 dx = 3;
3752 dy = 2;
3753 } else {
3754 dx = 6;
3755 dy = 4;
3756 }
3757 }
3758
3759 /* Calculate weights for smoothing... */
3760 float ws[dx + 1][dy + 1];
3761#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
3762 for (int ix = 0; ix <= dx; ix++)
3763 for (int iy = 0; iy < dy; iy++)
3764 ws[ix][iy] = (1.0f - (float) ix / (float) dx)
3765 * (1.0f - (float) iy / (float) dy);
3766
3767 /* Copy data... */
3768#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(3)
3769 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
3770 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
3771 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
3772 help[ip][ix][iy] = met->z[ix][iy][ip];
3773
3774 /* Horizontal smoothing... */
3775#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(3)
3776 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
3777 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
3778 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
3779 float res = 0, wsum = 0;
3780 int iy0 = GSL_MAX(iy - dy + 1, 0);
3781 int iy1 = GSL_MIN(iy + dy - 1, met->ny - 1);
3782 for (int ix2 = ix - dx + 1; ix2 <= ix + dx - 1; ++ix2) {
3783 int ix3 = ix2;
3784 if (ix3 < 0)
3785 ix3 += met->nx;
3786 else if (ix3 >= met->nx)
3787 ix3 -= met->nx;
3788 for (int iy2 = iy0; iy2 <= iy1; ++iy2)
3789 if (isfinite(help[ip][ix3][iy2])) {
3790 float w = ws[abs(ix - ix2)][abs(iy - iy2)];
3791 res += w * help[ip][ix3][iy2];
3792 wsum += w;
3793 }
3794 }
3795 if (wsum > 0)
3796 met->z[ix][iy][ip] = res / wsum;
3797 else
3798 met->z[ix][iy][ip] = GSL_NAN;
3799 }
3800}

Calculate geopotential height difference.

3819 /* Set timer... */

3821 LOG(2, "Read meteo grid information...");
3822
3823 /* MPTRAC meteo files... */
3824 if (ctl->clams_met_data == 0) {
3825
3826 /* Get time from filename... */
3827 met->time = time_from_filename(filename, 16);
3828
3829 /* Check time information from data file... */
3830 jsec2time(met->time, &year, &mon, &day, &hour, &min, &sec, &r);
3831 if (nc_inq_varid(ncid, "time", &varid) == NC_NOERR) {
3832 NC(nc_get_var_double(ncid, varid, &rtime));
3833 if (fabs(year * 10000. + mon * 100. + day + hour / 24. - rtime) > 1.0)
3834 WARN("Time information in meteo file does not match filename!");
3835 } else
3836 WARN("Time information in meteo file is missing!");
3837 }
3838
3839 /* CLaMS meteo files... */
3840 else {
3841
3842 /* Read time from file... */
3843 NC_GET_DOUBLE("time", &rtime, 0);
3844
3845 /* Get time from filename (considering the century)... */
3846 if (rtime < 0)
3847 sprintf(tstr, "19%.2s", &filename[strlen(filename) - 11]);
3848 else
3849 sprintf(tstr, "20%.2s", &filename[strlen(filename) - 11]);
3850 year = atoi(tstr);
3851 sprintf(tstr, "%.2s", &filename[strlen(filename) - 9]);
3852 mon = atoi(tstr);
3853 sprintf(tstr, "%.2s", &filename[strlen(filename) - 7]);
3854 day = atoi(tstr);
3855 sprintf(tstr, "%.2s", &filename[strlen(filename) - 5]);
3856 hour = atoi(tstr);
3857 time2jsec(year, mon, day, hour, 0, 0, 0, &met->time);
3858 }
3859
3860 /* Check time... */
3861 if (year < 1900 || year > 2100 || mon < 1 || mon > 12
3862 || day < 1 || day > 31 || hour < 0 || hour > 23)
3863 ERRMSG("Cannot read time from filename!");
3864 jsec2time(met->time, &year2, &mon2, &day2, &hour2, &min2, &sec2, &r2);
3865 LOG(2, "Time: %.2f (%d-%02d-%02d, %02d:%02d UTC)",
3866 met->time, year2, mon2, day2, hour2, min2);
3867
3868 /* Get grid dimensions... */
3869 NC_INQ_DIM("lon", &met->nx, 2, EX);
3870 LOG(2, "Number of longitudes: %d", met->nx);
3871
3872 NC_INQ_DIM("lat", &met->ny, 2, EY);
3873 LOG(2, "Number of latitudes: %d", met->ny);
3874
3875 if (ctl->vert_coord_met == 0) {
3876 int dimid;
3877 sprintf(levname, "lev");
3878 if (nc_inq_dimid(ncid, levname, &dimid) != NC_NOERR)
3879 sprintf(levname, "plev");
3880 } else {
3881 sprintf(levname, "hybrid");
3882 NC_GET_DOUBLE(levname, met->hybrid, 1);
3883 printf("Meteorological data is in hybrid coordinates.");
3884 }
3885
3886 NC_INQ_DIM(levname, &met->np, 1, EP);
3887 if (met->np == 1) {
3888 int dimid;
3889 sprintf(levname, "lev_2");
3890 if (nc_inq_dimid(ncid, levname, &dimid) != NC_NOERR) {
3891 sprintf(levname, "plev");
3892 NC(nc_inq_dimid(ncid, levname, &dimid));
3893 }
3894 NC(nc_inq_dimlen(ncid, dimid, &np));
3895 met->np = (int) np;
3896 }
3897 LOG(2, "Number of levels: %d", met->np);
3898 if (met->np < 2 || met->np > EP)
3899 ERRMSG("Number of levels out of range!");
3900
3901 /* Read longitudes and latitudes... */
3902 NC_GET_DOUBLE("lon", met->lon, 1);
3903 LOG(2, "Longitudes: %g, %g ... %g deg",
3904 met->lon[0], met->lon[1], met->lon[met->nx - 1]);
3905 NC_GET_DOUBLE("lat", met->lat, 1);
3906 LOG(2, "Latitudes: %g, %g ... %g deg",
3907 met->lat[0], met->lat[1], met->lat[met->ny - 1]);
3908
3909 /* Read pressure levels... */
3910 if (ctl->met_np <= 0) {
3911 NC_GET_DOUBLE(levname, met->p, 1);
3912 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
3913 met->p[ip] /= 100.;
3914 LOG(2, "Altitude levels: %g, %g ... %g km",
3915 Z(met->p[0]), Z(met->p[1]), Z(met->p[met->np - 1]));
3916 LOG(2, "Pressure levels: %g, %g ... %g hPa",
3917 met->p[0], met->p[1], met->p[met->np - 1]);
3918 }
3919}

3928 /* Set timer... */
3929 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_LEVELS", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
3930 LOG(2, "Read level data...");
3931
3932 /* MPTRAC meteo data... */
3933 if (ctl->clams_met_data == 0) {
3934
3935 /* Read meteo data... */
3936 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "t", "T", ctl, met, met->t, 1.0, 1))
3937 ERRMSG("Cannot read temperature!");
3938 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "u", "U", ctl, met, met->u, 1.0, 1))
3939 ERRMSG("Cannot read zonal wind!");
3940 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "v", "V", ctl, met, met->v, 1.0, 1))
3941 ERRMSG("Cannot read meridional wind!");
3942 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "w", "W", ctl, met, met->w, 0.01f, 1))
3943 WARN("Cannot read vertical velocity!");
3944 if (!read_met_nc_3d
3945 (ncid, "q", "Q", ctl, met, met->h2o, (float) (MA / MH2O), 1))
3946 WARN("Cannot read specific humidity!");
3947 if (ctl->met_relhum) {
3948 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "rh", "RH", ctl, met, met->h2o, 0.01f, 1))
3949 WARN("Cannot read relative humidity!");
3950#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
3951 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
3952 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
3953 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
3954 double pw = met->h2o[ix][iy][ip] * PSAT(met->t[ix][iy][ip]);
3955 met->h2o[ix][iy][ip] =
3956 (float) (pw / (met->p[ip] - (1.0 - EPS) * pw));
3957 }
3958 }
3959 if (!read_met_nc_3d
3960 (ncid, "o3", "O3", ctl, met, met->o3, (float) (MA / MO3), 1))
3961 WARN("Cannot read ozone data!");
3962 if (ctl->met_cloud == 1 || ctl->met_cloud == 3) {
3963 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "clwc", "CLWC", ctl, met, met->lwc, 1.0, 1))
3964 WARN("Cannot read cloud liquid water content!");
3965 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "ciwc", "CIWC", ctl, met, met->iwc, 1.0, 1))
3966 WARN("Cannot read cloud ice water content!");
3967 }
3968 if (ctl->met_cloud == 2 || ctl->met_cloud == 3) {
3969 if (!read_met_nc_3d
3970 (ncid, "crwc", "CRWC", ctl, met, met->lwc, 1.0,
3971 ctl->met_cloud == 2))
3972 WARN("Cannot read cloud rain water content!");
3973 if (!read_met_nc_3d
3974 (ncid, "cswc", "CSWC", ctl, met, met->iwc, 1.0,
3975 ctl->met_cloud == 2))
3976 WARN("Cannot read cloud snow water content!");
3977 }
3978 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "cc", "CC", ctl, met, met->cc, 1.0, 1))
3979 WARN("Cannot read cloud cover!");
3980
3981
3982 }
3983
3984 /* CLaMS meteo data... */
3985 else if (ctl->clams_met_data == 1) {
3986
3987 /* Read meteorological data... */
3988 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "t", "TEMP", ctl, met, met->t, 1.0, 1))
3989 ERRMSG("Cannot read temperature!");
3990 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "u", "U", ctl, met, met->u, 1.0, 1))
3991 ERRMSG("Cannot read zonal wind!");
3992 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "v", "V", ctl, met, met->v, 1.0, 1))
3993 ERRMSG("Cannot read meridional wind!");
3994 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "W", "OMEGA", ctl, met, met->w, 0.01f, 1))
3995 WARN("Cannot read vertical velocity!");
3996 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "ZETA", "zeta", ctl, met, met->zeta, 1.0, 1))
3997 WARN("Cannot read ZETA in meteo data!");
3998 if (ctl->vert_coord_ap == 1) {
3999 if (!read_met_nc_3d
4000 (ncid, "ZETA_DOT_TOT", "zeta_dot_clr", ctl, met, met->zeta_dot,
4001 0.00001157407f, 1)) {
4002 if (!read_met_nc_3d
4003 (ncid, "ZETA_DOT_TOT", "ZETA_DOT_clr", ctl, met, met->zeta_dot,
4004 0.00001157407f, 1)) {
4005 WARN("Cannot read vertical velocity!");
4006 }
4007 }
4008 }
4009 if (!read_met_nc_3d
4010 (ncid, "sh", "SH", ctl, met, met->h2o, (float) (MA / MH2O), 1))
4011 WARN("Cannot read specific humidity!");
4012 if (!read_met_nc_3d
4013 (ncid, "o3", "O3", ctl, met, met->o3, (float) (MA / MO3), 1))
4014 WARN("Cannot read ozone data!");
4015 if (ctl->met_cloud == 1 || ctl->met_cloud == 3) {
4016 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "clwc", "CLWC", ctl, met, met->lwc, 1.0, 1))
4017 WARN("Cannot read cloud liquid water content!");
4018 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "ciwc", "CIWC", ctl, met, met->iwc, 1.0, 1))
4019 WARN("Cannot read cloud ice water content!");
4020 }
4021 if (ctl->met_cloud == 2 || ctl->met_cloud == 3) {
4022 if (!read_met_nc_3d
4023 (ncid, "crwc", "CRWC", ctl, met, met->lwc, 1.0,
4024 ctl->met_cloud == 2))
4025 WARN("Cannot read cloud rain water content!");
4026 if (!read_met_nc_3d
4027 (ncid, "cswc", "CSWC", ctl, met, met->iwc, 1.0,
4028 ctl->met_cloud == 2))
4029 WARN("Cannot read cloud snow water content!");
4030 }
4031 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "cc", "CC", ctl, met, met->cc, 1.0, 1))
4032 WARN("Cannot read cloud cover!");
4033
4034 } else
4035 ERRMSG("Meteo data format unknown!");
4036
4037 if (ctl->vert_coord_ap == 1) {
4038 /* Store the velocities on model levels for diabatic advection... */
4039 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4040 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
4041 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
4042 met->ul[ix][iy][ip] = met->u[ix][iy][ip];
4043 met->vl[ix][iy][ip] = met->v[ix][iy][ip];
4044 met->zetal[ix][iy][ip] = met->zeta[ix][iy][ip];
4045 met->zeta_dotl[ix][iy][ip] = met->zeta_dot[ix][iy][ip];
4046 }
4047 /* Original number of vertical levels... */
4048 met->npl = met->np;
4049 }
4050
4051 if (ctl->met_np > 0 || ctl->vert_coord_ap == 1) {
4052 /* Read pressure on model levels... */
4053 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "pl", "PL", ctl, met, met->pl, 0.01f, 1))
4054 if (!read_met_nc_3d(ncid, "pl", "PRESS", ctl, met, met->pl, 1.0, 1))
4055 ERRMSG("Cannot read pressure on model levels!");
4056 }
4057
4058 /* Transfer from model levels to pressure levels... */
4059 if (ctl->met_np > 0) {
4060
4061 /* Vertical interpolation from model to pressure levels... */
4062 read_met_ml2pl(ctl, met, met->t);
4063 read_met_ml2pl(ctl, met, met->u);
4064 read_met_ml2pl(ctl, met, met->v);
4065 read_met_ml2pl(ctl, met, met->w);
4066 read_met_ml2pl(ctl, met, met->h2o);
4067 read_met_ml2pl(ctl, met, met->o3);
4068 read_met_ml2pl(ctl, met, met->lwc);
4069 read_met_ml2pl(ctl, met, met->iwc);
4070 read_met_ml2pl(ctl, met, met->cc);
4071
4072 /* Set new pressure levels... */
4073 met->np = ctl->met_np;
4074 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
4075 met->p[ip] = ctl->met_p[ip];
4076 }
4077
4078 /* Check ordering of pressure levels... */
4079 for (int ip = 1; ip < met->np; ip++)
4080 if (met->p[ip - 1] < met->p[ip])
4081 ERRMSG("Pressure levels must be descending!");
4082
4083}

◆ read_met_monotonize()

void read_met_monotonize ( met_t *  met)

Smooth vertical zeta and pressure profiles.

Definition at line 4128 of file libtrac.c.

4129 {
4130
4131 /* Set timer... */
4132 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_MONOTONIZE", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
4133 LOG(2, "Make zeta profiles monotone...");
4134
4135 /* Create monotone zeta profiles... */
4136#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
4137 for (int i = 0; i < met->nx; i++)
4138 for (int j = 0; j < met->ny; j++) {
4139 int k = 1;
4140
4141 while (k < met->npl) { /* Check if there is an inversion at level k... */
4142 if ((met->zetal[i][j][k - 1] >= met->zetal[i][j][k])) {
4143 /* Find the upper level k+l over the inversion... */
4144 int l = 0;
4145 do {
4146 l++;
4147 }
4148 while ((met->zetal[i][j][k - 1] >=
4149 met->zetal[i][j][k + l]) & (k + l < met->npl));
4150
4151 /* Interpolate linear between the top and bottom
4152 of the inversion... */
4153 float s =
4154 (float) (met->zetal[i][j][k + l] - met->zetal[i][j][k - 1])
4155 / (float) (met->hybrid[k + l] - met->hybrid[k - 1]);
4156
4157 for (int m = k; m < k + l; m++) {
4158 float d = (float) (met->hybrid[m] - met->hybrid[k - 1]);
4159 met->zetal[i][j][m] = s * d + met->zetal[i][j][k - 1];
4160 }
4161
4162 /* Search for more inversions above the last inversion ... */
4163 k = k + l;
4164 } else {
4165 k++;
4166 }
4167 }
4168 }
4169
4170 /* Create monotone pressure profiles... */
4171#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
4172 for (int i = 0; i < met->nx; i++)
4173 for (int j = 0; j < met->ny; j++) {
4174 int k = 1;
4175
4176 while (k < met->npl) { /* Check if there is an inversion at level k... */
4177 if ((met->pl[i][j][k - 1] <= met->pl[i][j][k])) {
4178 /* Find the upper level k+l over the inversion... */
4179 int l = 0;
4180 do {
4181 l++;
4182 }
4183 while ((met->pl[i][j][k - 1] <= met->pl[i][j][k + l]) & (k + l <
4184 met->npl));
4185
4186 /* Interpolate linear between the top and bottom
4187 of the inversion... */
4188 float s = (float) (met->pl[i][j][k + l] - met->pl[i][j][k - 1])
4189 / (float) (met->hybrid[k + l] - met->hybrid[k - 1]);
4190
4191 for (int m = k; m < k + l; m++) {
4192 float d = (float) (met->hybrid[m] - met->hybrid[k - 1]);
4193 met->pl[i][j][m] = s * d + met->pl[i][j][k - 1];
4194 }
4195
4196 /* Search for more inversions above the last inversion ... */
4197 k = k + l;
4198 } else {
4199 k++;
4200 }
4201 }
4202 }
4203}

◆ read_met_ml2pl()

void read_met_ml2pl ( ctl_t *  ctl,
met_t *  met,
float  var[EX][EY][EP] 
)

Convert meteo data from model levels to pressure levels.

Definition at line 4087 of file libtrac.c.

4090 {
4091
4092 double aux[EP], p[EP];
4093
4094 /* Set timer... */
4095 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_ML2PL", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
4096 LOG(2, "Interpolate meteo data to pressure levels...");
4097
4098 /* Loop over columns... */
4099#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) private(aux,p) collapse(2)
4100 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4101 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
4102
4103 /* Copy pressure profile... */
4104 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
4105 p[ip] = met->pl[ix][iy][ip];
4106
4107 /* Interpolate... */
4108 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++) {
4109 double pt = ctl->met_p[ip];
4110 if ((pt > p[0] && p[0] > p[1]) || (pt < p[0] && p[0] < p[1]))
4111 pt = p[0];
4112 else if ((pt > p[met->np - 1] && p[1] > p[0])
4113 || (pt < p[met->np - 1] && p[1] < p[0]))
4114 pt = p[met->np - 1];
4115 int ip2 = locate_irr(p, met->np, pt);
4116 aux[ip] = LIN(p[ip2], var[ix][iy][ip2],
4117 p[ip2 + 1], var[ix][iy][ip2 + 1], pt);
4118 }
4119
4120 /* Copy data... */
4121 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
4122 var[ix][iy][ip] = (float) aux[ip];
4123 }
4124}

4222
4223 /* Check if variable exists... */
4224 if (nc_inq_varid(ncid, varname, &varid) != NC_NOERR)
4225 if (nc_inq_varid(ncid, varname2, &varid) != NC_NOERR) {
4226 WARN("Cannot read 2-D variable: %s or %s", varname, varname2);
4227 return 0;
4228 } else {
4229 sprintf(varsel, "%s", varname2);
4230 } else
4231 sprintf(varsel, "%s", varname);
4232
4233 /* Read packed data... */

4235 && nc_get_att_float(ncid, varid, "add_offset", &offset) == NC_NOERR
4236 && nc_get_att_float(ncid, varid, "scale_factor",
4237 &scalfac) == NC_NOERR) {
4238
4239 /* Allocate... */
4240 short *help;
4241 ALLOC(help, short,
4242 EX * EY * EP);
4243
4244 /* Read fill value and missing value... */
4245 short fillval, missval;
4246 if (nc_get_att_short(ncid, varid, "_FillValue", &fillval) != NC_NOERR)
4247 fillval = 0;
4248 if (nc_get_att_short(ncid, varid, "missing_value", &missval) != NC_NOERR)
4249 missval = 0;
4250
4251 /* Write info... */
4252 LOG(2, "Read 2-D variable: %s"
4253 " (FILL = %d, MISS = %d, SCALE = %g, OFFSET = %g)",
4254 varsel, fillval, missval, scalfac, offset);
4255
4256 /* Read data... */
4257 NC(nc_get_var_short(ncid, varid, help));
4258
4259 /* Copy and check data... */
4260#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) num_threads(12)
4261 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4262 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
4263 if (init)
4264 dest[ix][iy] = 0;
4265 short aux = help[ARRAY_2D(iy, ix, met->nx)];
4266 if ((fillval == 0 || aux != fillval)
4267 && (missval == 0 || aux != missval)
4268 && fabsf(aux * scalfac + offset) < 1e14f)
4269 dest[ix][iy] += scl * (aux * scalfac + offset);
4270 else
4271 dest[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
4272 }
4273
4274 /* Free... */
4275 free(help);
4276 }
4277
4278 /* Unpacked data... */
4279 else {
4280
4281 /* Allocate... */
4282 float *help;
4283 ALLOC(help, float,
4284 EX * EY);
4285
4286 /* Read fill value and missing value... */
4287 float fillval, missval;
4288 if (nc_get_att_float(ncid, varid, "_FillValue", &fillval) != NC_NOERR)
4289 fillval = 0;
4290 if (nc_get_att_float(ncid, varid, "missing_value", &missval) != NC_NOERR)
4291 missval = 0;
4292
4293 /* Write info... */
4294 LOG(2, "Read 2-D variable: %s (FILL = %g, MISS = %g)",
4295 varsel, fillval, missval);
4296
4297 /* Read data... */
4298 NC(nc_get_var_float(ncid, varid, help));
4299
4300 /* Copy and check data... */
4301#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) num_threads(12)
4302 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4303 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
4304 if (init)
4305 dest[ix][iy] = 0;
4306 float aux = help[ARRAY_2D(iy, ix, met->nx)];
4307 if ((fillval == 0 || aux != fillval)
4308 && (missval == 0 || aux != missval)
4309 && fabsf(aux) < 1e14f)
4310 dest[ix][iy] += scl * aux;
4311 else
4312 dest[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
4313 }
4314
4315 /* Free... */
4316 free(help);
4317 }
4318
4319 /* Return... */
4320 return 1;

◆ read_met_pbl()

void read_met_pbl ( met_t *  met)

Calculate pressure of the boundary layer.

Definition at line 4463 of file libtrac.c.

4464 {
4465
4466 /* Set timer... */
4467 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_PBL", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
4468 LOG(2, "Calculate planetary boundary layer...");
4469
4470 /* Parameters used to estimate the height of the PBL
4471 (e.g., Vogelezang and Holtslag, 1996; Seidel et al., 2012)... */
4472 const double rib_crit = 0.25, dz = 0.05, umin = 5.0;
4473
4474 /* Loop over grid points... */
4475#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
4476 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4477 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
4478
4479 /* Set bottom level of PBL... */
4480 double pbl_bot = met->ps[ix][iy] + DZ2DP(dz, met->ps[ix][iy]);
4481
4482 /* Find lowest level near the bottom... */
4483 int ip;
4484 for (ip = 1; ip < met->np; ip++)
4485 if (met->p[ip] < pbl_bot)
4486 break;
4487
4488 /* Get near surface data... */
4489 double zs = LIN(met->p[ip - 1], met->z[ix][iy][ip - 1],
4490 met->p[ip], met->z[ix][iy][ip], pbl_bot);
4491 double ts = LIN(met->p[ip - 1], met->t[ix][iy][ip - 1],
4492 met->p[ip], met->t[ix][iy][ip], pbl_bot);
4493 double us = LIN(met->p[ip - 1], met->u[ix][iy][ip - 1],
4494 met->p[ip], met->u[ix][iy][ip], pbl_bot);
4495 double vs = LIN(met->p[ip - 1], met->v[ix][iy][ip - 1],
4496 met->p[ip], met->v[ix][iy][ip], pbl_bot);
4497 double h2os = LIN(met->p[ip - 1], met->h2o[ix][iy][ip - 1],
4498 met->p[ip], met->h2o[ix][iy][ip], pbl_bot);
4499 double tvs = THETAVIRT(pbl_bot, ts, h2os);
4500
4501 /* Init... */
4502 double rib_old = 0;
4503
4504 /* Loop over levels... */
4505 for (; ip < met->np; ip++) {
4506
4507 /* Get squared horizontal wind speed... */
4508 double vh2
4509 = SQR(met->u[ix][iy][ip] - us) + SQR(met->v[ix][iy][ip] - vs);
4510 vh2 = GSL_MAX(vh2, SQR(umin));
4511
4512 /* Calculate bulk Richardson number... */
4513 double rib = G0 * 1e3 * (met->z[ix][iy][ip] - zs) / tvs
4514 * (THETAVIRT(met->p[ip], met->t[ix][iy][ip],
4515 met->h2o[ix][iy][ip]) - tvs) / vh2;
4516
4517 /* Check for critical value... */
4518 if (rib >= rib_crit) {
4519 met->pbl[ix][iy] = (float) (LIN(rib_old, met->p[ip - 1],
4520 rib, met->p[ip], rib_crit));
4521 if (met->pbl[ix][iy] > pbl_bot)
4522 met->pbl[ix][iy] = (float) pbl_bot;
4523 break;
4524 }
4525
4526 /* Save Richardson number... */
4527 rib_old = rib;
4528 }
4529 }
4530}
THETAVIRT
#define THETAVIRT(p, t, h2o)
Compute virtual potential temperature.
Definition: libtrac.h:640
DZ2DP
#define DZ2DP(dz, p)
Convert vertical distance to pressure change.
Definition: libtrac.h:291

◆ read_met_periodic()

void read_met_periodic ( met_t *  met)

Create meteo data with periodic boundary conditions.

Definition at line 4534 of file libtrac.c.

4535 {
4536
4537 /* Set timer... */
4538 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_PERIODIC", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
4539 LOG(2, "Apply periodic boundary conditions...");
4540
4541 /* Check longitudes... */
4542 if (!(fabs(met->lon[met->nx - 1] - met->lon[0]
4543 + met->lon[1] - met->lon[0] - 360) < 0.01))
4544 return;
4545
4546 /* Increase longitude counter... */
4547 if ((++met->nx) > EX)
4548 ERRMSG("Cannot create periodic boundary conditions!");
4549
4550 /* Set longitude... */
4551 met->lon[met->nx - 1] = met->lon[met->nx - 2] + met->lon[1] - met->lon[0];
4552
4553 /* Loop over latitudes and pressure levels... */
4554#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4555 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
4556 met->ps[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->ps[0][iy];
4557 met->zs[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->zs[0][iy];
4558 met->ts[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->ts[0][iy];
4559 met->us[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->us[0][iy];
4560 met->vs[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->vs[0][iy];
4561 met->lsm[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->lsm[0][iy];
4562 met->sst[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->sst[0][iy];
4563 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
4564 met->t[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->t[0][iy][ip];
4565 met->u[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->u[0][iy][ip];
4566 met->v[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->v[0][iy][ip];
4567 met->w[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->w[0][iy][ip];
4568 met->h2o[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->h2o[0][iy][ip];
4569 met->o3[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->o3[0][iy][ip];
4570 met->lwc[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->lwc[0][iy][ip];
4571 met->iwc[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->iwc[0][iy][ip];
4572 met->cc[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->cc[0][iy][ip];
4573 }
4574 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->npl; ip++) {
4575 met->ul[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->ul[0][iy][ip];
4576 met->vl[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->vl[0][iy][ip];
4577 met->pl[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->pl[0][iy][ip];
4578 met->zetal[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->zetal[0][iy][ip];
4579 met->zeta_dotl[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->zeta_dotl[0][iy][ip];
4580 }
4581 }
4582}

◆ read_met_pv()

void read_met_pv ( met_t *  met)

Calculate potential vorticity.

Definition at line 4586 of file libtrac.c.

4587 {
4588
4589 double pows[EP];
4590
4591 /* Set timer... */
4592 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_PV", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
4593 LOG(2, "Calculate potential vorticity...");
4594
4595 /* Set powers... */
4596#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4597 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
4598 pows[ip] = pow(1000. / met->p[ip], 0.286);
4599
4600 /* Loop over grid points... */
4601#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4602 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++) {
4603
4604 /* Set indices... */
4605 int ix0 = GSL_MAX(ix - 1, 0);
4606 int ix1 = GSL_MIN(ix + 1, met->nx - 1);
4607
4608 /* Loop over grid points... */
4609 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
4610
4611 /* Set indices... */
4612 int iy0 = GSL_MAX(iy - 1, 0);
4613 int iy1 = GSL_MIN(iy + 1, met->ny - 1);
4614
4615 /* Set auxiliary variables... */
4616 double latr = 0.5 * (met->lat[iy1] + met->lat[iy0]);
4617 double dx = 1000. * DEG2DX(met->lon[ix1] - met->lon[ix0], latr);
4618 double dy = 1000. * DEG2DY(met->lat[iy1] - met->lat[iy0]);
4619 double c0 = cos(met->lat[iy0] / 180. * M_PI);
4620 double c1 = cos(met->lat[iy1] / 180. * M_PI);
4621 double cr = cos(latr / 180. * M_PI);
4622 double vort = 2 * 7.2921e-5 * sin(latr * M_PI / 180.);
4623
4624 /* Loop over grid points... */
4625 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
4626
4627 /* Get gradients in longitude... */
4628 double dtdx
4629 = (met->t[ix1][iy][ip] - met->t[ix0][iy][ip]) * pows[ip] / dx;
4630 double dvdx = (met->v[ix1][iy][ip] - met->v[ix0][iy][ip]) / dx;
4631
4632 /* Get gradients in latitude... */
4633 double dtdy
4634 = (met->t[ix][iy1][ip] - met->t[ix][iy0][ip]) * pows[ip] / dy;
4635 double dudy
4636 = (met->u[ix][iy1][ip] * c1 - met->u[ix][iy0][ip] * c0) / dy;
4637
4638 /* Set indices... */
4639 int ip0 = GSL_MAX(ip - 1, 0);
4640 int ip1 = GSL_MIN(ip + 1, met->np - 1);
4641
4642 /* Get gradients in pressure... */
4643 double dtdp, dudp, dvdp;
4644 double dp0 = 100. * (met->p[ip] - met->p[ip0]);
4645 double dp1 = 100. * (met->p[ip1] - met->p[ip]);
4646 if (ip != ip0 && ip != ip1) {
4647 double denom = dp0 * dp1 * (dp0 + dp1);
4648 dtdp = (dp0 * dp0 * met->t[ix][iy][ip1] * pows[ip1]
4649 - dp1 * dp1 * met->t[ix][iy][ip0] * pows[ip0]
4650 + (dp1 * dp1 - dp0 * dp0) * met->t[ix][iy][ip] * pows[ip])
4651 / denom;
4652 dudp = (dp0 * dp0 * met->u[ix][iy][ip1]
4653 - dp1 * dp1 * met->u[ix][iy][ip0]
4654 + (dp1 * dp1 - dp0 * dp0) * met->u[ix][iy][ip])
4655 / denom;
4656 dvdp = (dp0 * dp0 * met->v[ix][iy][ip1]
4657 - dp1 * dp1 * met->v[ix][iy][ip0]
4658 + (dp1 * dp1 - dp0 * dp0) * met->v[ix][iy][ip])
4659 / denom;
4660 } else {
4661 double denom = dp0 + dp1;
4662 dtdp =
4663 (met->t[ix][iy][ip1] * pows[ip1] -
4664 met->t[ix][iy][ip0] * pows[ip0]) / denom;
4665 dudp = (met->u[ix][iy][ip1] - met->u[ix][iy][ip0]) / denom;
4666 dvdp = (met->v[ix][iy][ip1] - met->v[ix][iy][ip0]) / denom;
4667 }
4668
4669 /* Calculate PV... */
4670 met->pv[ix][iy][ip] = (float)
4671 (1e6 * G0 *
4672 (-dtdp * (dvdx - dudy / cr + vort) + dvdp * dtdx - dudp * dtdy));
4673 }
4674 }
4675 }
4676
4677 /* Fix for polar regions... */
4678#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4679 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4680 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
4681 met->pv[ix][0][ip]
4682 = met->pv[ix][1][ip]
4683 = met->pv[ix][2][ip];
4684 met->pv[ix][met->ny - 1][ip]
4685 = met->pv[ix][met->ny - 2][ip]
4686 = met->pv[ix][met->ny - 3][ip];
4687 }
4688}
DEG2DY
#define DEG2DY(dlat)
Convert degrees to meridional distance.
Definition: libtrac.h:274
DEG2DX
#define DEG2DX(dlon, lat)
Convert degrees to zonal distance.
Definition: libtrac.h:270

◆ read_met_ozone()

void read_met_ozone ( met_t *  met)

Calculate total column ozone.

Definition at line 4692 of file libtrac.c.

4693 {
4694
4695 /* Set timer... */
4696 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_OZONE", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
4697 LOG(2, "Calculate total column ozone...");
4698
4699 /* Loop over columns... */
4700#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
4701 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4702 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
4703
4704 /* Integrate... */
4705 double cd = 0;
4706 for (int ip = 1; ip < met->np; ip++)
4707 if (met->p[ip - 1] <= met->ps[ix][iy]) {
4708 double vmr = 0.5 * (met->o3[ix][iy][ip - 1] + met->o3[ix][iy][ip]);
4709 double dp = met->p[ip - 1] - met->p[ip];
4710 cd += vmr * MO3 / MA * dp * 1e2 / G0;
4711 }
4712
4713 /* Convert to Dobson units... */
4714 met->o3c[ix][iy] = (float) (cd / 2.1415e-5);
4715 }
4716}

float o3c[EX][EY]
Total column ozone [DU].

◆ read_met_sample()

void read_met_sample ( ctl_t *  ctl,
met_t *  met 
)

Downsampling of meteo data.

Definition at line 4720 of file libtrac.c.

4722 {
4723
4724 met_t *help;
4725
4726 /* Check parameters... */
4727 if (ctl->met_dp <= 1 && ctl->met_dx <= 1 && ctl->met_dy <= 1
4728 && ctl->met_sp <= 1 && ctl->met_sx <= 1 && ctl->met_sy <= 1)
4729 return;
4730
4731 /* Set timer... */
4732 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_SAMPLE", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
4733 LOG(2, "Downsampling of meteo data...");
4734
4735 /* Allocate... */
4736 ALLOC(help, met_t, 1);
4737
4738 /* Copy data... */
4739 help->nx = met->nx;
4740 help->ny = met->ny;
4741 help->np = met->np;
4742 memcpy(help->lon, met->lon, sizeof(met->lon));
4743 memcpy(help->lat, met->lat, sizeof(met->lat));
4744 memcpy(help->p, met->p, sizeof(met->p));
4745
4746 /* Smoothing... */
4747 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix += ctl->met_dx) {
4748 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy += ctl->met_dy) {
4749 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip += ctl->met_dp) {
4750 help->ps[ix][iy] = 0;
4751 help->zs[ix][iy] = 0;
4752 help->ts[ix][iy] = 0;
4753 help->us[ix][iy] = 0;
4754 help->vs[ix][iy] = 0;
4755 help->lsm[ix][iy] = 0;
4756 help->sst[ix][iy] = 0;
4757 help->t[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
4758 help->u[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
4759 help->v[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
4760 help->w[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
4761 help->h2o[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
4762 help->o3[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
4763 help->lwc[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
4764 help->iwc[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
4765 help->cc[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
4766 float wsum = 0;
4767 for (int ix2 = ix - ctl->met_sx + 1; ix2 <= ix + ctl->met_sx - 1;
4768 ix2++) {
4769 int ix3 = ix2;
4770 if (ix3 < 0)
4771 ix3 += met->nx;
4772 else if (ix3 >= met->nx)
4773 ix3 -= met->nx;
4774
4775 for (int iy2 = GSL_MAX(iy - ctl->met_sy + 1, 0);
4776 iy2 <= GSL_MIN(iy + ctl->met_sy - 1, met->ny - 1); iy2++)
4777 for (int ip2 = GSL_MAX(ip - ctl->met_sp + 1, 0);
4778 ip2 <= GSL_MIN(ip + ctl->met_sp - 1, met->np - 1); ip2++) {
4779 float w = (1.0f - (float) abs(ix - ix2) / (float) ctl->met_sx)
4780 * (1.0f - (float) abs(iy - iy2) / (float) ctl->met_sy)
4781 * (1.0f - (float) abs(ip - ip2) / (float) ctl->met_sp);
4782 help->ps[ix][iy] += w * met->ps[ix3][iy2];
4783 help->zs[ix][iy] += w * met->zs[ix3][iy2];
4784 help->ts[ix][iy] += w * met->ts[ix3][iy2];
4785 help->us[ix][iy] += w * met->us[ix3][iy2];
4786 help->vs[ix][iy] += w * met->vs[ix3][iy2];
4787 help->lsm[ix][iy] += w * met->lsm[ix3][iy2];
4788 help->sst[ix][iy] += w * met->sst[ix3][iy2];
4789 help->t[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->t[ix3][iy2][ip2];
4790 help->u[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->u[ix3][iy2][ip2];
4791 help->v[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->v[ix3][iy2][ip2];
4792 help->w[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->w[ix3][iy2][ip2];
4793 help->h2o[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->h2o[ix3][iy2][ip2];
4794 help->o3[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->o3[ix3][iy2][ip2];
4795 help->lwc[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->lwc[ix3][iy2][ip2];
4796 help->iwc[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->iwc[ix3][iy2][ip2];
4797 help->cc[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->cc[ix3][iy2][ip2];
4798 wsum += w;
4799 }
4800 }
4801 help->ps[ix][iy] /= wsum;
4802 help->zs[ix][iy] /= wsum;
4803 help->ts[ix][iy] /= wsum;
4804 help->us[ix][iy] /= wsum;
4805 help->vs[ix][iy] /= wsum;
4806 help->lsm[ix][iy] /= wsum;
4807 help->sst[ix][iy] /= wsum;
4808 help->t[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
4809 help->u[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
4810 help->v[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
4811 help->w[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
4812 help->h2o[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
4813 help->o3[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
4814 help->lwc[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
4815 help->iwc[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
4816 help->cc[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
4817 }
4818 }
4819 }
4820
4821 /* Downsampling... */
4822 met->nx = 0;
4823 for (int ix = 0; ix < help->nx; ix += ctl->met_dx) {
4824 met->lon[met->nx] = help->lon[ix];
4825 met->ny = 0;
4826 for (int iy = 0; iy < help->ny; iy += ctl->met_dy) {
4827 met->lat[met->ny] = help->lat[iy];
4828 met->ps[met->nx][met->ny] = help->ps[ix][iy];
4829 met->zs[met->nx][met->ny] = help->zs[ix][iy];
4830 met->ts[met->nx][met->ny] = help->ts[ix][iy];
4831 met->us[met->nx][met->ny] = help->us[ix][iy];
4832 met->vs[met->nx][met->ny] = help->vs[ix][iy];
4833 met->lsm[met->nx][met->ny] = help->lsm[ix][iy];
4834 met->sst[met->nx][met->ny] = help->sst[ix][iy];
4835 met->np = 0;
4836 for (int ip = 0; ip < help->np; ip += ctl->met_dp) {
4837 met->p[met->np] = help->p[ip];
4838 met->t[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->t[ix][iy][ip];
4839 met->u[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->u[ix][iy][ip];
4840 met->v[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->v[ix][iy][ip];
4841 met->w[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->w[ix][iy][ip];
4842 met->h2o[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->h2o[ix][iy][ip];
4843 met->o3[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->o3[ix][iy][ip];
4844 met->lwc[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->lwc[ix][iy][ip];
4845 met->iwc[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->iwc[ix][iy][ip];
4846 met->cc[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->cc[ix][iy][ip];
4847 met->np++;
4848 }
4849 met->ny++;
4850 }
4851 met->nx++;
4852 }
4853
4854 /* Free... */
4855 free(help);
4856}

void read_met_surface ( int  ncid,

Read surface data.

4863 {
4864
4865 /* Set timer... */
4866 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_SURFACE", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
4867 LOG(2, "Read surface data...");
4868
4869 /* MPTRAC meteo data... */
4870 if (ctl->clams_met_data == 0) {
4871
4872 /* Read surface pressure... */
4873 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "lnsp", "LNSP", ctl, met, met->ps, 1.0f, 1)) {
4874 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "ps", "PS", ctl, met, met->ps, 0.01f, 1)) {
4875 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "sp", "SP", ctl, met, met->ps, 0.01f, 1)) {
4876 WARN("Cannot not read surface pressure data (use lowest level)!");
4877 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4878 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
4879 met->ps[ix][iy] = (float) met->p[0];
4880 }
4881 }
4882 } else
4883 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4884 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
4885 met->ps[ix][iy] = (float) (exp(met->ps[ix][iy]) / 100.);
4886
4887 /* Read geopotential height at the surface... */
4888 if (!read_met_nc_2d
4889 (ncid, "z", "Z", ctl, met, met->zs, (float) (1. / (1000. * G0)), 1))
4890 if (!read_met_nc_2d
4891 (ncid, "zm", "ZM", ctl, met, met->zs, (float) (1. / 1000.), 1))
4892 WARN("Cannot read surface geopotential height!");
4893
4894 /* Read temperature at the surface... */
4895 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "t2m", "T2M", ctl, met, met->ts, 1.0, 1))
4896 WARN("Cannot read surface temperature!");
4897
4898 /* Read zonal wind at the surface... */
4899 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "u10m", "U10M", ctl, met, met->us, 1.0, 1))
4900 WARN("Cannot read surface zonal wind!");
4901
4902 /* Read meridional wind at the surface... */
4903 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "v10m", "V10M", ctl, met, met->vs, 1.0, 1))
4904 WARN("Cannot read surface meridional wind!");
4905
4906 /* Read land-sea mask... */
4907 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "lsm", "LSM", ctl, met, met->lsm, 1.0, 1))
4908 WARN("Cannot read land-sea mask!");
4909
4910 /* Read sea surface temperature... */
4911 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "sstk", "SSTK", ctl, met, met->sst, 1.0, 1))
4912 WARN("Cannot read sea surface temperature!");
4913 }
4914
4915 /* CLaMS meteo data... */
4916 else {
4917
4918 /* Read surface pressure... */
4919 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "ps", "PS", ctl, met, met->ps, 0.01f, 1)) {
4920 WARN("Cannot not read surface pressure data (use lowest level)!");
4921 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4922 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
4923 met->ps[ix][iy] = (float) met->p[0];
4924 }
4925
4926 /* Read geopotential height at the surface
4927 (use lowermost level of 3-D data field)... */
4928 float *help;
4929 ALLOC(help, float,
4930 EX * EY * EP);
4931 memcpy(help, met->pl, sizeof(met->pl));
4932 if (!read_met_nc_3d
4933 (ncid, "gph", "GPH", ctl, met, met->pl, (float) (1e-3 / G0), 1)) {
4934 ERRMSG("Cannot read geopotential height!");
4935 } else
4936 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4937 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
4938 met->zs[ix][iy] = met->pl[ix][iy][0];
4939 memcpy(met->pl, help, sizeof(met->pl));
4940 free(help);
4941
4942 /* Read temperature at the surface... */
4943 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "t2", "T2", ctl, met, met->ts, 1.0, 1))
4944 WARN("Cannot read surface temperature!");
4945
4946 /* Read zonal wind at the surface... */
4947 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "u10", "U10", ctl, met, met->us, 1.0, 1))
4948 WARN("Cannot read surface zonal wind!");
4949
4950 /* Read meridional wind at the surface... */
4951 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "v10", "V10", ctl, met, met->vs, 1.0, 1))
4952 WARN("Cannot read surface meridional wind!");
4953
4954 /* Read land-sea mask... */
4955 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "lsm", "LSM", ctl, met, met->lsm, 1.0, 1))
4956 WARN("Cannot read land-sea mask!");
4957
4958 /* Read sea surface temperature... */
4959 if (!read_met_nc_2d(ncid, "sstk", "SSTK", ctl, met, met->sst, 1.0, 1))
4960 WARN("Cannot read sea surface temperature!");
4961 }
4962}

◆ read_met_tropo()

void read_met_tropo ( ctl_t *  ctl,
clim_t *  clim,
met_t *  met 
)

Calculate tropopause data.

Definition at line 4966 of file libtrac.c.

4969 {
4970
4971 double p2[200], pv[EP], pv2[200], t[EP], t2[200], th[EP],
4972 th2[200], z[EP], z2[200];
4973
4974 /* Set timer... */
4975 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_TROPO", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
4976 LOG(2, "Calculate tropopause...");
4977
4978 /* Get altitude and pressure profiles... */
4979#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4980 for (int iz = 0; iz < met->np; iz++)
4981 z[iz] = Z(met->p[iz]);
4982#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4983 for (int iz = 0; iz <= 190; iz++) {
4984 z2[iz] = 4.5 + 0.1 * iz;
4985 p2[iz] = P(z2[iz]);
4986 }
4987
4988 /* Do not calculate tropopause... */
4989 if (ctl->met_tropo == 0)
4990#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
4991 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4992 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
4993 met->pt[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
4994
4995 /* Use tropopause climatology... */
4996 else if (ctl->met_tropo == 1) {
4997#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
4998 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
4999 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
5000 met->pt[ix][iy] = (float) clim_tropo(clim, met->time, met->lat[iy]);
5001 }
5002
5003 /* Use cold point... */
5004 else if (ctl->met_tropo == 2) {
5005
5006 /* Loop over grid points... */
5007#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) private(t,t2) collapse(2)
5008 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
5009 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
5010
5011 /* Interpolate temperature profile... */
5012 for (int iz = 0; iz < met->np; iz++)
5013 t[iz] = met->t[ix][iy][iz];
5014 spline(z, t, met->np, z2, t2, 171, ctl->met_tropo_spline);
5015
5016 /* Find minimum... */
5017 int iz = (int) gsl_stats_min_index(t2, 1, 171);
5018 if (iz > 0 && iz < 170)
5019 met->pt[ix][iy] = (float) p2[iz];
5020 else
5021 met->pt[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
5022 }
5023 }
5024
5025 /* Use WMO definition... */
5026 else if (ctl->met_tropo == 3 || ctl->met_tropo == 4) {
5027
5028 /* Loop over grid points... */
5029#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) private(t,t2) collapse(2)
5030 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
5031 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
5032
5033 /* Interpolate temperature profile... */
5034 int iz;
5035 for (iz = 0; iz < met->np; iz++)
5036 t[iz] = met->t[ix][iy][iz];
5037 spline(z, t, met->np, z2, t2, 191, ctl->met_tropo_spline);
5038
5039 /* Find 1st tropopause... */
5040 met->pt[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
5041 for (iz = 0; iz <= 170; iz++) {
5042 int found = 1;
5043 for (int iz2 = iz + 1; iz2 <= iz + ctl->met_tropo_nlev; iz2++)
5044 if (LAPSE(p2[iz], t2[iz], p2[iz2], t2[iz2]) >
5045 ctl->met_tropo_lapse) {
5046 found = 0;
5047 break;
5048 }
5049 if (found) {
5050 if (iz > 0 && iz < 170)
5051 met->pt[ix][iy] = (float) p2[iz];
5052 break;
5053 }
5054 }
5055
5056 /* Find 2nd tropopause... */
5057 if (ctl->met_tropo == 4) {
5058 met->pt[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
5059 for (; iz <= 170; iz++) {
5060 int found = 1;
5061 for (int iz2 = iz + 1; iz2 <= iz + ctl->met_tropo_nlev_sep; iz2++)
5062 if (LAPSE(p2[iz], t2[iz], p2[iz2], t2[iz2]) <
5063 ctl->met_tropo_lapse_sep) {
5064 found = 0;
5065 break;
5066 }
5067 if (found)
5068 break;
5069 }
5070 for (; iz <= 170; iz++) {
5071 int found = 1;
5072 for (int iz2 = iz + 1; iz2 <= iz + ctl->met_tropo_nlev; iz2++)
5073 if (LAPSE(p2[iz], t2[iz], p2[iz2], t2[iz2]) >
5074 ctl->met_tropo_lapse) {
5075 found = 0;
5076 break;
5077 }
5078 if (found) {
5079 if (iz > 0 && iz < 170)
5080 met->pt[ix][iy] = (float) p2[iz];
5081 break;
5082 }
5083 }
5084 }
5085 }
5086 }
5087
5088 /* Use dynamical tropopause... */
5089 else if (ctl->met_tropo == 5) {
5090
5091 /* Loop over grid points... */
5092#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) private(pv,pv2,th,th2) collapse(2)
5093 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
5094 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
5095
5096 /* Interpolate potential vorticity profile... */
5097 for (int iz = 0; iz < met->np; iz++)
5098 pv[iz] = met->pv[ix][iy][iz];
5099 spline(z, pv, met->np, z2, pv2, 171, ctl->met_tropo_spline);
5100
5101 /* Interpolate potential temperature profile... */
5102 for (int iz = 0; iz < met->np; iz++)
5103 th[iz] = THETA(met->p[iz], met->t[ix][iy][iz]);
5104 spline(z, th, met->np, z2, th2, 171, ctl->met_tropo_spline);
5105
5106 /* Find dynamical tropopause... */
5107 met->pt[ix][iy] = GSL_NAN;
5108 for (int iz = 0; iz <= 170; iz++)
5109 if (fabs(pv2[iz]) >= ctl->met_tropo_pv
5110 || th2[iz] >= ctl->met_tropo_theta) {
5111 if (iz > 0 && iz < 170)
5112 met->pt[ix][iy] = (float) p2[iz];
5113 break;
5114 }
5115 }
5116 }
5117
5118 else
5119 ERRMSG("Cannot calculate tropopause!");
5120
5121 /* Interpolate temperature, geopotential height, and water vapor vmr... */
5122#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
5123 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
5124 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
5125 double h2ot, tt, zt;
5126 INTPOL_INIT;
5127 intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->t, met->pt[ix][iy], met->lon[ix],
5128 met->lat[iy], &tt, ci, cw, 1);
5129 intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->z, met->pt[ix][iy], met->lon[ix],
5130 met->lat[iy], &zt, ci, cw, 0);
5131 intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->h2o, met->pt[ix][iy], met->lon[ix],
5132 met->lat[iy], &h2ot, ci, cw, 0);
5133 met->tt[ix][iy] = (float) tt;
5134 met->zt[ix][iy] = (float) zt;
5135 met->h2ot[ix][iy] = (float) h2ot;
5136 }
5137}
spline
void spline(const double *x, const double *y, const int n, const double *x2, double *y2, const int n2, const int method)
Spline interpolation.
Definition: libtrac.c:5295
LAPSE
#define LAPSE(p1, t1, p2, t2)
Calculate lapse rate between pressure levels.
Definition: libtrac.h:412

5209

5213 sprintf(fullname2, "%s[*]", varname);
5214 } else {

5227 break;

5246 sprintf(rval, "%s", defvalue);
5247 else
5248 ERRMSG("Missing variable %s!\n", fullname1);
5249 }

5252 LOG(1, "%s = %s", fullname1, rval);
5253
5254 /* Return values... */
5255 if (value != NULL)
5256 sprintf(value, "%s", rval);
5257 return atof(rval);
5258}

◆ sedi()

double sedi ( const double  p,
const double  T,
const double  rp,
const double  rhop 
)

Calculate sedimentation velocity.

Definition at line 5262 of file libtrac.c.

5266 {
5267
5268 /* Convert particle radius from microns to m... */
5269 double rp_help = rp * 1e-6;
5270
5271 /* Density of dry air [kg / m^3]... */
5272 double rho = RHO(p, T);
5273
5274 /* Dynamic viscosity of air [kg / (m s)]... */
5275 double eta = 1.8325e-5 * (416.16 / (T + 120.)) * pow(T / 296.16, 1.5);
5276
5277 /* Thermal velocity of an air molecule [m / s]... */
5278 double v = sqrt(8. * KB * T / (M_PI * 4.8096e-26));
5279
5280 /* Mean free path of an air molecule [m]... */
5281 double lambda = 2. * eta / (rho * v);
5282
5283 /* Knudsen number for air (dimensionless)... */
5284 double K = lambda / rp_help;
5285
5286 /* Cunningham slip-flow correction (dimensionless)... */
5287 double G = 1. + K * (1.249 + 0.42 * exp(-0.87 / K));
5288
5289 /* Sedimentation velocity [m / s]... */
5290 return 2. * SQR(rp_help) * (rhop - rho) * G0 / (9. * eta) * G;
5291}
KB
#define KB
Boltzmann constant [kg m^2/(K s^2)].
Definition: libtrac.h:113
RHO
#define RHO(p, t)
Compute density of air.
Definition: libtrac.h:593

5303
5304 /* Cubic spline interpolation... */

5309 gsl_spline *s;
5310 acc = gsl_interp_accel_alloc();
5311 s = gsl_spline_alloc(gsl_interp_cspline, (size_t) n);
5312
5313 /* Interpolate profile... */
5314 gsl_spline_init(s, x, y, (size_t) n);
5315 for (int i = 0; i < n2; i++)
5316 if (x2[i] <= x[0])
5317 y2[i] = y[0];
5318 else if (x2[i] >= x[n - 1])
5319 y2[i] = y[n - 1];
5320 else
5321 y2[i] = gsl_spline_eval(s, x2[i], acc);
5322
5323 /* Free... */
5324 gsl_spline_free(s);
5325 gsl_interp_accel_free(acc);
5326 }
5327
5328 /* Linear interpolation... */
5329 else {
5330 for (int i = 0; i < n2; i++)
5331 if (x2[i] <= x[0])
5332 y2[i] = y[0];
5333 else if (x2[i] >= x[n - 1])
5334 y2[i] = y[n - 1];
5335 else {
5336 int idx = locate_irr(x, n, x2[i]);
5337 y2[i] = LIN(x[idx], y[idx], x[idx + 1], y[idx + 1], x2[i]);
5338 }
5339 }

◆ stddev()

float stddev ( const float *  data,
const int  n 
)

Calculate standard deviation.

Definition at line 5344 of file libtrac.c.

5346 {
5347
5348 if (n <= 0)
5349 return 0;
5350
5351 float mean = 0, var = 0;
5352
5353 for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
5354 mean += data[i];
5355 var += SQR(data[i]);
5356 }
5357
5358 var = var / (float) n - SQR(mean / (float) n);
5359
5360 return (var > 0 ? sqrtf(var) : 0);
5361}

◆ sza_calc()

double sza_calc ( const double  sec,
const double  lon,
const double  lat 
)

Calculate solar zenith angle.

Definition at line 5365 of file libtrac.c.

5368 {
5369
5370 /* Number of days and fraction with respect to 2000-01-01T12:00Z... */
5371 const double D = sec / 86400 - 0.5;
5372
5373 /* Geocentric apparent ecliptic longitude [rad]... */
5374 const double g = (357.529 + 0.98560028 * D) * M_PI / 180;
5375 const double q = 280.459 + 0.98564736 * D;
5376 const double L = (q + 1.915 * sin(g) + 0.020 * sin(2 * g)) * M_PI / 180;
5377
5378 /* Mean obliquity of the ecliptic [rad]... */
5379 const double e = (23.439 - 0.00000036 * D) * M_PI / 180;
5380
5381 /* Declination [rad]... */
5382 const double sindec = sin(e) * sin(L);
5383
5384 /* Right ascension [rad]... */
5385 const double ra = atan2(cos(e) * sin(L), cos(L));
5386
5387 /* Greenwich Mean Sidereal Time [h]... */
5388 const double GMST = 18.697374558 + 24.06570982441908 * D;
5389
5390 /* Local Sidereal Time [h]... */
5391 const double LST = GMST + lon / 15;
5392
5393 /* Hour angle [rad]... */
5394 const double h = LST / 12 * M_PI - ra;
5395
5396 /* Convert latitude... */
5397 const double lat_help = lat * M_PI / 180;
5398
5399 /* Return solar zenith angle [rad]... */
5400 return acos(sin(lat_help) * sindec +
5401 cos(lat_help) * sqrt(1 - SQR(sindec)) * cos(h));
5402}

5431

◆ timer()

void timer ( const char *  name,

)

Measure wall-clock time.

5440 {
5441
5442 static char names[NTIMER][100], groups[NTIMER][100];
5443
5444 static double rt_name[NTIMER], rt_group[NTIMER],
5445 rt_min[NTIMER], rt_max[NTIMER], dt, t0, t1;
5446
5447 static int iname = -1, igroup = -1, nname, ngroup, ct_name[NTIMER];
5448
5449 /* Get time... */
5450 t1 = omp_get_wtime();
5451 dt = t1 - t0;
5452
5453 /* Add elapsed time to current timers... */
5454 if (iname >= 0) {
5455 rt_name[iname] += dt;
5456 rt_min[iname] = (ct_name[iname] <= 0 ? dt : GSL_MIN(rt_min[iname], dt));
5457 rt_max[iname] = (ct_name[iname] <= 0 ? dt : GSL_MAX(rt_max[iname], dt));
5458 ct_name[iname]++;
5459 }
5460 if (igroup >= 0)
5461 rt_group[igroup] += t1 - t0;
5462
5463 /* Report timers... */
5464 if (output) {
5465 for (int i = 0; i < nname; i++)
5466 LOG(1, "TIMER_%s = %.3f s (min= %g s, mean= %g s,"
5467 " max= %g s, n= %d)", names[i], rt_name[i], rt_min[i],
5468 rt_name[i] / ct_name[i], rt_max[i], ct_name[i]);
5469 for (int i = 0; i < ngroup; i++)
5470 LOG(1, "TIMER_GROUP_%s = %.3f s", groups[i], rt_group[i]);
5471 double total = 0.0;
5472 for (int i = 0; i < nname; i++)
5473 total += rt_name[i];
5474 LOG(1, "TIMER_TOTAL = %.3f s", total);
5475 }
5476
5477 /* Identify IDs of next timer... */
5478 for (iname = 0; iname < nname; iname++)
5479 if (strcasecmp(name, names[iname]) == 0)
5480 break;
5481 for (igroup = 0; igroup < ngroup; igroup++)
5482 if (strcasecmp(group, groups[igroup]) == 0)
5483 break;
5484
5485 /* Check whether this is a new timer... */
5486 if (iname >= nname) {
5487 sprintf(names[iname], "%s", name);
5488 if ((++nname) > NTIMER)
5489 ERRMSG("Too many timers!");
5490 }
5491
5492 /* Check whether this is a new group... */
5493 if (igroup >= ngroup) {
5494 sprintf(groups[igroup], "%s", group);
5495 if ((++ngroup) > NTIMER)
5496 ERRMSG("Too many groups!");
5497 }
5498
5499 /* Save starting time... */
5500 t0 = t1;
5501}

◆ tropo_weight()

double tropo_weight ( const clim_t *  clim,
const double  t,
const double  lat,
const double  p 
)

Get weighting factor based on tropopause distance.

Definition at line 5540 of file libtrac.c.

5544 {
5545
5546 /* Get tropopause pressure... */
5547 double pt = clim_tropo(clim, t, lat);
5548
5549 /* Get pressure range... */
5550 double p1 = pt * 0.866877899;
5551 double p0 = pt / 0.866877899;
5552
5553 /* Get weighting factor... */
5554 if (p > p0)
5555 return 1;
5556 else if (p < p1)
5557 return 0;
5558 else
5559 return LIN(p0, 1.0, p1, 0.0, p);
5560}

void write_atm_asc ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
atm_t *  atm,
double  t 
)

Write atmospheric data in ASCII format.

Definition at line 5624 of file libtrac.c.

5628 {
5629
5630 FILE *out;
5631
5632 /* Set time interval for output... */
5633 double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
5634 double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
5635
5636 /* Check if gnuplot output is requested... */
5637 if (ctl->atm_gpfile[0] != '-') {
5638
5639 /* Create gnuplot pipe... */
5640 if (!(out = popen("gnuplot", "w")))
5641 ERRMSG("Cannot create pipe to gnuplot!");
5642
5643 /* Set plot filename... */
5644 fprintf(out, "set out \"%s.png\"\n", filename);
5645
5646 /* Set time string... */
5647 double r;
5648 int year, mon, day, hour, min, sec;
5649 jsec2time(t, &year, &mon, &day, &hour, &min, &sec, &r);
5650 fprintf(out, "timestr=\"%d-%02d-%02d, %02d:%02d UTC\"\n",
5651 year, mon, day, hour, min);
5652
5653 /* Dump gnuplot file to pipe... */
5654 FILE *in;
5655 if (!(in = fopen(ctl->atm_gpfile, "r")))
5656 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
5657 char line[LEN];
5658 while (fgets(line, LEN, in))
5659 fprintf(out, "%s", line);
5660 fclose(in);
5661 }
5662
5663 else {
5664
5665 /* Create file... */
5666 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
5667 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
5668 }
5669
5670 /* Write header... */
5671 fprintf(out,
5672 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
5673 "# $2 = altitude [km]\n"
5674 "# $3 = longitude [deg]\n" "# $4 = latitude [deg]\n");
5675 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
5676 fprintf(out, "# $%i = %s [%s]\n", iq + 5, ctl->qnt_name[iq],
5677 ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
5678 fprintf(out, "\n");
5679
5680 /* Write data... */
5681 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip += ctl->atm_stride) {
5682
5683 /* Check time... */
5684 if (ctl->atm_filter == 2 && (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1))
5685 continue;
5686
5687 /* Write output... */
5688 fprintf(out, "%.2f %g %g %g", atm->time[ip], Z(atm->p[ip]),
5689 atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip]);
5690 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
5691 fprintf(out, " ");
5692 if (ctl->atm_filter == 1 && (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1))
5693 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], GSL_NAN);
5694 else
5695 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], atm->q[iq][ip]);
5696 }
5697 fprintf(out, "\n");
5698 }
5699
5700 /* Close file... */
5701 fclose(out);
5702}

void write_atm_bin ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
atm_t *  atm 
)

Write atmospheric data in binary format.

Definition at line 5706 of file libtrac.c.

5709 {
5710
5711 FILE *out;
5712
5713 /* Create file... */
5714 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
5715 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
5716
5717 /* Write version of binary data... */
5718 int version = 100;
5719 FWRITE(&version, int,
5720 1,
5721 out);
5722
5723 /* Write data... */
5724 FWRITE(&atm->np, int,
5725 1,
5726 out);
5727 FWRITE(atm->time, double,
5728 (size_t) atm->np,
5729 out);
5730 FWRITE(atm->p, double,
5731 (size_t) atm->np,
5732 out);
5733 FWRITE(atm->lon, double,
5734 (size_t) atm->np,
5735 out);
5736 FWRITE(atm->lat, double,
5737 (size_t) atm->np,
5738 out);
5739 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
5740 FWRITE(atm->q[iq], double,
5741 (size_t) atm->np,
5742 out);
5743
5744 /* Write final flag... */
5745 int final = 999;
5746 FWRITE(&final, int,
5747 1,
5748 out);
5749
5750 /* Close file... */
5751 fclose(out);
5752}

5761
5762 /* Global Counter... */

5779 jsec2time(t, &year, &mon, &day, &hour, &min, &sec, &r);

5781 &min_start, &sec_start, &r_start);

5783 &min_stop, &sec_stop, &r_stop);

5787 year_start % 100, mon_start, day_start, hour_start,
5788 year_stop % 100, mon_stop, day_stop, hour_stop);
5789 LOG(1, "Write traj file: %s", filename_out);
5790
5791 /* Define hyperslap for the traj_file... */
5792 start[0] = out_cnt;
5793 start[1] = 0;
5794 count[0] = 1;
5795 count[1] = (size_t) atm->np;
5796
5797 /* Create the file at the first timestep... */
5798 if (out_cnt == 0) {
5799
5800 /* Create file... */

5802

5807 dim_ids[0] = tid;
5808 dim_ids[1] = pid;
5809
5810 /* Define variables and their attributes... */
5811 NC_DEF_VAR("time", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &tid, "Time",
5812 "seconds since 2000-01-01 00:00:00 UTC");
5813 NC_DEF_VAR("LAT", NC_DOUBLE, 2, dim_ids, "Latitude", "deg");
5814 NC_DEF_VAR("LON", NC_DOUBLE, 2, dim_ids, "Longitude", "deg");
5815 NC_DEF_VAR("PRESS", NC_DOUBLE, 2, dim_ids, "Pressure", "hPa");
5816 NC_DEF_VAR("ZETA", NC_DOUBLE, 2, dim_ids, "Zeta", "K");

5823 NC_PUT_ATT_GLOBAL("model", "MPTRAC");
5824
5825 /* End definitions... */
5826 NC(nc_enddef(ncid));
5827 NC(nc_close(ncid));
5828 }
5829
5830 /* Increment global counter to change hyperslap... */
5831 out_cnt++;
5832
5833 /* Open file... */
5834 NC(nc_open(filename_out, NC_WRITE, &ncid));
5835
5836 /* Write data... */
5837 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("time", atm->time, 1);
5838 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("LAT", atm->lat, 1);
5839 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("LON", atm->lon, 1);
5840 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("PRESS", atm->p, 1);
5841 if (ctl->vert_coord_ap == 1) {
5842 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("ZETA", atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta], 1);
5843 } else if (ctl->qnt_zeta >= 0) {
5844 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("ZETA", atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta_d], 1);
5845 }
5846 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
5847 NC_PUT_DOUBLE(ctl->qnt_name[iq], atm->q[iq], 1);
5848
5849 /* Close file... */
5850 NC(nc_close(ncid));
5851
5852 /* At the last time step create the init_fix_YYYYMMDDHH file... */
5853 if ((year == year_stop) && (mon == mon_stop)
5854 && (day == day_stop) && (hour == hour_stop)) {
5855
5856 /* Set filename... */
5857 char filename_init[2 * LEN] = "./init_fix_YYYYMMDDHH.nc";
5858 sprintf(filename_init, "%s/init_fix_%02d%02d%02d%02d.nc",
5859 dirname, year_stop % 100, mon_stop, day_stop, hour_stop);
5860 LOG(1, "Write init file: %s", filename_init);
5861
5862 /* Create file... */
5863 nc_create(filename_init, NC_CLOBBER, &ncid);
5864

5867 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "NPARTS", (size_t) atm->np, &pid));

5869 dim_ids[1] = pid;

5873 "seconds since 2000-01-01 00:00:00 UTC");
5874 NC_DEF_VAR("LAT", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &pid, "Latitude", "deg");
5875 NC_DEF_VAR("LON", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &pid, "Longitude", "deg");
