◆ write_csi()

void write_csi ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
atm_t *  atm,
double  t 
)

Write CSI data.

Definition at line 6006 of file libtrac.c.

6010 {
6011
6012 static FILE *out;
6013
6014 static double *modmean, *obsmean, *rt, *rz, *rlon, *rlat, *robs, *area,
6015 dlon, dlat, dz, x[NCSI], y[NCSI], kz[EP], kw[EP];
6016
6017 static int *obscount, ct, cx, cy, cz, ip, ix, iy, iz, n, nobs, nk;
6018
6019 /* Set timer... */
6020 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_CSI", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
6021
6022 /* Init... */
6023 if (t == ctl->t_start) {
6024
6025 /* Check quantity index for mass... */
6026 if (ctl->qnt_m < 0)
6027 ERRMSG("Need quantity mass!");
6028
6029 /* Allocate... */
6030 ALLOC(area, double,
6031 ctl->csi_ny);
6032 ALLOC(rt, double,
6033 NOBS);
6034 ALLOC(rz, double,
6035 NOBS);
6036 ALLOC(rlon, double,
6037 NOBS);
6038 ALLOC(rlat, double,
6039 NOBS);
6040 ALLOC(robs, double,
6041 NOBS);
6042
6043 /* Read observation data... */
6044 read_obs(ctl->csi_obsfile, rt, rz, rlon, rlat, robs, &nobs);
6045
6046 /* Read kernel data... */
6047 if (ctl->csi_kernel[0] != '-')
6048 read_kernel(ctl->csi_kernel, kz, kw, &nk);
6049
6050 /* Create new file... */
6051 LOG(1, "Write CSI data: %s", filename);
6052 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
6053 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
6054
6055 /* Write header... */
6056 fprintf(out,
6057 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
6058 "# $2 = number of hits (cx)\n"
6059 "# $3 = number of misses (cy)\n"
6060 "# $4 = number of false alarms (cz)\n"
6061 "# $5 = number of observations (cx + cy)\n"
6062 "# $6 = number of forecasts (cx + cz)\n"
6063 "# $7 = bias (ratio of forecasts and observations) [%%]\n"
6064 "# $8 = probability of detection (POD) [%%]\n"
6065 "# $9 = false alarm rate (FAR) [%%]\n"
6066 "# $10 = critical success index (CSI) [%%]\n");
6067 fprintf(out,
6068 "# $11 = hits associated with random chance\n"
6069 "# $12 = equitable threat score (ETS) [%%]\n"
6070 "# $13 = Pearson linear correlation coefficient\n"
6071 "# $14 = Spearman rank-order correlation coefficient\n"
6072 "# $15 = column density mean error (F - O) [kg/m^2]\n"
6073 "# $16 = column density root mean square error (RMSE) [kg/m^2]\n"
6074 "# $17 = column density mean absolute error [kg/m^2]\n"
6075 "# $18 = number of data points\n\n");
6076
6077 /* Set grid box size... */
6078 dz = (ctl->csi_z1 - ctl->csi_z0) / ctl->csi_nz;
6079 dlon = (ctl->csi_lon1 - ctl->csi_lon0) / ctl->csi_nx;
6080 dlat = (ctl->csi_lat1 - ctl->csi_lat0) / ctl->csi_ny;
6081
6082 /* Set horizontal coordinates... */
6083 for (iy = 0; iy < ctl->csi_ny; iy++) {
6084 double lat = ctl->csi_lat0 + dlat * (iy + 0.5);
6085 area[iy] = dlat * dlon * SQR(RE * M_PI / 180.) * cos(lat * M_PI / 180.);
6086 }
6087 }
6088
6089 /* Set time interval... */
6090 double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
6091 double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
6092
6093 /* Allocate... */
6094 ALLOC(modmean, double,
6095 ctl->csi_nx * ctl->csi_ny * ctl->csi_nz);
6096 ALLOC(obsmean, double,
6097 ctl->csi_nx * ctl->csi_ny * ctl->csi_nz);
6098 ALLOC(obscount, int,
6099 ctl->csi_nx * ctl->csi_ny * ctl->csi_nz);
6100
6101 /* Loop over observations... */
6102 for (int i = 0; i < nobs; i++) {
6103
6104 /* Check time... */
6105 if (rt[i] < t0)
6106 continue;
6107 else if (rt[i] >= t1)
6108 break;
6109
6110 /* Check observation data... */
6111 if (!isfinite(robs[i]))
6112 continue;
6113
6114 /* Calculate indices... */
6115 ix = (int) ((rlon[i] - ctl->csi_lon0) / dlon);
6116 iy = (int) ((rlat[i] - ctl->csi_lat0) / dlat);
6117 iz = (int) ((rz[i] - ctl->csi_z0) / dz);
6118
6119 /* Check indices... */
6120 if (ix < 0 || ix >= ctl->csi_nx ||
6121 iy < 0 || iy >= ctl->csi_ny || iz < 0 || iz >= ctl->csi_nz)
6122 continue;
6123
6124 /* Get mean observation index... */
6125 int idx = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->csi_ny, iz, ctl->csi_nz);
6126 obsmean[idx] += robs[i];
6127 obscount[idx]++;
6128 }
6129
6130 /* Analyze model data... */
6131 for (ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
6132
6133 /* Check time... */
6134 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
6135 continue;
6136
6137 /* Get indices... */
6138 ix = (int) ((atm->lon[ip] - ctl->csi_lon0) / dlon);
6139 iy = (int) ((atm->lat[ip] - ctl->csi_lat0) / dlat);
6140 iz = (int) ((Z(atm->p[ip]) - ctl->csi_z0) / dz);
6141
6142 /* Check indices... */
6143 if (ix < 0 || ix >= ctl->csi_nx ||
6144 iy < 0 || iy >= ctl->csi_ny || iz < 0 || iz >= ctl->csi_nz)
6145 continue;
6146
6147 /* Get total mass in grid cell... */
6148 int idx = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->csi_ny, iz, ctl->csi_nz);
6149 modmean[idx] += kernel_weight(kz, kw, nk, atm->p[ip])
6150 * atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip];
6151 }
6152
6153 /* Analyze all grid cells... */
6154 for (ix = 0; ix < ctl->csi_nx; ix++)
6155 for (iy = 0; iy < ctl->csi_ny; iy++)
6156 for (iz = 0; iz < ctl->csi_nz; iz++) {
6157
6158 /* Calculate mean observation index... */
6159 int idx = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->csi_ny, iz, ctl->csi_nz);
6160 if (obscount[idx] > 0)
6161 obsmean[idx] /= obscount[idx];
6162
6163 /* Calculate column density... */
6164 if (modmean[idx] > 0)
6165 modmean[idx] /= (1e6 * area[iy]);
6166
6167 /* Calculate CSI... */
6168 if (obscount[idx] > 0) {
6169 ct++;
6170 if (obsmean[idx] >= ctl->csi_obsmin &&
6171 modmean[idx] >= ctl->csi_modmin)
6172 cx++;
6173 else if (obsmean[idx] >= ctl->csi_obsmin &&
6174 modmean[idx] < ctl->csi_modmin)
6175 cy++;
6176 else if (obsmean[idx] < ctl->csi_obsmin &&
6177 modmean[idx] >= ctl->csi_modmin)
6178 cz++;
6179 }
6180
6181 /* Save data for other verification statistics... */
6182 if (obscount[idx] > 0
6183 && (obsmean[idx] >= ctl->csi_obsmin
6184 || modmean[idx] >= ctl->csi_modmin)) {
6185 x[n] = modmean[idx];
6186 y[n] = obsmean[idx];
6187 if ((++n) > NCSI)
6188 ERRMSG("Too many data points to calculate statistics!");
6189 }
6190 }
6191
6192 /* Write output... */
6193 if (fmod(t, ctl->csi_dt_out) == 0) {
6194
6195 /* Calculate verification statistics
6196 (https://www.cawcr.gov.au/projects/verification/) ... */
6197 static double work[2 * NCSI];
6198 int n_obs = cx + cy;
6199 int n_for = cx + cz;
6200 double bias = (n_obs > 0) ? 100. * n_for / n_obs : GSL_NAN;
6201 double pod = (n_obs > 0) ? (100. * cx) / n_obs : GSL_NAN;
6202 double far = (n_for > 0) ? (100. * cz) / n_for : GSL_NAN;
6203 double csi = (cx + cy + cz > 0) ? (100. * cx) / (cx + cy + cz) : GSL_NAN;
6204 double cx_rd = (ct > 0) ? (1. * n_obs * n_for) / ct : GSL_NAN;
6205 double ets = (cx + cy + cz - cx_rd > 0) ?
6206 (100. * (cx - cx_rd)) / (cx + cy + cz - cx_rd) : GSL_NAN;
6207 double rho_p =
6208 (n > 0) ? gsl_stats_correlation(x, 1, y, 1, (size_t) n) : GSL_NAN;
6209 double rho_s =
6210 (n > 0) ? gsl_stats_spearman(x, 1, y, 1, (size_t) n, work) : GSL_NAN;
6211 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
6212 work[i] = x[i] - y[i];
6213 double mean = (n > 0) ? gsl_stats_mean(work, 1, (size_t) n) : GSL_NAN;
6214 double rmse = (n > 0) ? gsl_stats_sd_with_fixed_mean(work, 1, (size_t) n,
6215 0.0) : GSL_NAN;
6216 double absdev =
6217 (n > 0) ? gsl_stats_absdev_m(work, 1, (size_t) n, 0.0) : GSL_NAN;
6218
6219 /* Write... */
6220 fprintf(out, "%.2f %d %d %d %d %d %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %d\n",
6221 t, cx, cy, cz, n_obs, n_for, bias, pod, far, csi, cx_rd, ets,
6222 rho_p, rho_s, mean, rmse, absdev, n);
6223
6224 /* Set counters to zero... */
6225 n = ct = cx = cy = cz = 0;
6226 }
6227
6228 /* Free... */
6229 free(modmean);
6230 free(obsmean);
6231 free(obscount);
6232
6233 /* Finalize... */
6234 if (t == ctl->t_stop) {
6235
6236 /* Close output file... */
6237 fclose(out);
6238
6239 /* Free... */
6240 free(area);
6241 free(rt);
6242 free(rz);
6243 free(rlon);
6244 free(rlat);
6245 free(robs);
6246 }
6247}
read_kernel
void read_kernel(const char *filename, double kz[EP], double kw[EP], int *nk)
Read kernel data file.
Definition: libtrac.c:3012
read_obs
void read_obs(char *filename, double *rt, double *rz, double *rlon, double *rlat, double *robs, int *nobs)
Read observation data.
Definition: libtrac.c:5141
kernel_weight
double kernel_weight(const double kz[EP], const double kw[EP], const int nk, const double p)
Get weighting factor from kernel function.
Definition: libtrac.c:1515
NCSI
#define NCSI
Maximum number of data points for CSI calculation.
Definition: libtrac.h:177
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ write_ens()

void write_ens ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
atm_t *  atm,
double  t 
)

Write ensemble data.

Definition at line 6251 of file libtrac.c.

6255 {
6256
6257 static FILE *out;
6258
6259 static double dummy, lat, lon, qm[NQ][NENS], qs[NQ][NENS], xm[NENS][3],
6260 x[3], zm[NENS];
6261
6262 static int n[NENS];
6263
6264 /* Set timer... */
6265 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_ENS", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
6266
6267 /* Check quantities... */
6268 if (ctl->qnt_ens < 0)
6269 ERRMSG("Missing ensemble IDs!");
6270
6271 /* Set time interval... */
6272 double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
6273 double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
6274
6275 /* Init... */
6276 for (int i = 0; i < NENS; i++) {
6277 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
6278 qm[iq][i] = qs[iq][i] = 0;
6279 xm[i][0] = xm[i][1] = xm[i][2] = zm[i] = 0;
6280 n[i] = 0;
6281 }
6282
6283 /* Loop over air parcels... */
6284 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
6285
6286 /* Check time... */
6287 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
6288 continue;
6289
6290 /* Check ensemble ID... */
6291 if (atm->q[ctl->qnt_ens][ip] < 0 || atm->q[ctl->qnt_ens][ip] >= NENS)
6292 ERRMSG("Ensemble ID is out of range!");
6293
6294 /* Get means... */
6295 geo2cart(0, atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip], x);
6296 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6297 qm[iq][ctl->qnt_ens] += atm->q[iq][ip];
6298 qs[iq][ctl->qnt_ens] += SQR(atm->q[iq][ip]);
6299 }
6300 xm[ctl->qnt_ens][0] += x[0];
6301 xm[ctl->qnt_ens][1] += x[1];
6302 xm[ctl->qnt_ens][2] += x[2];
6303 zm[ctl->qnt_ens] += Z(atm->p[ip]);
6304 n[ctl->qnt_ens]++;
6305 }
6306
6307 /* Create file... */
6308 LOG(1, "Write ensemble data: %s", filename);
6309 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
6310 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
6311
6312 /* Write header... */
6313 fprintf(out,
6314 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
6315 "# $2 = altitude [km]\n"
6316 "# $3 = longitude [deg]\n" "# $4 = latitude [deg]\n");
6317 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
6318 fprintf(out, "# $%d = %s (mean) [%s]\n", 5 + iq,
6319 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
6320 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
6321 fprintf(out, "# $%d = %s (sigma) [%s]\n", 5 + ctl->nq + iq,
6322 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
6323 fprintf(out, "# $%d = number of members\n\n", 5 + 2 * ctl->nq);
6324
6325 /* Write data... */
6326 for (int i = 0; i < NENS; i++)
6327 if (n[i] > 0) {
6328 cart2geo(xm[i], &dummy, &lon, &lat);
6329 fprintf(out, "%.2f %g %g %g", t, zm[i] / n[i], lon, lat);
6330 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6331 fprintf(out, " ");
6332 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], qm[iq][i] / n[i]);
6333 }
6334 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6335 fprintf(out, " ");
6336 double var = qs[iq][i] / n[i] - SQR(qm[iq][i] / n[i]);
6337 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], (var > 0 ? sqrt(var) : 0));
6338 }
6339 fprintf(out, " %d\n", n[i]);
6340 }
6341
6342 /* Close file... */
6343 fclose(out);
6344}

void write_grid ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
met_t *  met0,
met_t *  met1,
atm_t *  atm,

)

Write gridded data.

Definition at line 6348 of file libtrac.c.

6354 {
6355
6356 static double kz[EP], kw[EP];
6357
6358 static int nk;
6359
6360 double *cd, *mean[NQ], *std[NQ], *vmr_impl, *z, *lon, *lat, *area, *press;
6361
6362 int *ixs, *iys, *izs, *np;
6363
6364 /* Set timer... */
6365 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_GRID", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
6366
6367 /* Write info... */
6368 LOG(1, "Write grid data: %s", filename);
6369
6370 /* Init... */
6371 if (t == ctl->t_start) {
6372
6373 /* Read kernel data... */
6374 if (ctl->grid_kernel[0] != '-')
6375 read_kernel(ctl->grid_kernel, kz, kw, &nk);
6376 }
6377
6378 /* Allocate... */
6379 ALLOC(cd, double,
6380 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
6381 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6382 ALLOC(mean[iq], double,
6383 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
6384 ALLOC(std[iq], double,
6385 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
6386 }
6387 ALLOC(vmr_impl, double,
6388 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
6389 ALLOC(z, double,
6390 ctl->grid_nz);
6391 ALLOC(lon, double,
6392 ctl->grid_nx);
6393 ALLOC(lat, double,
6394 ctl->grid_ny);
6395 ALLOC(area, double,
6396 ctl->grid_ny);
6397 ALLOC(press, double,
6398 ctl->grid_nz);
6399 ALLOC(np, int,
6400 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
6401 ALLOC(ixs, int,
6402 atm->np);
6403 ALLOC(iys, int,
6404 atm->np);
6405 ALLOC(izs, int,
6406 atm->np);
6407
6408 /* Set grid box size... */
6409 double dz = (ctl->grid_z1 - ctl->grid_z0) / ctl->grid_nz;
6410 double dlon = (ctl->grid_lon1 - ctl->grid_lon0) / ctl->grid_nx;
6411 double dlat = (ctl->grid_lat1 - ctl->grid_lat0) / ctl->grid_ny;
6412
6413 /* Set vertical coordinates... */
6414#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
6415 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++) {
6416 z[iz] = ctl->grid_z0 + dz * (iz + 0.5);
6417 press[iz] = P(z[iz]);
6418 }
6419
6420 /* Set horizontal coordinates... */
6421 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
6422 lon[ix] = ctl->grid_lon0 + dlon * (ix + 0.5);
6423#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
6424 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++) {
6425 lat[iy] = ctl->grid_lat0 + dlat * (iy + 0.5);
6426 area[iy] = dlat * dlon * SQR(RE * M_PI / 180.)
6427 * cos(lat[iy] * M_PI / 180.);
6428 }
6429
6430 /* Set time interval for output... */
6431 double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
6432 double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
6433
6434 /* Get grid box indices... */
6435#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
6436 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
6437 ixs[ip] = (int) ((atm->lon[ip] - ctl->grid_lon0) / dlon);
6438 iys[ip] = (int) ((atm->lat[ip] - ctl->grid_lat0) / dlat);
6439 izs[ip] = (int) ((Z(atm->p[ip]) - ctl->grid_z0) / dz);
6440 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1
6441 || ixs[ip] < 0 || ixs[ip] >= ctl->grid_nx
6442 || iys[ip] < 0 || iys[ip] >= ctl->grid_ny
6443 || izs[ip] < 0 || izs[ip] >= ctl->grid_nz)
6444 izs[ip] = -1;
6445 }
6446
6447 /* Average data... */
6448 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++)
6449 if (izs[ip] >= 0) {
6450 int idx =
6451 ARRAY_3D(ixs[ip], iys[ip], ctl->grid_ny, izs[ip], ctl->grid_nz);
6452 double kernel = kernel_weight(kz, kw, nk, atm->p[ip]);
6453 np[idx]++;
6454 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6455 mean[iq][idx] += kernel * atm->q[iq][ip];
6456 std[iq][idx] += SQR(kernel * atm->q[iq][ip]);
6457 }
6458 }
6459
6460 /* Calculate column density and vmr... */
6461#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
6462 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
6463 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
6464 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++) {
6465
6466 /* Get grid index... */
6467 int idx = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz);
6468
6469 /* Calculate column density... */
6470 cd[idx] = GSL_NAN;
6471 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0)
6472 cd[idx] = mean[ctl->qnt_m][idx] / (1e6 * area[iy]);
6473
6474 /* Calculate volume mixing ratio (implicit)... */
6475 vmr_impl[idx] = GSL_NAN;
6476 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0 && ctl->molmass > 0) {
6477 vmr_impl[idx] = 0;
6478 if (mean[ctl->qnt_m][idx] > 0) {
6479
6480 /* Get temperature... */
6481 double temp;
6482 INTPOL_INIT;
6483 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->t, met1, met1->t, t, press[iz],
6484 lon[ix], lat[iy], &temp, ci, cw, 1);
6485
6486 /* Calculate volume mixing ratio... */
6487 vmr_impl[idx] = MA / ctl->molmass * mean[ctl->qnt_m][idx]
6488 / (RHO(press[iz], temp) * 1e6 * area[iy] * 1e3 * dz);
6489 }
6490 }
6491
6492 /* Calculate mean... */
6493 if (np[idx] > 0)
6494 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6495 mean[iq][idx] /= np[idx];
6496 double var = std[iq][idx] / np[idx] - SQR(mean[iq][idx]);
6497 std[iq][idx] = (var > 0 ? sqrt(var) : 0);
6498 } else
6499 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6500 mean[iq][idx] = GSL_NAN;
6501 std[iq][idx] = GSL_NAN;
6502 }
6503 }
6504
6505 /* Write ASCII data... */
6506 if (ctl->grid_type == 0)
6507 write_grid_asc(filename, ctl, cd, mean, std, vmr_impl, t, z, lon, lat,
6508 area, dz, np);
6509
6510 /* Write netCDF data... */
6511 else if (ctl->grid_type == 1)
6512 write_grid_nc(filename, ctl, cd, mean, std, vmr_impl, t, z, lon, lat,
6513 area, dz, np);
6514
6515 /* Error message... */
6516 else
6517 ERRMSG("Grid data format GRID_TYPE unknown!");
6518
6519 /* Free... */
6520 free(cd);
6521 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6522 free(mean[iq]);
6523 free(std[iq]);
6524 }
6525 free(vmr_impl);
6526 free(z);
6527 free(lon);
6528 free(lat);
6529 free(area);
6530 free(press);
6531 free(np);
6532 free(ixs);
6533 free(iys);
6534 free(izs);
6535}

6606 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);

6608

6611 if (ix > 0 && ctl->grid_ny > 1 && !ctl->grid_sparse)
6612 fprintf(out, "\n");
6613 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++) {

6618 if (!ctl->grid_sparse || vmr_impl[idx] > 0) {

6620 lat[iy], area[iy], dz, cd[idx], vmr_impl[idx], np[idx]);
6621 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6622 fprintf(out, " ");
6623 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], mean[iq][idx]);
6624 }
6625 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6626 fprintf(out, " ");
6627 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], std[iq][idx]);
6628 }
6629 fprintf(out, "\n");
6630 }
6631 }
6632 }
6633 }
6634
6635 /* Close file... */
6636 fclose(out);
6637}

void write_grid_nc ( const char *  filename,

double *  vmr_impl,

)

Write gridded data in netCDF format.

Definition at line 6641 of file libtrac.c.

6654 {
6655
6656 double *help;
6657
6658 int *help2, ncid, dimid[10], varid;
6659
6660 size_t start[2], count[2];
6661
6662 /* Allocate... */
6663 ALLOC(help, double,
6664 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
6665 ALLOC(help2, int,
6666 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
6667
6668 /* Create file... */
6669 NC(nc_create(filename, NC_CLOBBER, &ncid));
6670
6671 /* Define dimensions... */
6672 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "time", 1, &dimid[0]));
6673 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "z", (size_t) ctl->grid_nz, &dimid[1]));
6674 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "lat", (size_t) ctl->grid_ny, &dimid[2]));
6675 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "lon", (size_t) ctl->grid_nx, &dimid[3]));
6676 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "dz", 1, &dimid[4]));
6677
6678 /* Define variables and their attributes... */
6679 NC_DEF_VAR("time", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[0], "time",
6680 "seconds since 2000-01-01 00:00:00 UTC");
6681 NC_DEF_VAR("z", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[1], "altitude", "km");
6682 NC_DEF_VAR("lat", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[2], "latitude", "degrees_north");
6683 NC_DEF_VAR("lon", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[3], "longitude", "degrees_east");
6684 NC_DEF_VAR("dz", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[1], "layer depth", "km");
6685 NC_DEF_VAR("area", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[2], "surface area", "km**2");
6686 NC_DEF_VAR("cd", NC_FLOAT, 4, dimid, "column density", "kg m**-2");
6687 NC_DEF_VAR("vmr_impl", NC_FLOAT, 4, dimid,
6688 "volume mixing ratio (implicit)", "ppv");
6689 NC_DEF_VAR("np", NC_INT, 4, dimid, "number of particles", "1");
6690 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6691 NC_DEF_VAR(strcat(ctl->qnt_name[iq], "_mean"), NC_DOUBLE, 4, dimid,
6692 strcat(ctl->qnt_longname[iq], " (mean)"), ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
6693 NC_DEF_VAR(strcat(ctl->qnt_name[iq], "_std"), NC_DOUBLE, 4, dimid,
6694 strcat(ctl->qnt_longname[iq], " (standard deviation)"),
6695 ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
6696 }
6697 /* End definitions... */
6698 NC(nc_enddef(ncid));
6699
6700 /* Write data... */
6701 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("time", &t, 0);
6702 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("lon", lon, 0);
6703 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("lat", lat, 0);
6704 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("z", z, 0);
6705 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("area", area, 0);
6706 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("dz", &dz, 0);
6707
6708 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
6709 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
6710 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++)
6711 help[ARRAY_3D(iz, iy, ctl->grid_ny, ix, ctl->grid_nx)] =
6712 cd[ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz)];
6713 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("cd", help, 0);
6714
6715 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
6716 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
6717 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++)
6718 help[ARRAY_3D(iz, iy, ctl->grid_ny, ix, ctl->grid_nx)] =
6719 vmr_impl[ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz)];
6720 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("vmr_impl", help, 0);
6721
6722 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
6723 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
6724 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++)
6725 help2[ARRAY_3D(iz, iy, ctl->grid_ny, ix, ctl->grid_nx)] =
6726 np[ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz)];
6727 NC_PUT_INT("np", help2, 0);
6728
6729 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6730 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
6731 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
6732 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++)
6733 help[ARRAY_3D(iz, iy, ctl->grid_ny, ix, ctl->grid_nx)] =
6734 mean[iq][ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz)];
6735 NC_PUT_DOUBLE(strcat(ctl->qnt_name[iq], "_mean"), help, 0);
6736 }
6737
6738 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6739 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
6740 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
6741 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++)
6742 help[ARRAY_3D(iz, iy, ctl->grid_ny, ix, ctl->grid_nx)] =
6743 std[iq][ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz)];
6744 NC_PUT_DOUBLE(strcat(ctl->qnt_name[iq], "_std"), help, 0);
6745 }
6746
6747 /* Close file... */
6748 NC(nc_close(ncid));
6749
6750 /* Free... */
6751 free(help);
6752 free(help2);
6753}
NC_PUT_INT
#define NC_PUT_INT(varname, ptr, hyperslab)
Write netCDF integer array.

6760 {
6761
6762 /* Set timer... */
6763 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_MET", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
6764
6765 /* Write info... */
6766 LOG(1, "Write meteo data: %s", filename);
6767
6768 /* Check compression flags... */
6769#ifndef ZFP
6770 if (ctl->met_type == 3)
6771 ERRMSG("MPTRAC was compiled without zfp compression!");
6772#endif
6773#ifndef ZSTD
6774 if (ctl->met_type == 4)
6775 ERRMSG("MPTRAC was compiled without zstd compression!");
6776#endif
6777
6778 /* Write binary data... */
6779 if (ctl->met_type >= 1 && ctl->met_type <= 4) {
6780
6781 /* Create file... */
6782 FILE *out;
6783 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
6784 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
6785
6786 /* Write type of binary data... */
6787 FWRITE(&ctl->met_type, int,
6788 1,
6789 out);
6790
6791 /* Write version of binary data... */
6792 int version = 101;
6793 FWRITE(&version, int,
6794 1,
6795 out);
6796
6797 /* Write grid data... */
6798 FWRITE(&met->time, double,
6799 1,
6800 out);
6801 FWRITE(&met->nx, int,
6802 1,
6803 out);
6804 FWRITE(&met->ny, int,
6805 1,
6806 out);
6807 FWRITE(&met->np, int,
6808 1,
6809 out);
6810 FWRITE(met->lon, double,
6811 (size_t) met->nx,
6812 out);
6813 FWRITE(met->lat, double,
6814 (size_t) met->ny,
6815 out);
6816 FWRITE(met->p, double,
6817 (size_t) met->np,
6818 out);
6819
6820 /* Write surface data... */
6821 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->ps, "PS");
6822 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->ts, "TS");
6823 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->zs, "ZS");
6824 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->us, "US");
6825 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->vs, "VS");
6826 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->lsm, "LSM");
6827 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->sst, "SST");
6828 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->pbl, "PBL");
6829 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->pt, "PT");
6830 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->tt, "TT");
6831 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->zt, "ZT");
6832 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->h2ot, "H2OT");
6833 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->pct, "PCT");
6834 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->pcb, "PCB");
6835 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->cl, "CL");
6836 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->plcl, "PLCL");
6837 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->plfc, "PLFC");
6838 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->pel, "PEL");
6839 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->cape, "CAPE");
6840 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->cin, "CIN");
6841
6842 /* Write level data... */
6843 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->z, "Z", 0, ctl->met_zfp_tol_z);
6844 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->t, "T", 0, ctl->met_zfp_tol_t);
6845 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->u, "U", ctl->met_zfp_prec, 0);
6846 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->v, "V", ctl->met_zfp_prec, 0);
6847 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->w, "W", ctl->met_zfp_prec, 0);
6848 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->pv, "PV", ctl->met_zfp_prec, 0);
6849 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->h2o, "H2O", ctl->met_zfp_prec, 0);
6850 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->o3, "O3", ctl->met_zfp_prec, 0);
6851 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->lwc, "LWC", ctl->met_zfp_prec, 0);
6852 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->iwc, "IWC", ctl->met_zfp_prec, 0);
6853 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->cc, "CC", ctl->met_zfp_prec, 0);
6854
6855 /* Write final flag... */
6856 int final = 999;
6857 FWRITE(&final, int,
6858 1,
6859 out);
6860
6861 /* Close file... */
6862 fclose(out);
6863 }
6864
6865 return 0;
6866}

◆ write_met_bin_3d()

void write_met_bin_3d ( FILE *  out,
ctl_t *  ctl,
met_t *  met,
float  var[EX][EY][EP],

)

Write 3-D meteo variable.

Definition at line 6899 of file libtrac.c.

6906 {
6907
6908 float *help;
6909
6910 /* Allocate... */
6911 ALLOC(help, float,
6912 EX * EY * EP);
6913
6914 /* Copy data... */
6915#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
6916 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
6917 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
6918 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
6919 help[ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, met->ny, ip, met->np)] = var[ix][iy][ip];
6920
6921 /* Write uncompressed data... */
6922 if (ctl->met_type == 1) {
6923 LOG(2, "Write 3-D variable: %s (uncompressed)", varname);
6924 FWRITE(help, float,
6925 (size_t) (met->nx * met->ny * met->np),
6926 out);
6927 }
6928
6929 /* Write packed data... */
6930 else if (ctl->met_type == 2)
6931 compress_pack(varname, help, (size_t) (met->ny * met->nx),
6932 (size_t) met->np, 0, out);
6933
6934 /* Write zfp data... */
6935#ifdef ZFP
6936 else if (ctl->met_type == 3) {
6937 FWRITE(&precision, int,
6938 1,
6939 out);
6940 FWRITE(&tolerance, double,
6941 1,
6942 out);
6943 compress_zfp(varname, help, met->np, met->ny, met->nx, precision,
6944 tolerance, 0, out);
6945 }
6946#endif
6947
6948 /* Write zstd data... */
6949#ifdef ZSTD
6950 else if (ctl->met_type == 4)
6951 compress_zstd(varname, help, (size_t) (met->np * met->ny * met->nx), 0,
6952 out);
6953#endif
6954
6955 /* Unknown method... */
6956 else {
6957 ERRMSG("MET_TYPE not supported!");
6958 LOG(3, "%d %g", precision, tolerance);
6959 }
6960
6961 /* Free... */
6962 free(help);
6963}

◆ write_prof()

void write_prof ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
met_t *  met0,
met_t *  met1,
atm_t *  atm,
double  t 
)

Write profile data.

Definition at line 6967 of file libtrac.c.

6973 {
6974
6975 static FILE *out;
6976
6977 static double *mass, *obsmean, *rt, *rz, *rlon, *rlat, *robs, *area,
6978 dz, dlon, dlat, *lon, *lat, *z, *press, temp, vmr, h2o, o3;
6979
6980 static int nobs, *obscount, ip, okay;
6981
6982 /* Set timer... */
6983 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_PROF", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
6984
6985 /* Init... */
6986 if (t == ctl->t_start) {
6987
6988 /* Check quantity index for mass... */
6989 if (ctl->qnt_m < 0)
6990 ERRMSG("Need quantity mass!");
6991
6992 /* Check molar mass... */
6993 if (ctl->molmass <= 0)
6994 ERRMSG("Specify molar mass!");
6995
6996 /* Allocate... */
6997 ALLOC(lon, double,
6998 ctl->prof_nx);
6999 ALLOC(lat, double,
7000 ctl->prof_ny);
7001 ALLOC(area, double,
7002 ctl->prof_ny);
7003 ALLOC(z, double,
7004 ctl->prof_nz);
7005 ALLOC(press, double,
7006 ctl->prof_nz);
7007 ALLOC(rt, double,
7008 NOBS);
7009 ALLOC(rz, double,
7010 NOBS);
7011 ALLOC(rlon, double,
7012 NOBS);
7013 ALLOC(rlat, double,
7014 NOBS);
7015 ALLOC(robs, double,
7016 NOBS);
7017
7018 /* Read observation data... */
7019 read_obs(ctl->prof_obsfile, rt, rz, rlon, rlat, robs, &nobs);
7020
7021 /* Create new output file... */
7022 LOG(1, "Write profile data: %s", filename);
7023 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
7024 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
7025
7026 /* Write header... */
7027 fprintf(out,
7028 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
7029 "# $2 = altitude [km]\n"
7030 "# $3 = longitude [deg]\n"
7031 "# $4 = latitude [deg]\n"
7032 "# $5 = pressure [hPa]\n"
7033 "# $6 = temperature [K]\n"
7034 "# $7 = volume mixing ratio [ppv]\n"
7035 "# $8 = H2O volume mixing ratio [ppv]\n"
7036 "# $9 = O3 volume mixing ratio [ppv]\n"
7037 "# $10 = observed BT index [K]\n"
7038 "# $11 = number of observations\n");
7039
7040 /* Set grid box size... */
7041 dz = (ctl->prof_z1 - ctl->prof_z0) / ctl->prof_nz;
7042 dlon = (ctl->prof_lon1 - ctl->prof_lon0) / ctl->prof_nx;
7043 dlat = (ctl->prof_lat1 - ctl->prof_lat0) / ctl->prof_ny;
7044
7045 /* Set vertical coordinates... */
7046 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->prof_nz; iz++) {
7047 z[iz] = ctl->prof_z0 + dz * (iz + 0.5);
7048 press[iz] = P(z[iz]);
7049 }
7050
7051 /* Set horizontal coordinates... */
7052 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->prof_nx; ix++)
7053 lon[ix] = ctl->prof_lon0 + dlon * (ix + 0.5);
7054 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->prof_ny; iy++) {
7055 lat[iy] = ctl->prof_lat0 + dlat * (iy + 0.5);
7056 area[iy] = dlat * dlon * SQR(RE * M_PI / 180.)
7057 * cos(lat[iy] * M_PI / 180.);
7058 }
7059 }
7060
7061 /* Set time interval... */
7062 double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
7063 double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
7064
7065 /* Allocate... */
7066 ALLOC(mass, double,
7067 ctl->prof_nx * ctl->prof_ny * ctl->prof_nz);
7068 ALLOC(obsmean, double,
7069 ctl->prof_nx * ctl->prof_ny);
7070 ALLOC(obscount, int,
7071 ctl->prof_nx * ctl->prof_ny);
7072
7073 /* Loop over observations... */
7074 for (int i = 0; i < nobs; i++) {
7075
7076 /* Check time... */
7077 if (rt[i] < t0)
7078 continue;
7079 else if (rt[i] >= t1)
7080 break;
7081
7082 /* Check observation data... */
7083 if (!isfinite(robs[i]))
7084 continue;
7085
7086 /* Calculate indices... */
7087 int ix = (int) ((rlon[i] - ctl->prof_lon0) / dlon);
7088 int iy = (int) ((rlat[i] - ctl->prof_lat0) / dlat);
7089
7090 /* Check indices... */
7091 if (ix < 0 || ix >= ctl->prof_nx || iy < 0 || iy >= ctl->prof_ny)
7092 continue;
7093
7094 /* Get mean observation index... */
7095 int idx = ARRAY_2D(ix, iy, ctl->prof_ny);
7096 obsmean[idx] += robs[i];
7097 obscount[idx]++;
7098 }
7099
7100 /* Analyze model data... */
7101 for (ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
7102
7103 /* Check time... */
7104 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
7105 continue;
7106
7107 /* Get indices... */
7108 int ix = (int) ((atm->lon[ip] - ctl->prof_lon0) / dlon);
7109 int iy = (int) ((atm->lat[ip] - ctl->prof_lat0) / dlat);
7110 int iz = (int) ((Z(atm->p[ip]) - ctl->prof_z0) / dz);
7111
7112 /* Check indices... */
7113 if (ix < 0 || ix >= ctl->prof_nx ||
7114 iy < 0 || iy >= ctl->prof_ny || iz < 0 || iz >= ctl->prof_nz)
7115 continue;
7116
7117 /* Get total mass in grid cell... */
7118 int idx = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->prof_ny, iz, ctl->prof_nz);
7119 mass[idx] += atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip];
7120 }
7121
7122 /* Extract profiles... */
7123 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->prof_nx; ix++)
7124 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->prof_ny; iy++) {
7125 int idx2 = ARRAY_2D(ix, iy, ctl->prof_ny);
7126 if (obscount[idx2] > 0) {
7127
7128 /* Check profile... */
7129 okay = 0;
7130 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->prof_nz; iz++) {
7131 int idx3 = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->prof_ny, iz, ctl->prof_nz);
7132 if (mass[idx3] > 0) {
7133 okay = 1;
7134 break;
7135 }
7136 }
7137 if (!okay)
7138 continue;
7139
7140 /* Write output... */
7141 fprintf(out, "\n");
7142
7143 /* Loop over altitudes... */
7144 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->prof_nz; iz++) {
7145
7146 /* Get temperature, water vapor, and ozone... */
7147 INTPOL_INIT;
7148 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->t, met1, met1->t, t, press[iz],
7149 lon[ix], lat[iy], &temp, ci, cw, 1);
7150 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->h2o, met1, met1->h2o, t, press[iz],
7151 lon[ix], lat[iy], &h2o, ci, cw, 0);
7152 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->o3, met1, met1->o3, t, press[iz],
7153 lon[ix], lat[iy], &o3, ci, cw, 0);
7154
7155 /* Calculate volume mixing ratio... */
7156 int idx3 = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->prof_ny, iz, ctl->prof_nz);
7157 vmr = MA / ctl->molmass * mass[idx3]
7158 / (RHO(press[iz], temp) * area[iy] * dz * 1e9);
7159
7160 /* Write output... */
7161 fprintf(out, "%.2f %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %d\n",
7162 t, z[iz], lon[ix], lat[iy], press[iz], temp, vmr, h2o, o3,
7163 obsmean[idx2] / obscount[idx2], obscount[idx2]);
7164 }
7165 }
7166 }
7167
7168 /* Free... */
7169 free(mass);
7170 free(obsmean);
7171 free(obscount);
7172
7173 /* Finalize... */
7174 if (t == ctl->t_stop) {
7175
7176 /* Close output file... */
7177 fclose(out);
7178
7179 /* Free... */
7180 free(lon);
7181 free(lat);
7182 free(area);
7183 free(z);
7184 free(press);
7185 free(rt);
7186 free(rz);
7187 free(rlon);
7188 free(rlat);
7189 free(robs);
7190 }
7191}
Here is the call graph for this function:

◆ write_sample()

void write_sample ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
met_t *  met0,
met_t *  met1,
atm_t *  atm,
double  t 
)

Write sample data.

Definition at line 7195 of file libtrac.c.

7201 {
7202
7203 static FILE *out;
7204
7205 static double area, dlat, rmax2, *rt, *rz, *rlon, *rlat, *robs, kz[EP],
7206 kw[EP];
7207
7208 static int nobs, nk;
7209
7210 /* Set timer... */
7211 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_SAMPLE", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
7212
7213 /* Init... */
7214 if (t == ctl->t_start) {
7215
7216 /* Allocate... */
7217 ALLOC(rt, double,
7218 NOBS);
7219 ALLOC(rz, double,
7220 NOBS);
7221 ALLOC(rlon, double,
7222 NOBS);
7223 ALLOC(rlat, double,

7225 ALLOC(robs, double,
7226 NOBS);
7227
7228 /* Read observation data... */

7233 read_kernel(ctl->sample_kernel, kz, kw, &nk);
7234
7235 /* Create output file... */

7237 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))

7239
7240 /* Write header... */
7241 fprintf(out,
7242 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
7243 "# $2 = altitude [km]\n"
7244 "# $3 = longitude [deg]\n"
7245 "# $4 = latitude [deg]\n"
7246 "# $5 = surface area [km^2]\n"
7247 "# $6 = layer depth [km]\n"
7248 "# $7 = number of particles [1]\n"
7249 "# $8 = column density [kg/m^2]\n"
7250 "# $9 = volume mixing ratio [ppv]\n"
7251 "# $10 = observed BT index [K]\n\n");
7252
7253 /* Set latitude range, squared radius, and area... */
7254 dlat = DY2DEG(ctl->sample_dx);
7255 rmax2 = SQR(ctl->sample_dx);
7256 area = M_PI * rmax2;
7257 }
7258
7259 /* Set time interval for output... */
7260 double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
7261 double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
7262
7263 /* Loop over observations... */
7264 for (int i = 0; i < nobs; i++) {
7265
7266 /* Check time... */
7267 if (rt[i] < t0)
7268 continue;
7269 else if (rt[i] >= t1)
7270 break;
7271
7272 /* Calculate Cartesian coordinates... */
7273 double x0[3];
7274 geo2cart(0, rlon[i], rlat[i], x0);
7275
7276 /* Set pressure range... */
7277 double rp = P(rz[i]);
7278 double ptop = P(rz[i] + ctl->sample_dz);
7279 double pbot = P(rz[i] - ctl->sample_dz);
7280
7281 /* Init... */
7282 double mass = 0;
7283 int np = 0;
7284
7285 /* Loop over air parcels... */
7286#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) reduction(+:mass,np)
7287 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
7288
7289 /* Check time... */
7290 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
7291 continue;
7292
7293 /* Check latitude... */
7294 if (fabs(rlat[i] - atm->lat[ip]) > dlat)
7295 continue;
7296
7297 /* Check horizontal distance... */
7298 double x1[3];
7299 geo2cart(0, atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip], x1);
7300 if (DIST2(x0, x1) > rmax2)
7301 continue;
7302
7303 /* Check pressure... */
7304 if (ctl->sample_dz > 0)
7305 if (atm->p[ip] > pbot || atm->p[ip] < ptop)
7306 continue;
7307
7308 /* Add mass... */
7309 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0)
7310 mass +=
7311 kernel_weight(kz, kw, nk, atm->p[ip]) * atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip];
7312 np++;
7313 }
7314
7315 /* Calculate column density... */
7316 double cd = mass / (1e6 * area);
7317
7318 /* Calculate volume mixing ratio... */
7319 double vmr = 0;
7320 if (ctl->molmass > 0 && ctl->sample_dz > 0) {
7321 if (mass > 0) {
7322
7323 /* Get temperature... */
7324 double temp;
7325 INTPOL_INIT;
7326 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->t, met1, met1->t, rt[i], rp,
7327 rlon[i], rlat[i], &temp, ci, cw, 1);
7328
7329 /* Calculate volume mixing ratio... */
7330 vmr = MA / ctl->molmass * mass
7331 / (RHO(rp, temp) * 1e6 * area * 1e3 * ctl->sample_dz);
7332 }
7333 } else
7334 vmr = GSL_NAN;
7335
7336 /* Write output... */
7337 fprintf(out, "%.2f %g %g %g %g %g %d %g %g %g\n", rt[i], rz[i],
7338 rlon[i], rlat[i], area, ctl->sample_dz, np, cd, vmr, robs[i]);
7339 }
7340
7341 /* Finalize...... */
7342 if (t == ctl->t_stop) {
7343
7344 /* Close output file... */
7345 fclose(out);
7346
7347 /* Free... */
7348 free(rt);
7349 free(rz);
7350 free(rlon);
7351 free(rlat);
7352 free(robs);
7353 }
7354}
Here is the call graph for this function:

void write_station ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
atm_t *  atm,
double  t 
)

Write station data.

7365
7366 static double rmax2, x0[3], x1[3];
7367
7368 /* Set timer... */
7369 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_STATION", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
7370
7371 /* Init... */
7372 if (t == ctl->t_start) {
7373
7374 /* Write info... */
7375 LOG(1, "Write station data: %s", filename);
7376
7377 /* Create new file... */
7378 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
7379 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
7380
7381 /* Write header... */
7382 fprintf(out,
7383 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
7384 "# $2 = altitude [km]\n"
7385 "# $3 = longitude [deg]\n" "# $4 = latitude [deg]\n");
7386 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
7387 fprintf(out, "# $%i = %s [%s]\n", (iq + 5),
7388 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
7389 fprintf(out, "\n");
7390

7392 geo2cart(0, ctl->stat_lon, ctl->stat_lat, x0);
7393 rmax2 = SQR(ctl->stat_r);
7394 }
7395
7396 /* Set time interval for output... */
7397 double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
7398 double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
7399
7400 /* Loop over air parcels... */
7401 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
7402
7403 /* Check time... */
7404 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
7405 continue;
7406
7407 /* Check time range for station output... */
7408 if (atm->time[ip] < ctl->stat_t0 || atm->time[ip] > ctl->stat_t1)
7409 continue;
7410
7411 /* Check station flag... */
7412 if (ctl->qnt_stat >= 0)
7413 if (atm->q[ctl->qnt_stat][ip])
7414 continue;
7415
7416 /* Get Cartesian coordinates... */
7417 geo2cart(0, atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip], x1);
7418
7419 /* Check horizontal distance... */
7420 if (DIST2(x0, x1) > rmax2)
7421 continue;
7422
7423 /* Set station flag... */
7424 if (ctl->qnt_stat >= 0)
7425 atm->q[ctl->qnt_stat][ip] = 1;
7426
7427 /* Write data... */
7428 fprintf(out, "%.2f %g %g %g",
7429 atm->time[ip], Z(atm->p[ip]), atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip]);
7430 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
7431 fprintf(out, " ");
7432 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], atm->q[iq][ip]);
7433 }
7434 fprintf(out, "\n");
7435 }
7436
7437 /* Close file... */
7438 if (t == ctl->t_stop)
7439 fclose(out);
7440}

◆ write_vtk()

void write_vtk ( const char *  filename,
ctl_t *  ctl,
atm_t *  atm,
double  t 
)

Write VTK data.

Definition at line 7444 of file libtrac.c.

7448 {
7449
7450 FILE *out;
7451
7452 /* Set timer... */
7453 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_VTK", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
7454
7455 /* Write info... */
7456 LOG(1, "Write VTK data: %s", filename);
7457
7458 /* Set time interval for output... */
7459 double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
7460 double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
7461
7462 /* Create file... */
7463 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
7464 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
7465
7466 /* Count data points... */
7467 int np = 0;
7468 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip += ctl->vtk_stride) {
7469 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
7470 continue;
7471 np++;
7472 }
7473
7474 /* Write header... */
7475 fprintf(out,
7476 "# vtk DataFile Version 3.0\n"
7477 "vtk output\n" "ASCII\n" "DATASET POLYDATA\n");
7478
7479 /* Write point coordinates... */
7480 fprintf(out, "POINTS %d float\n", np);
7481 if (ctl->vtk_sphere) {
7482 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip += ctl->vtk_stride) {
7483 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
7484 continue;
7485 double radius = (RE + Z(atm->p[ip]) * ctl->vtk_scale
7486 + ctl->vtk_offset) / RE;
7487 double x = radius * cos(atm->lat[ip] / 180. * M_PI)
7488 * cos(atm->lon[ip] / 180. * M_PI);
7489 double y = radius * cos(atm->lat[ip] / 180. * M_PI)
7490 * sin(atm->lon[ip] / 180. * M_PI);
7491 double z = radius * sin(atm->lat[ip] / 180. * M_PI);
7492 fprintf(out, "%g %g %g\n", x, y, z);
7493 }
7494 } else
7495 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip += ctl->vtk_stride) {
7496 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
7497 continue;
7498 fprintf(out, "%g %g %g\n", atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip],
7499 Z(atm->p[ip]) * ctl->vtk_scale + ctl->vtk_offset);
7500 }
7501
7502 /* Write point data... */
7503 fprintf(out, "POINT_DATA %d\n", np);
7504 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
7505 fprintf(out, "SCALARS %s float 1\n" "LOOKUP_TABLE default\n",
7506 ctl->qnt_name[iq]);
7507 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip += ctl->vtk_stride) {
7508 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
7509 continue;
7510 fprintf(out, "%g\n", atm->q[iq][ip]);
7511 }
7512 }
7513
7514 /* Close file... */
7515 fclose(out);
7516}
